T06srabhusu:410: tatra yathā caṃkramyate (caṃkramate) yena na lokagarhito bhavati, na
T06srabhusu:429: tacca yathāyogaṃ yatra kalpayitavyaṃ, yathā ca kalpayitavyaṃ tatra tathā kalpayati |
T06srabhusu:435: tatra kuśalapakṣaprayogadhiṣṭhāna ācāraḥ [|] kathaṃ lokānutkrāntaśca bhavati, vinayānutkrāntaśca [|] kuśalapakṣaucyate [|] tadyathā svādhyāyagurūṇāṃ sāmīcīkarma, upasthā(pa)naṃ ca, tathā glānopasthānamanyo [a]nyamanukampācittamupasthāpya cchandadāna[sa]muprayogaḥ, paripṛcchā,
T06srabhusu:437: caiyā(ceryā) kṛtyakriyā, pareṣāṃ ca kuśalapakṣasamudāpanā, dharmadeśanā |
T06srabhusu:438: pratisaṃlayanapraveśaparyaṅkanibandhāniṣadyā iti ya evaṃ bhāgīyā apyanye dharmā ayamucyate
T06srabhusu:444: vinayaśikṣitānāṃ, samyagratānāṃ, satpuruṣāṇāṃ, sahadhārmikāṇāmayamucyate kuśalapakṣa (Śbh_Sh: 40) prayogādhiṣṭhāna ācāra(ro) lokānutkrānto,
T06srabhusu:445: vinayānutkrāntaśca [|] ya ebhirākāraiḥ sampanna ācāra iyamucyate ācārasampat |
T06srabhusu:448: pañca bhikṣoragocarāḥ (|) katame pañca [|] tadyathā ghoṣo, veṣaṃ (veśyā-)pānāgāraḥ, rājakulaṃ, caṇḍālakaṭhinameva pañcamamiti |
T06srabhusu:449: ya etāṃstathāgatapratikṣiptānagocarān varjayitvā anyatra gocare caratyanavadye tatra kālenaivaṃ gocarasampanno bhavati ||
T06srabhusu:455: punastathā hi tasyā adhyāpatteralpakṛccheṇa vyuttiṣṭhate yena tadaṇumātramityucyate |
T06srabhusu:459: anadhi[gatasyādhi]gamāya, asākṣātkṛtasya sākṣātkriyāyai, apāyago vā syāmapāyagāmī, ātmā vā me apavadet, śāstā vā, devatā vā, vijñā vā,
T06srabhusu:461: digvidikṣu ca me pāpako varṇakīrttiśabdaśloko [a]bhyudgacchetsa ebhyo dṛṣṭadharmasāṃparāyikebhyastaddhetukebhyo vi[śi]ṣṭebhyo dharmebhyo bhayadarśī bhavati |
T06srabhusu:462: yena tāni kṣudrāṇu(nu)kṣudrāṇi śikṣāpadāni jīvitahetorapi na saṃdhibhyo vyāpadyate |
T06srabhusu:464: smṛtisaṃpramoṣādadhyāpannaḥ laghu laghveva yathādharmaṃ pratikaroti vyuttiṣṭhate [|] evamaṇumātreṣvavadyeṣu bhayadarśī bhavati |
T06srabhusu:466: (Śbh_Sh: 42) āha [|] pūrvamanena prātimokṣasamvarasamādānajñapticaturthena karmaṇā upasampadyamānena katipayānāṃ śikṣāpadānāṃ śarīraṃ śrutaṃ, sātirekaṃ ca tadanyaṃ divasaṃ śikṣāpadaśataṃ prātimokṣasūtroddiṣṭaṃ pratijñayevopagataṃ sarvatra la(bdhā)ṣyāmīti (lapsyāmīti) |
T06srabhusu:470: tataśca tena sarvaśikṣāsamādānāt prātimokṣasamvaraḥ pratilabdhastata uttarakālaṃ yeṣu śikṣāpadeṣu kuśalo bhavati |
T06srabhusu:475: tāni pūrvaṃ pratijñāsamādānena samādattānyetarhi vyutpattikauśalyatayā samādadāti |
T06srabhusu:476: tebhyaḥ pūrvaṃ yathāparikīrttitebhyaḥ sthānebhya ācāryasya vopādhyāyasya vā pūrvavat |
T06srabhusu:477: vyutpattikauśalyatayā ca punaḥ samādāya, yathānuśiṣṭaḥ anyūnamadhikaṃ śikṣate |
T06srabhusu:478: te[ṣu guru]sthānīyavyapadiṣṭeṣu śikṣāpadeṣu aviparītagrāhī ca bhavatyarthasya vyaṃjanasya ca |
T06srabhusu:479: evaṃ samādāya śikṣate śikṣāpadeṣvayaṃ tāvadvibhaṃgaḥ śīlasamvarasya vistarakṛtaḥ ||
T06srabhusu:484: yathā kathamiti yattāvadāha śīlavān viharatītyanena tāvadavipraṇāśalakṣaṇaṃ śīlasamvarasyākhyātaṃ || yatpunarāha prāti mokṣasamvarasaṃvṛta iti |
T06srabhusu:491: tathāpi pare tāmācāragocarasampadamupalabhyāprasannāśca prasīdanti, prasannānāṃ ca bhavati bhūyobhāvaḥ |
T06srabhusu:494: nāvvarṇaṃ niścārayantyanyathā śīlasampannasyācāragocarasampannasyāyaṃ parādhipateyo guṇa ānuśansā
T06srabhusu:495: (ānuśaṃsā) ca bhavedetadviparyayeṇa vā (cā)sya doṣa eva bhavet |
T06srabhusu:504: prāgevādhi mātreṣvasamādāya ca śikṣate śikṣāpadeṣu tasmāttaddhetustatpratyayaṃ kāyasya bhedāt sugatāvupapadyate |
T06srabhusu:508: aparaḥ punaḥ paryāyaḥ [|] samāsato bhagavatā samādattaśīlatā paridīpitā,
T06srabhusu:509: nairyāṇikaśīlatā ca, śīlabhāvanā ca [|] tatra yattāvadāha |
T06srabhusu:512: prātimokṣasamvarasaṃvṛta ityanena nairyāṇikaśīlatā ākhyātā [|] tathā hi prātimokṣasamvarasaṃgṛhītaṃ śīlamadhiśīlaṃ śikṣetyucyate |
T06srabhusu:513: adhiśīlaṃ ca śikṣāṃ niśritya, adhicittaṃ ca, adhiprajñaṃ ca śikṣāṃ bhāvayatyevamasau sarvaduḥkhakṣayāya
T06srabhusu:515: yadutādhiśīlaṃ pratiṣṭhāya pūvvaṃgamaṃ kṛtvā tasmāt prātimokṣasaṃvaro nairyāṇikaṃ śīlamityucyate
T06srabhusu:517: ācāragocarasampannaḥ aṇumātreṣvavadyeṣu bhayadarśī samādāya śikṣate śikṣāpadeṣvanena śīlabhāvanā ākhyātā |
T06srabhusu:519: evaṃ ca bhāvitaṃ subhāvitaṃ bhavatīti sa eṣa ekaḥ śīlasamvaraḥ ṣaḍākāradeśanāpratyupasthāno veditavyaḥ ||
T06srabhusu:523: ādita eva durgṛhīto bhavatyatilīno bhavatyanisṛto bhavati, pramādakausīdyaparigṛhīto bhavati
T06srabhusu:525: ācāravipattyā parigṛhīto bhavatyājīvavipattyā parigṛhīto bhavatyantadvayapatito bhavati || anairyāṇiko bhavati |
T06srabhusu:528: yathāpī haikatyo rājābhinirṇīto vā, pravrajitaścaurābhinirṇīto vā, ṛṇārttovā, bhayārtto vā,
T06srabhusu:529: vā, a(ā)jīvikābhayabhīto (Śbh_Sh: 46) vā, na śrāmaṇyāya, na brāhmaṇyāya,
T06srabhusu:539: asthāne pareṣāmantike paribhavacittaṃ vā ākhyātaṃ votpādayati |
T06srabhusu:545: yathā atītamadhvānamupādāya evamanāgataṃ vartamānamadhvānamupādāya yāmāpattimāpanno bhavati
T06srabhusu:546: sā cānena smṛtisaṃpramoṣādekatyā na yathādharmapratikṛtā bhavati |
T06srabhusu:548: yannvahaṃ tathā tathā careyaṃ, yathā yathā caran viharaṃścāpattiṃ nādhyāpadyeya,
T06srabhusu:556: anutthānasaṃpannaḥ, na kartā bhavati vijñānāṃ sabrahmacāriṇāṃ kāyena
T06srabhusu:560: anenāhaṃ śīlena vā, bratena vā, tapasā vā, brahmacaryavāsena vā,
T06srabhusu:561: devo vā syāṃ, devānyatamo vā, lābha satkārakāmo bhavati |
T06srabhusu:566: yathāpīhaikatya īryāpathaṃ vādhiṣṭhāya itikaraṇīyambā kuśalapakṣaprayogaṃ vā lokotkrāntaśca bhavati |
T06srabhusu:570: maheccho bhavatyasaṃtuṣṭaḥ, durmoṣo, durgharajātīyaḥ [|] sa cādharmeṇa cīvaraṃ paryeṣate
T06srabhusu:573: na dharmeṇa [|] sa ca cīvarapiṇḍapātaśayanāsanaglānapratyayabhaiṣajyapariṣkārahetoḥ ātmano guṇasaṃbhāvanānimittamaprākṛtaṃ tiṭhapita mīryāpathaṃ
T06srabhusu:575: yenāsya pare guṇasaṃbhāvanā jātā dātavyaṃ kartavyaṃ manyante |
T06srabhusu:580: dharmadharo, lābhakāraṇādeva ca pareṣāṃ dharmaṃ saṃlapati,
T06srabhusu:581: śrāvakabhāṣitaṃ vā, ātmano vā guṇān, bhūtānvā ki[ñcidvā] punaḥ samāropya svayameva vaktā bhavati |
T06srabhusu:583: cīvarārthī vā, anyatamānyatamena vā śrāmaṇakena pariṣkāreṇārthī,
T06srabhusu:584: prabhūtena vā, agratareṇa vā, avihanyamāno 'pi prākṛtasya cīvarasyopadarśayitā (Śbh_Sh: 49) bhavati |
T06srabhusu:585: asyecchan śrāddhā brāhmaṇagṛhapatayaḥ cīvareṇa vighātaṃ saṃlakṣayitvā (saṃlakṣya) prabhūtaṃ praṇītaṃ cīvaraṃ dātavyaṃ kartavyaṃ maṃsyate(nte) |
T06srabhusu:586: yathā cīvaramevamanyatamānyatamaṃ śrāmaṇakaṃ jīvitapariṣkāraṃ śrāddhānāñca brāhmaṇagṛhapatīnāmantikādyathākāmaṃ vā alabhamānaḥ, asatsu vā [a]saṃvidyamāneṣu bhogeṣvalabhamāna evaṃcoparodhena yācate |
T06srabhusu:587: niṣpiṣya niṣpiyāmi (pi)caināṃ paruṣayatyapi hīnamvā punarlabdhvā tathā saṃvidyamāneṣu bhogeṣu taṃ lābhaṃ mansa (maṃsa) yatyavasādayati |
T06srabhusu:588: saṃmukhaṃ ca dātāraṃ dānapatiṃ, evaṃ cāha [|] haṃ bhoḥ, kulaputra,
T06srabhusu:589: santyeke kulaputrāḥ kuladuhitaraśca ye tavāntikā nīcakulīnatarāśca
T06srabhusu:590: [daridratarāśca] te punarevaṃ caivañca praṇītadāyino mana āpadāyinaśca |
T06srabhusu:591: kasmāttvaṃ teṣāmantikāduccakulīnatarāścānyataraśca samāna eva samanāpa (mana āpa)dāyī, nāpraṇītaparīttadāyī ceti |
T06srabhusu:593: niśritya, lapanāmvā, naimittikatāmvā, naiṣpeṣikatāmvā, lābhena lābhaṃ niścikīrṣatāṃ, cīvarapiṇḍapātaśayanāsanaglānapratyayabhaiṣajyapariṣkārān parataḥ paryeṣate |
T06srabhusu:612: iti yo vā punarapyevaṃbhāgīya ātmakaklamathānuyogaḥ ayamucyate dvitīyo [a]ntaḥ |
T06srabhusu:615: yathāpīhai katyaḥ śīlaṃ vā vratamvā dṛṣṭyā parāmṛśati |
T06srabhusu:616: anenaiva śīlena vā vratena vā śuddhirbhaviṣyati |
T06srabhusu:623: yathāpīhaikatyaḥ sarveṇa sarvamalajjī bha bhavati nirapekṣaḥ |
T06srabhusu:627: aśramaṇa[ḥ] śramaṇapratijñaḥ abrahmacārī brahmacāripratijña evaṃ samādānaparibhraṣṭaṃ bhavati
T06srabhusu:629: api ca śīlābhyasanamapyuktaṃ bhagavatā [|] da(ta)cca ebhyaḥ kāraṇebhyo dvābhyāṃ kāraṇābhyāṃ veditavyam |
T06srabhusu:630: yā cānairyāṇikatā, yaśca samādānabhraṃśaḥ tadanyaiśca kāraṇaiḥ śīlavipattireva veditavyā |
T06srabhusu:631: eṣāmeva ca kṛṣṇapakṣavyavasthitānāṃ kāraṇānāṃ viparyayeṇa śuklapakṣyaḥ kāraṇaiḥ śīlasampattirveditavyā
T06srabhusu:637: yathoktaṃ śīlālaṃkārasampanno bhikṣurvā bhikṣuṇī vā akuśalaṃ prajahāti kuśalaṃ bhāvayati |
T06srabhusu:642: asti taddānaṃ yadgandhajātaṃ yasyānuvātamapi gandho vāti prativāma(ta)mapyanuvātamapi
T06srabhusu:646: kāyasucaritasyeṣṭo vipāko (Śbh_Sh: 53) dṛṣṭe dharme abhisaṃparāye ca evaṃ vāksucaritasya [|]
T06srabhusu:659: tadyathā pṛthivī pratiṣṭhā bhavatyādhāra[stṛṇagu]lmauṣadhivanaspatīnāmutpattaye evameva śīlambistareṇa pūrvavadvācyam |
T06srabhusu:662: yāni tadanyāni bhūṣaṇāni tadyayā harṣamvā, kaṭāhā vā, keyūrā vā, mudrikā vā, jātarūparajatamālā vā tāni yāvadayaṃ dahro bhavati |
T06srabhusu:664: pratyagrayauvanasamanvāgataḥ tāvadasya vibhūṣaṇāni prāvṛtāni śobhāmātrāṃ janayanti |
T06srabhusu:665: na tvevaṃ punarjīrṇasya, vṛddhasya, mahallasyāśītikasya vā,
T06srabhusu:666: nāvatikasya vā, śaṇḍadantasya, palitaśiraso, nānyatra tairvibhūṣaṇaiḥ prāvṛtaiḥ sa viḍamvita iva khyāti |
T06srabhusu:669: śīlaṃ punaḥ sarveṣāṃ sarvakālañca śobhākāraṃ bhavati |
T06srabhusu:672: tatra bahukuśalamanavadyaṃ śīlasamādānaṃ sarvadauḥśīlyasamādānahetukaṃ kāyaparidāhaṃ cittaparidāhaṃ apanayati |
T06srabhusu:673: gharmābhitaptasya uttamagrīṣmaparidāhe kāle pratyupasthite candanānulepanaṃ vā karpūrānulepanaṃ vā anena kāraṇena śīlamanulepanaśabdenocyate ||
T06srabhusu:675: śīlavataḥ khalu puruṣapudgalasya digvidikṣu kalyāṇaḥ (ṇaṃ) kīrttiyaśaḥ śabdaśloko niścarati
T06srabhusu:677: puṣpagandhānāmvāteritānāṃ digvidikṣu mana āpo gandho niścarati |
T06srabhusu:686: asya khalu śīlasamvarasya trividhā pratyavekṣā pariśuddhinimittaṃ [|] katamā trividhā [|] yaduta kāyakarmapratyavekṣā, vākkarmapratyavekṣā,
T06srabhusu:688: [tatra ca punaretāni] karmāṇi pratyavekṣamāṇa[ḥ] śīlasamvaraṃ pariśodhayati |
T06srabhusu:689: yatkarma kāyena praṇihitaṃ bhavati karttuṃ tadeva pratyavekṣate |
T06srabhusu:690: kinnu vyābādhikaṃ me etat kārya karma ātmanā antarāyaḥ
T06srabhusu:691: pareṣā[maku]śalaṃ duḥkhodayaṃ duḥkhavipākamāhosvidavyābādhikaṃ me etat kāyakarmātmanaḥ pareṣāṃ kuśalaṃ sukhodayaṃ sukhavipākaṃ sa cetsa evaṃ
T06srabhusu:692: pratyavekṣamāṇo jānāti vyābādhikaṃ me etatkāyakarmātmano vā, parasya vā akuśalaṃ [rāgodayaṃ, rāgavipākaṃ, sa cetsa evaṃ pratyavekṣamāṇo na ca]rati
T06srabhusu:695: sa cetpunarjānātyavyābādhikaṃ me etat kāyakarma kuśalaṃ pūrvavata sa karoti |
T06srabhusu:701: sa vijñānāṃ sabrahmacāriṇāṃ sacet sa e[vaṃ]
T06srabhusu:702: pratyavekṣamāṇo [jānāti vyābādhikaṃ] me etat karma pūrvavat |
T06srabhusu:706: tadapyabhīkṣṇaṃ pratyavekṣate [|] kinnu vyābādhikaṃ me etat pūrvavat |
T06srabhusu:707: savijñānāṃ sabrahmacāriṇā[mantike] sacet sa evaṃ pratyavekṣamāṇo jānāti vyābādhikaṃ me etat karma pūrvavat [|] sa vijñānāṃ sabrahmacāriṇāmantike
T06srabhusu:709: sa cet punarevaṃ pratyavekṣamāṇo jānātyavyābādhikaṃ me etat kāyakarma pūrvavat [|] sa tenaiva prītiprāmodyenāhorātrānuśikṣī bahulamviharatyevamasya tatkāyakarma
T06srabhusu:712: yadutātītānāgatapratyutpanneṣvadhvasu [|] yathā kāyakarma evaṃ vākkarma veditavyaṃ |
T06srabhusu:717: pratyavekṣate [|] kinnu vyābādhikaṃ me etanmanaḥ pūrvavat |
T06srabhusu:727: tatkasya hetoratīte [a]pyadhvani anāgate [a]pipratyutpanne [a]pi ye kecicchramaṇā vā, brāhmaṇā vā, kāyakarma, vākkakarma, manaskarma pratyavekṣya pariśodhya, pariśodhya, bahulaṃ vyāhārṣuḥ, sarve te evaṃ
T06srabhusu:728: pratyavekṣya, pariśodhya ca [|] yathoktaṃ bhagavatā āyuṣmantaṃ
T06srabhusu:733: atra te śikṣamāṇasya śreya eva na pāpakam ||
T06srabhusu:734: tatra yadevaṃ vicinoti tat kāyakarma, vākkakarma, manaskarma kiṃ vyābādhikaṃ me iti vistareṇa (Śbh_Sh: 58) pūrvavadiyaṃ pratyave[kṣaṇā] [|]
T06srabhusu:739: iha śīlavāṃ (vān) viharati puruṣapudgalaḥ śīlaviśuddhimātmanaḥ (Śbh_Sh: 60) pratyavekṣamāṇaḥ
T06srabhusu:753: punaraparaṃ śīlavāṃ (vān) puruṣapudgalaḥ maraṇakālasamaye pratyupasthite, kṛtaṃ etanme sūktaṃ ta [......] (sucaritaṃ) kāyena vācā manasā na kṛtaṃ etanme
T06srabhusu:756: kṛtapuṇyānāṃ kṛtakuśalānāṃ kṛtabhayabhīrūprāṇānāṃ tāṃ gatiṃ pretya gamiṣyāmīti dvitīyamavipratisāraṃ pratilabhate (|) sugatigamanāya, avipratisāriṇo hi puruṣapudgalasya
T06srabhusu:763: punaraparaṃ śīlavān puruṣapudgalaḥ sukhaṃ svapiti sukhaṃ pratiyujyate |
T06srabhusu:764: niṣparidāhena kāyena cittena cāyaṃ caturthaḥ śīlānuśansaḥ (śaṃsaḥ) |
T06srabhusu:765: punaraparaṃ śīlavāṃ (vān) puruṣapudgalaḥ supto [a]pi devānāṃ rakṣyo bhavati |
T06srabhusu:767: punaraparaṃ śīlavān puruṣapudgalaḥ na śaṃkī bhavati |
T06srabhusu:768: parataḥ pāpasya, na bhīteśca saṃtrastamānasaḥ [|] ayaṃ ṣaṣṭhaḥ śīlānuśansaḥ (śaṃsaḥ) ||
T06srabhusu:771: sarvadāyaṃ puruṣapudgala iti viditvā mitratāmvāpadyante (te) madhyamasthatāmvā[|]ayaṃ saptamaḥ śīlānuśansaḥ ||
T06srabhusu:772: punaraparaṃ pūrvabahvāsthānānāṃ yakṣāṇāṃ nivāsikānāmamanuṣyāṇāṃ chidraprāpto [a]pi rakṣyo bhavati |
T06srabhusu:775: punaraparaṃ śīlavān puruṣapudgalaḥ dharmeṇālpakṛcchreṇa parato lābhaṃ labhante (labhate) |
T06srabhusu:778: gurukṛto rājñāṃ rājāmātrāṇāṃ naigamajānapadānāṃ dhanināṃ śreṣṭhināṃ sārthavāhānāṃ [|] ayaṃ navamaḥ śīlānuśansaḥ (śaṃsaḥ) ||
T06srabhusu:782: vā) devānāṃ, trā (tra)yastriṃśānāmvā, yāmānāṃ, tuṣitānāṃ, nirmāṇaratīnāṃ,
T06srabhusu:784: yathāpi tadviśuddhatvācchīlānāṃ samadānāṃ atyarthajātaṃ dhyānāni ca samāpadya dṛṣṭe dharme sukhaṃ vihareyaṃ |
T06srabhusu:785: rūpopamānāṃ ca devānāṃ sabhāgatāyopapadyeya (yāmupasampadyeya) vihare[ya eta]dyaśa etacca śīlavato vītarāgasya praṇidhānaṃ samṛdhyati |
T06srabhusu:790: śuddhatvācchīlānāṃ (Śbh_Sh: 63) sarvatra ca vītarāgasya [|] ayaṃ daśamaḥ śīlānuśaṃso veditavyaḥ
T06srabhusu:794: sa eṣa sarvākāraparipūrṇaḥ śīlasamvaraḥ saṃbhāraparigṛhīta ākhyātaḥ kathimo (to) vivṛtaḥ prakāśito yatrātmakāmaiḥ śrāmaṇyabrāhmaṇyakāmaiḥ kulaputraiḥ śikṣitavyaṃ ||
T06srabhusu:803: nipakasmṛtiriti vistareṇa yāvadrarakṣati mana indriyaṃ mana indriyeṇa [|]
T06srabhusu:809: tena ca śrutacintābhāvanādhipateyā smṛtiḥ pratilabdhā bhavati |
T06srabhusu:810: (Śbh_Sh: 65) sa tasyā eva smṛteḥ pratilabdhāyāḥ asaṃpramoṣārthamadhigamārthamavināśārthaṃ kālena kālaṃ tasminneva śrute yogaṃ karotyabhyāsaṃ karoti, cintāyāṃbhāvanāyāṃ yogamabhyāsaṃ karoti |
T06srabhusu:811: na bhavati sa sta prayogā yi-kṛta prayoga evamanena tasyā[ḥ] śrutasamudāgamatā(gatā) yāścintā-samudāgatāyāḥ smṛteḥ kālena kālaṃ śrutacintābhāvanāyogakriyāyā ārakṣā kṛtā bhavati |
T06srabhusu:814: sa tasyāmeva smṛtau nityakārī ca bhavati |
T06srabhusu:823: yena śakto bhavati pratibalaśca rūpāṇāmabhibhavāya śabdānāṃ, gandhānāṃ,
T06srabhusu:828: vikalpakaṃ manovijñānaṃ yena vikalpakena manovijñānena priyarūpeṣu rūpeṣu saṃrajyate |
T06srabhusu:829: apriyarūpeṣu rūpeṣu vyāpadyate [|] sa bhā (tā)mevādhipatiṃ kṛtvā tasmādayoniśo vikalpāt saṃkleśasamutthāpakāttasmāt saṃrakṣati |
T06srabhusu:831: evaṃ śrotraṃ ghrāṇaṃ jihvāṃ kāyaṃ manaḥ pratītya dharmāścotpadyate manovijñānaṃ |
T06srabhusu:835: sa tasmādayoniśovikalpāt saṃkleśasamutthāpakāttanmānasaṃ rakṣatyevamasya saṃkleśo notpadyate
T06srabhusu:840: avyākṛtā vā [|] sa tasmādayoniśo vikalpāt saṃkleśasamutthāpakāt tanmānasaṃ rakṣitvā kuśalāyāmvā upekṣāyāmavyākṛtāyāmvā avacārayati |
T06srabhusu:849: sa cet punaḥ smṛtisaṃpramoṣāt kleśapracuratayā vā vivarjayato [a]pi nimittagrāhama(ho
T06srabhusu:855: kathaṃ ca punastanmānasamābhyāmākārābhyāṃ saraṃkṣya kuśalāyāmvā upekṣāyāmavadhārayatyavyā kṛtāyāmvā [|] dvābhyāmevākārābhyāṃ [|]
T06srabhusu:856: katamābhyāṃ dvābhyāṃ [|] yathāha rakṣati cakṣurindriyaṃ cakṣurindriyeṇa samvaramāpadyate |
T06srabhusu:858: me (e)vaṃ śrotraghrāṇajihvākāyāṃ (yān), rakṣati mana indriyaṃ mana indriyeṇa samvaramāpadyate
T06srabhusu:862: kathaṃ cakṣurvijñeyeṣu rūpeṣu na nimittagrāhī bhavati |
T06srabhusu:864: yaccakṣurvijñānagocaro rūpe tasya gocarasya grāhī bhavati |
T06srabhusu:866: yaduta cakṣurvijñeyeṣu rūpeṣu śrotraghrāṇajih vākāyamanovijñeyeṣu rūpeṣu aparā jāti[r] nimittaṃ
T06srabhusu:873: yasteṣvevacakṣurvijñeyeṣu rūpeṣu cakṣurvijñānasyaiva samanantarasahotpannasya vikalpakasya manovijñānasya yo gocaraḥ saṃrāgāya vā, saṃdveṣāya, vā saṃmohāya vā taṃ gocaraṃ parivarjayati notpādayati tadālambanaṃ |
T06srabhusu:875: yaduta cakṣurvijñeyeṣu rūpeṣu [|] evaṃ śrotraghrāṇajih vākāyamanovijñeyeṣu dharmeṣu aparā jātirnimittagrāhasyānuvyaṃjanagrāhasya ca |
T06srabhusu:876: tatra nimittagrāho yaccakṣuṣā rupāṇyābhāsagatāni tajjaṃ manaskāraṃ saṃmukhīkṛtya paśyati [|]
T06srabhusu:878: tānyeva rūpāṇi cakṣuṣā ābhāsagatāni tajjaṃ manasikāraṃ saṃmukhīkṛtya paśyati |
T06srabhusu:881: santyevaṃ rūpāṇyevaṃ rūpāṇi cakṣurvijñeyāni rūpāṇīti yāni tāni tadanugatāni nāmāni padāni vyaṃjanāni [yānya]dhipatiṃ
T06srabhusu:882: kṛtvā, yāni niśritya pratiṣṭhāyāyaṃ puruṣapudgalaḥ yathāśrutāni cakṣurvijñeyāni rūpāṇi vikalpayatyayamucyate |
T06srabhusu:883: anuvyaṃjanagrāhaḥ [|] yathā cakṣurvijñeyeṣu rūpeṣu, evaṃ śrotraghrāṇajih vākāyamanovijñeyeṣu dharmeṣu veditavyaḥ |
T06srabhusu:884: sa punarayaṃ nimittagrāho [a]nuvyaṃjanagrāhaśca asti yannidānamasya yadadhikaraṇaṃ yadadhipateyaṃ asya pāpakā akuśalā dharmāścittamanusravanti |
T06srabhusu:885: asti yacca tannidānaṃ ca tadadhikaraṇaṃ ca tadadhipateyaṃ pāpakā akuśalā dharmā ścittamanusravanti
T06srabhusu:890: pāpakā akuśalā dharmāḥ katame [|] rāgaḥ, rāgasamutthāpitaṃ kāyaduścaritaṃ,
T06srabhusu:892: dveṣo, mohaḥ [|], mohasamutthāpitaṃ ca kāyaduścaritaṃ, vāgduścaritaṃ, manoduścaritamima ucyante pāpakā akuśalā dharmāḥ |
T06srabhusu:897: tadālambanāstadālambanāstena cittamanovijñānena saṃprayuktāḥ [ḥ] kāyavāṅmanoduścaritasamutthāpakā[s] te rāgadveṣamohā utpadyante, gacchanti pratisaranti |
T06srabhusu:901: notpadyate nimittagrāhamanuvyaṃjanagrāhaṃ ca parivarjayataḥ [|] sa cet punaḥ smṛtisaṃpramoṣādvā, kleśapracuratayā vā, ekākino [a]pi viharataḥ pūrvadṛṣṭāni cakṣurvijñeyāni rūpāṇyadhipatiṃ kṛtvā pūrvānubhūtāṃ (tān)
T06srabhusu:902: śrotraghrāṇajihvākāyamanovijñeyān dharmānadhipatiṃ kṛtvotpadyante pāpakā akuśalā dharmā[s] tānutpannānadhivāsayati, prajahāti, viśodhayati,
T06srabhusu:905: sa yeṣu rūpeṣu cakṣuḥ prerayitavyaṃ bhavati |
T06srabhusu:906: yeṣu śrotraghrāṇajih vākāyamanovijñeyeṣu dharmeṣu manaḥ prerayitavyaṃ (Śbh_Sh: 71) bhavati
T06srabhusu:911: | yeṣu punaścakṣurvijñeyeṣu rūpeṣu cakśurindriyaṃ na prerayitavyaṃ bhavati
T06srabhusu:912: | yeṣu śrotraghrāṇajih vākāyamanovijñeyeṣu dha[rmeṣu] mana indriyaṃ na
T06srabhusu:914: teṣu sarveṇa sarvaṃ sarvathā na prerayati |
T06srabhusu:919: yena ca saṃvṛṇoti, yataśca saṃvṛṇoti, yathā ca saṃvṛṇoti, yā cāsau saṃvṛtiḥ |
T06srabhusu:921: tatra kena saṃvṛṇoti [|] yā ārakṣitā ca smṛtistayā saṃvṛṇoti [|]
T06srabhusu:943: nipakasmṛtiriti cakṣuṣā rūpāṇi dṛṣṭvā na nimittagrāhī bhavati,
T06srabhusu:944: nānuvyaṃjanagrāhī, yāvanmanasā dharmān vijñāya na nimittagrāhī bhavati,
T06srabhusu:950: samvaraṇīyaṃ vastu katamat [|] cakṣūrūpaṃ caivaṃ yāvanmanodharmāścedamucyate samvaraṇīyaṃ vastu |
T06srabhusu:957: tatra pratisaṃkhyānabala saṃgṛhīto yena viṣyeṣvādīnavaṃ paśyati |
T06srabhusu:960: tatra [bhā]vanābalasaṃgṛhīto yena viṣyeṣvādīnavaṃ paśyati, taṃ ca punarādīnavaṃ vyapakarṣati
T06srabhusu:962: tatra pratisaṃkhyānabalasaṃgṛhītenendriyasamvareṇa viṣayālambanaṃ kleśaparyavasthānaṃ notpādayati, na saṃmukhīkaroti |
T06srabhusu:966: bhāvanābalasaṃgṛhīte[ne]ndriyasamvareṇa viṣayālambanaṃ ca kleśaparyavasthānaṃ notpādayati, na sammukhīkaroti |
T06srabhusu:977: (Śbh_Sh: 74) na dravārthaṃ, na maṇḍanārthaṃ, na vibhūṣaṇārthamiti vistareṇa pūrvavat |
T06srabhusu:982: yaduta yasyaiva kabaḍaṃkārasya paribhogānvayo vā, vipariṇāmānvayo vā, paryeṣaṇānvayo vā |
T06srabhusu:985: supraṇītamapi [|] tasya kabaḍaṃkāra āhāraḥ samanantarakṣipta eva āsye yadā
T06srabhusu:989: sa yāsau pūrvikā, purāṇā manāpatā (na āpatā) tāṃ sarveṇa sarvaṃ vijahāti |
T06srabhusu:992: tadavasthaṃ cainaṃ sa cedayaṃ bhoktā puruṣapudgalaḥ sa cedākārato manasi kuryāt samanusmarennāsya sarveṇa sarvamanyatrāpi tāvadavipariṇate,
T06srabhusu:994: kaḥ punarvādastatra tadavastha iti ya ebhirākauraranekavidhairanayānupūrvyā bhojanaparibhogamadhipatiṃ kṛtvā yāsau śubhā varṇanibhā antarīyate, ādīnavaśca prādurbhavati aśū(śu)cisaṃgṛhītaḥ [|] ayamucyate paribhogānvayaḥ |
T06srabhusu:998: tasya tamāhāramāhṛtavatastu [ṣṭava] taḥ yadā vipariṇamati rātryā madhyame vā yāme, paścime vā yāme,
T06srabhusu:1006: hasto (tau) vā pādo (dau) vā, anyatamā nyatamajvā (maṃvā) aṃgapratyaṃgaṃ, bahirdhā gupyanīyaṃ (gopanīyaṃ) bhavatyātmanaḥ pareṣāṃ ca (|) tannidānāścāsyotpadyante |
T06srabhusu:1009: kaṇḍū[ḥ], kuṣṭhaḥ, kiṭibhaḥ, kivāso (kilāso), jvaraḥ kāsaḥ śothaḥ,
T06srabhusu:1011: pittabhagandara itīme cānye bhairaṃbhagaṃyā ([a]pyevaṃbhāgīyāḥ) kāye kāyikā ābādhā utpadyante
T06srabhusu:1022: tatra katama ādīnava āhāre [|] samudānanā kṛtaḥ [|] yathāpīhaikatyaḥ āhārahetorāhāranidānaṃ śīte śītena hanyamānaḥ, uṣṇe uṣṇena hanyamānaḥ,
T06srabhusu:1024: kṛṣiṇā vā, gorakṣyeṇa vā, vāṇijyena vā,
T06srabhusu:1026: śilpasthānakarmasthānenāpratilabdhasya vāhārasya pratilambhāya, upacayāya vā [|] yathā āhārasye (syai)vamāhāranidānasya [|] tasyaivamutsahato,
T06srabhusu:1027: ghaṭata(to), vyāyacchata (ḥ), sa cette karmāntā vipadyante |
T06srabhusu:1028: sa taṃ nidānaṃ (tannidānaṃ) śocati klāmyati, paridevate |
T06srabhusu:1032: ayamu(yaṃ samu)dānanā sahagataḥ ādīnavo yaduta āhāre [|]
T06srabhusu:1034: kaccinme bhogā rājñā vā apahriyeraṃścaurairvā, agninā vā dahyerannudakena
T06srabhusu:1036: kuniha(hi)tā vā nidhayaḥ praṇaśyeyuḥ (Śbh_Sh: 79) kuprayuktā vā karmāntāḥ pralujyeran, apriyo(yā)vā dāyādā adhigaccheyuḥ |
T06srabhusu:1041: putro mātyaḥ (mātuḥ), pitā putrasya, putro (traḥ) pituḥ, bhrātā bhaginyā,
T06srabhusu:1053: mūrddhābhiṣiktāḥ, sveṣu grāmanigamarāṣṭrarājadhānīṣu asaṃtuṣṭā viharanta ubhayato [a]bhyūhakāni saṃgrāmānīkāni pratisaranti |
T06srabhusu:1055: kampa(mpya)mānaiḥ, paṭāhairvādyamānaiḥ, iṣubhiḥ kṣipyamāṇairvividhaiste tatra bhrāntenāśvena sārdhaṃ samāgacchanti || bhrāntena hastinā, sthena,
T06srabhusu:1060: atṛptikṛta ādīnava iti yo vā punarapyevaṃbhāgīyaḥ ||
T06srabhusu:1069: ayamucyate asvātantrayakṛta ādīnava iti yo vā punarapyevaṃbhāgīyaḥ |
T06srabhusu:1070: tatra [katamo] duścaritakṛta ādīnavaḥ [|] yathāpi tadekatyenāhāranidānaṃ prabhūtaṃ kāyena duścaritaṃ kṛtaṃ bhavatyupacitaṃ, yathā kāyenaivamvācā,
T06srabhusu:1071: manasā [|] sa ca ya(thā kā)ya ābādhiko bhavati, duḥkhito, bāḍhaglānaḥ,
T06srabhusu:1072: tasya tatpūrvakaṃ kāyaduścaritaṃ vāṅmanoduścarita(taṃ), parvatānāṃ vā parvatakūṭānāmvā, sāyāhne [yā]cchayā(cchāyā) avalambate |
T06srabhusu:1077: pāpaṃ, na kṛtaṃ bata me puṇyaṃ, kāyena vācā, manasā, (Śbh_Sh: 81) so
T06srabhusu:1078: [a]haṃ yā gati[ḥ] kṛtapāpānāṃ [tāṃ] gatiṃ pretya gamiṣyāmīti |
T06srabhusu:1087: evamasti punarasyāhārasya kācidanuśansa (śaṃsa)mātrā sā punaḥ katamā |
T06srabhusu:1091: evamāhārasthitiko [a]yaṃ kāyaṃ(ḥ) suciramapi tiṣṭhan varṣaśatamvā tiṣṭhati
T06srabhusu:1094: tatra yaḥ (ye) kāyasthitimātre pratipannāḥ na te supratipannā[ḥ] kāye kāyasthitimātrakena (ṇa) saṃtuṣṭā na (na) te asaṃtuṣṭā, na ca punaste
T06srabhusu:1097: na te supratipannā, api tu tāmeva kāyasthitiṃ (Śbh_Sh: 82) niściṃ[tya]
T06srabhusu:1098: (niśritya) brahmacaryaṃ (rya)samudāgamāya pratipannāḥ, supratipannāḥ, ta eva ca punaḥ paripūrṇamanavadyamanuśansaṃ (śaṃsaṃ) pratyanubhavanti |
T06srabhusu:1099: tanme pratimaṃ syād yada(d)vā pratyavareṇa āhārānuśansa (śaṃsa)mātrakeṇa
T06srabhusu:1101: na me pratirūpaṃ syādyadahaṃ bālasabhāgatāṃ bālasahadhārmikatāmadhyāpadyeyamevamāhāre sarvākāraṃ paripūrṇamādīnavaṃ jñātvā sa itaḥ pratisaṃkhyāyādīnava darśī, niḥsaraṇānveṣī cāhāraniḥsaraṇārthameva putramāṃ(mān) so dharmamāhāramāharati |
T06srabhusu:1107: [a]nukampāmupādāya viśeṣaphalārthinaḥ tasyāsmākaṃ tathā pratilabdhasya piṇḍapātasyāyamevaṃ rūpo [a]nurūpaḥ paribhogaḥ syādyadahaṃ tathā
T06srabhusu:1108: paribhūtamātmānaṃ (|) sthāpayitvā paribhuṃjīya, yathā teṣāṃ kārāḥ kṛtā atyarthaṃ mahāphalā[ḥ] syurmahānuśaṃsā, mahādyubha(ta)yo, mahāvistārāḥ,
T06srabhusu:1109: candropamaśca kulānyupasaṃkrameyaṃ vyavakṛṣya kāyaṃ, vyavakṛṣya cittaṃ,
T06srabhusu:1110: hrīmānapragalbhaḥ, anātmotkarṣī aparapansī, (Śbh_Sh: 83) yathāsvena lābhena citta (sucittaḥ) syāṃ, sumanāḥ, evaṃ parasyāpi lābhena citta
T06srabhusu:1111: (sucittaḥ) syāṃ sumanā, evaṃ cittaśca punaḥ kulānyusaṃkrameyaṃ |
T06srabhusu:1112: tatkuta etallabhyaṃ pravrajitena parakuleṣu yadvadatra pare me māna (naṃ) dadatu |
T06srabhusu:1113: satkṛtya, mā asatkṛtya, prabhūtaṃ mā stokaṃ, praṇītaṃ mā lūhaṃ, tvarita[ṃ]
T06srabhusu:1115: evaṃ caritasya me kulānyusaṃkramataḥ sa cet pare na dadyustenāhaṃ na teṣāmantike āghātacittatayā pratighacittatayā vyavadīyeyaṃ |
T06srabhusu:1116: na ca punastannidānaṃ kāyasya bhedādapāyopapattyā vighātamāpadyeya (yaṃ) |
T06srabhusu:1118: [pratighacittā]madhipatiṃ kṛtvā sa cedasatkṛtya na satkṛtya, sa cetstokaṃ na prabhūtaṃ
T06srabhusu:1119: sa cellūhaṃ na praṇītaṃ, sa cedvaddhaṃ na tvaritaṃ dadyuḥ |
T06srabhusu:1122: imaṃ cāhaṃ kabaḍīkāramāhāraṃ niśritya tathā tathā
T06srabhusu:1124: yena me jīvitendriyanirodhaśca na syānnaca piṇḍakena klāmyeyaṃ |
T06srabhusu:1125: brahmacaryānugrahaśca me syādevaṃ ca me śrava(ma)ṇabhāve, pravrajitabhāve sthitasyāyaṃ piṇḍapātaparibhogarūpaśca
T06srabhusu:1128: āhāraḥ punaḥ katamaḥ [|] catvāra āhārāḥ [|] kabaḍaṃkāraḥ, sparśo,
T06srabhusu:1130: sa punaḥ katamastadyathā manthā vāpūpā vā odanakulmāṣamvā, sarpistailaṃ,
T06srabhusu:1131: phaṇitaṃ, māṃsaṃ, matsyā, vallūrā, lavaṇaṃ, kṣīraṃ, dadhi,
T06srabhusu:1132: navanītamitīmāni cānyāni caivaṃ rūpāṇyupakaraṇāni yāni kabaḍāni (Śbh_Sh:
T06srabhusu:1145: paricārayan (nta), auddhatyaṃ dravaṃ prāviṣkariṣyāma iti [|] drava eṣa ārye dharmavinaye yadutakāmarāgopasaṃhitā, maithunopasaṃhitā[ḥ] pāpakā akuśalā dharmā, vitarkā, yairayaṃ khādyamāno, bādhyamāna, uddhatendriyo
T06srabhusu:1150: na tathā yathā te kāmopabhogino bhuṃjante |
T06srabhusu:1151: tenāha- na dravārthaṃ na madārthaṃ, na maṇḍanārthaṃ na vibhūṣaṇārthamiti |
T06srabhusu:1152: yathāpi ta eva kāmopabhogina ityartha māhāramāharanti |
T06srabhusu:1153: adya vayamāhāramāhṛtavanto yaduta prabhūtañca tṛptito yathāśaktyābalaṃ |
T06srabhusu:1154: snigdhaṃ ca, vṛṣyañca, bṛṃhaṇīyañca, varṇasaṃpannaṃ, gandhasampannaṃ,
T06srabhusu:1158: pratibalā, vyāyāmakaraṇo (ṇā), yaduta atartkāyā (ātatīkriyayā) vā, nirghātena, vyāyāmaśilayā (Śbh_Sh: 87) vā, ulloṭhanene
T06srabhusu:1159: (na) vā, pṛthivīkhātena vā, bāhuvyāyāmena vā, pādāvaṣṭambhanena vā,
T06srabhusu:1160: plavanena vā, (a)laṃghanena vā [|] tatra vyāyāmena bāha(hu)ñca
T06srabhusu:1163: cārogāḥ, cirakālaṃ cāsmākaṃ yauvanamanuvartakaṃ bhaviṣyati, no tu tvaritaṃ
T06srabhusu:1184: madhyāhnasamaye, sāyāhna samaye vā, bhaktasamaye tṛṣitā bubhukṣitāśca,

T06srabhusu:2341: pittamvā, śleṣmamvā (ṣma vā), viṣūcikā vāsya kāye santiṣṭhate [|] api tvasya daśati vṛściko vā, śatapadī vā, manuṣyo vainaṃ viheṭhayatyamanuṣyo
T06srabhusu:2342: vā [|] na ca lābhī bhavati cīvarapiṇḍapātaśayanāsanaglānapratyayabhaiṣajyapariṣkārāṇāmayamevaṃbhāgīyaḥ prayogāntarāyo veditavyaḥ |
T06srabhusu:2355: pānakathāṃ vā, vastukathāṃ vā, veśyākathāṃ vā, vīthīkathāmvā
T06srabhusu:2356: janapadamahāmātrākhyānakathāmvā, samudrākhyānakathāmvā [|] ityevaṃ bhāgīyayā anarthopasaṃhitayā kathayā kālamatināmayati |
T06srabhusu:2366: idamevaṃbhāgīyo (ima evaṃ bhāgīyā) dharmāḥ pravivekāntarāyo veditavyaḥ |
T06srabhusu:2367: yaiḥ samavahitaiḥ saṃmukhībhūtairna sukaraṃ bhavatyaraṇyavanaprasthāni prāntāni śayanāsanānyadhyāvasituṃ
T06srabhusu:2368: araṇyāni vā vṛkṣamūlāni (Śbh_Sh: 147) vā śūnyāgārāṇi vā [|]
T06srabhusu:2374: yathāsya pramattasya styānamiddhaṃ vā cittaṃ paryavanahati |
T06srabhusu:2389: evamāḍhyakulapravrajitaḥ, adīnaḥ, evamabhirūpo darśanīyaḥ, prāsādika, evaṃ
T06srabhusu:2391: evamahamasmin kalyāṇavākyo vākkaraṇenopetaḥ, anye ca bhikṣavo na tatheti |
T06srabhusu:2398: sthavirā, ratijñā, abhyavatīrṇabrahmacaryāḥ, (Śbh_Sh: 148) tānna kālena kālaṃ paripṛcchati
T06srabhusu:2400: te cāsya na kālena kālamavivṛtāni ca sthānāni vivṛṇvanti |
T06srabhusu:2403: sādhu ca suṣṭhu ca prajñayā pratividhya saṃprakāśayanti yāvadeva jñānadarśanasya viśuddhaye
T06srabhusu:2411: sa ātmānaṃ saṃpragṛhṇaṃstāvatā saṃtuṣṭo bhavati nottari vyāyacchate |
T06srabhusu:2421: yena vipaśyanāṃ na pūrayati na viśodhayatyevamasya cāpalyaṃ |
T06srabhusu:2425: yaduta pramādaḥ, ādeśavāsaśca [|] dvau dharmau vipaśyanāntarāyau yadutātmasaṃpragrahaścāpalyañca
T06srabhusu:2441: tatra ko dadāti [kasmai dadāti kutra dadāti]kena ca dadāti |
T06srabhusu:2456: kṛpaṇā vā, adhvagā vā, yācanakā vā, andhā vā, badhirā
T06srabhusu:2457: vā, anāthā vā, apratisaraṇā vā, upakaraṇavikalā iti |
T06srabhusu:2465: sukhopadeśakā, hitasukhopasaṃhārakā, utpannotpanneṣu cādhikaraṇeṣu sahāyakāḥ, sahanandinaḥ, sahaśokā, āpatsu caivaṃ na parityajanti iti ye vā punaranye [a]pyevaṃbhāgīyā ima upakāriṇaḥ iṣṭāḥ katame [|] ye saṃstutā[ḥ] |
T06srabhusu:2468: gauravamvā, bhaktivādo vā, ālaptakāḥ, saṃstutakāḥ sapriyakāśca bhavanti |
T06srabhusu:2469: iti vā punaranye [a]pyevaṃbhāgīyā ima ucyate iṣṭāḥ ||
T06srabhusu:2476: ye vā punaranye [a]pyevaṃ bhāgīyā ima ucyante viśiṣṭāḥ ||
T06srabhusu:2484: idamapi puruṣasaṃkhyātaṃ dānaṃ yatra bodhisattvabodhāḥ saṃdṛśyante |
T06srabhusu:2500: | yadvā punaranyadapyevaṃ bhāgīyaṃ ratnamvā, hiraṇyamvā, rūpyamvā,
T06srabhusu:2501: vastramvā, bhāṇḍopaskaraṃ vā, gandhajātaṃ vā, mālyajātamvā, idamucyate dhanaṃ |
T06srabhusu:2503: yatkiṃñcid bhojyaṃ vā, peyamvā, tadyathā yavā vā,
T06srabhusu:2504: śālirvā, godhūmā vā, kolā vā, kulatthā vā, tilā vā, māṣā vā, ikṣurasamvā
T06srabhusu:2505: (so vā), mṛdvīkārasamvā (so vā), iti yadvā punarapyevaṃbhāgīyamidamucyate
T06srabhusu:2511: tatra yacca satva (sattva) saṃkhyātamvastu idaṃ dadātīti ||
T06srabhusu:2513: yā ca alobhasahagatā cetanā, cittābhisaṃskāro manaskarma |
T06srabhusu:2541: yaduta upakāriṣu premṇā, gauraveṇa, bhaktyā dadāti |
T06srabhusu:2545: ebhirākārairato 'sya gṛhiṇo vā, pravrajitasya vā cittālaṃkārārthaṃ,
T06srabhusu:2562: vimuktibahulaḥ chandikaśca kuśaleṣu dharmeṣu [|] sa śāstari prasīdati |
T06srabhusu:2569: satkṛtya, gurukṛtya, mānayitvā, pūjayitvā, niśritya, viharati |
T06srabhusu:2582: jātusukhayā yayāsyāśitapītakhāditāsvāditā[ni] samyakyukhena paripākaṃ gacchantyevamalpābādho bhavati |
T06srabhusu:2586: nikṣiptadhuraḥ kuśaleṣu dharmeṣu dakṣaśca bhavatyanalasa utthānasampannaḥ [|] karttā bhavati
T06srabhusu:2596: yāvadbhirguṇaiḥ samanvāgato bhavatyalpecchatāmādiṃ kṛtvā taiḥ parato jñātuṃ na samanveṣate
T06srabhusu:2597: kaści(cci)nme(nmāṃ) pare na jānīyuḥ, alpeccha[ṃ] iti vā evaṃ guṇayukta ityevamalpecho bhavati
T06srabhusu:2600: itaretareṣu cīvarapiṇḍapātena, śayanāsanena tuṣṭo bhavati, saṃtuṣṭaḥ, sa labdhvā cīvaraṃ lūhaṃ vā, praṇītamvā notkaṇṭhati |
T06srabhusu:2608: na tu pare tadyathā dārakā vā, manuṣyā veti |
T06srabhusu:2624: yāthāsaṃstarikaḥ [|] ta ete piṇḍapātacīvaraśayanāsanamārabhya dvādaśakā[dhuta]guṇā bhavanti
T06srabhusu:2629: (paryaṭya), yathālabdhaṃ yathopasampannaṃ piṇḍapātaṃ paribhuṃkte, no tu uccaiḥ śuṇḍāṃ praṇidhāya kulāni upasaṃkrāmati |
T06srabhusu:2631: praṇītaṃ khādanīyaṃ, bhojanīyaṃ, yāvadāptaṃ [|] tatra piṇḍapātikatvamaviśeṣeṇārabhya dvādaśa bhavanti |
T06srabhusu:2644: yataśca punarjānīte na me ata uttari bhojanena kṛtyaṃ bhaviṣyatīti |
T06srabhusu:2651: trayāṇāṃ cīvarāṇāmatirekamuttaraṃ na dhārayatyevaṃ trai[cīva]riko bhavati ||
T06srabhusu:2658: ucchiṣṭaṃ, rathyāyāmvā, vīthyāmvā, catvare vā, śrṛṃgāṭake vā, pathi vā,
T06srabhusu:2661: sāramādāya, śodhayitvā, sīvitvā, vivarṇīkṛtya dhārayatyevaṃ pānsu(pāṃsu)kūliko bhavati
T06srabhusu:2672: śmaśāne vāsaṃ kalpayati yatra mṛtamṛto janakāyaḥ |
T06srabhusu:2675: maṃce vā, pīṭhe vā, tṛṇasaṃstare vā niṣadyayā
T06srabhusu:2677: no tu maṃcā (ma caṃ)vā, pīṭhaṃ vā, kuḍyamvā,
T06srabhusu:2678: (vṛkṣamūlaṃ) vṛkṣamūlamvā, tṛṇasaṃstaramvā,parṇasaṃstaramvā, niśritya pṛṣṭha vā (pṛṣṭhaṃ vā), pārśvamvā dadātyevaṃ naiṣadyiko bhavati |
T06srabhusu:2680: yasmin tṛṇasaṃstare vā, parṇasaṃstare vā śayyāṃ kalpayati |
T06srabhusu:2685: kenaite dhutaguṇā ucyante tadyathā ūrṇā vā, karpāsaṃ vā, dhutaṃ bhavatyasaṃvṛttamiti |
T06srabhusu:2686: ta[cca ta]smin (Śbh_Sh: 161) samaye mṛdu ca bhavati
T06srabhusu:2687: | laghu ca, karmaṇyaṃ ca, yaduta sūtrābhinirhāre vā, tūlāvahade (te?)
T06srabhusu:2688: (tūlābhinirhāre) vā [|] evameva ihaikatyasya piṇḍapātarāgeṇa piṇḍapāte cittaṃ saktaṃ bhavati
T06srabhusu:2693: mṛdukarmaṇyamārjavamāsravamvidheyaṃ yaduta brahmacaryavāsāya tenocyante dhutaguṇā iti ||
T06srabhusu:2707: api ca śmāśānikatvaṃ middhena rāgasya prahāṇāya bhavati |
T06srabhusu:2709: āstaraṇapratyāstaraṇopacchāda[na]rāgasya prahāṇāya yāthāsāṃstariko bhavatyevaṃ dhutaguṇa samanvāgato bhavati |
T06srabhusu:2715: yaduta cīvara piṇḍapāta śayanāsanaglānapratyayabhaiṣajyapariṣkāraistatra pratigra[heṇa] mātrāṃ jānāti |
T06srabhusu:2718: uccakulapravrajito vā sannāḍhyakulapravrajito vā, abhirūpo vā, darśanīyaḥ, prāsādiko,
T06srabhusu:2720: anyatamānyatamasya vā jñānamātrasya darśanamātrakasparśavihāra sārthakasya lābhī sannetenātmānamutkarṣayati
T06srabhusu:2727: durbhāṣitabhāṣī, duṣkṛtakarmakārī, paṇḍitaḥ punaḥ sucintitacintī bhavati |
T06srabhusu:2739: kharāṇāṃ, kaṭukānāṃ, amana āpānāṃ prāṇahāriṇīnāṃ kṣamo bhavatyadhivāsanajātīyaḥ |
T06srabhusu:2742: yathāpi tanmaitreṇa kāya karmaṇā samanvāgato bhavati |
T06srabhusu:2743: maitreṇa vākkarmaṇā, maitreṇa manaskarmaṇā, śāsturantike vijñānāṃ ca, sabrahmacāriṇāṃ, sādhāraṇaparibhogī ca bhavatyaparibhogī ca |
T06srabhusu:2765: na sa māropikayā mithyādṛṣṭyā samanvāgato bhavati |
T06srabhusu:2773: [na te]na dayate, na tena prīyate, tena cātmadaṃ [vā]nyī (cī)varaṃ dhārayati |
T06srabhusu:2779: sāme tato nidānaṃ bhaviṣyatyanekaparyāyeṇa vyākṣepād vyāpāro vā, teṣāmvā punarvipariṇāmādanyathībhāvādutpatsyante śokaparidevaduḥkhadaurmanasyopāyāsā iti |
T06srabhusu:2783: sā (tan) me ato nidānamutpadyate dṛṣṭadhārmikaṃ vā duḥkhaṃ,
T06srabhusu:2797: buddhānāṃ ca buddhaśrāvakāṇāṃ ca, acintyamanubhāvaṃ, gaṃbhīrāṃ ca deśanāmadhimucyate |
T06srabhusu:2800: dṛṣṭvā na ca svayaṃ dṛṣṭiparāmarśasthāyī bhavatyasamaṃjasagrāhī,
T06srabhusu:2801: duḥpratiniḥsargamaṃntrī [|] sa ebhirguṇairyuktaḥ, evaṃ vihārī, evaṃ
T06srabhusu:2802: śikṣamāṇaḥ, śramaṇālaṃkāreṇālaṃkṛtaḥ śobhate, tadyathā kaścideva puruṣaḥ
T06srabhusu:2807: aṃgulimudrikayā vā, jātarūparajatamālayā (Śbh_Sh: 166) [vā |] evameva sa vividhaiḥ śramaṇālaṃkārairguṇairalaṃkṛto
T06srabhusu:2816: śraddhā aśaṭhaḥ alpābādhavīrya prajñā alpecchatā saṃtuṣṭiḥ supoṣatā [||]
T06srabhusu:2823: laukikaṃ caiva vairāgyaṃ tathā lokottareṇa ca |
T06srabhusu:2825: tatra kati pudgalā yesyāṃ naiṣkramyabhūmau yathādeśitāyāṃ yathāparikīrttitāyāṃ niṣkrāmanti
T06srabhusu:2881: yena pudgalena pūrvamanyāsu jātiṣu rāga āsevito, bhāvito, bahulīkṛtaḥ sa tena hetunā tena
T06srabhusu:2886: yena pudgalena dveṣaḥ pūrvamanyāsu jātiṣu āsevito, bhāvito, bahulīkṛtaḥ |
T06srabhusu:2887: tena hetunā tena pratyayenaitarhi dveṣaṇīye vastuni tīvradveṣaśca bhavatyāyatadveṣaśca |
T06srabhusu:2891: yena pudgalena pūrvamanyāsu jātiṣu moha āsevito, bhāvito, bahulīkṛtaḥ |
T06srabhusu:2892: tena ca hetunā tena pratyayena [|] etarhi mohanīye vastuni tīvramohaśca bhavatyāyata mohaścāyamucyate mohonmadaḥ pudgalaḥ |
T06srabhusu:2894: yena pudgalena pūrvamanyāsu jātiṣu māna āsevito, bhāvito, bahulīkṛtastena hetunā tena pratyayena [|] etarhi
T06srabhusu:2895: manyanīye(mānanīye)vastuni tīvramānaśca bhavatyāyatamānaśca || ayamucyate mānonmadaḥ pudgalaḥ
T06srabhusu:2897: yena pudgalena pūrvamanyāsu jātiṣu vitarka āsevito, bhāvito, bahulīkṛtastena ca hetunā tena ca pratyayena
T06srabhusu:2898: etarhi vitarka sthānīye vastuni tīvravitarkaśca bhavatyāyatavitarkaśca [|]
T06srabhusu:2903: dveṣo, moho, māno, vitarko nāsevito, bhāvito, bahulīkṛto, na caite dharmā
T06srabhusu:2906: tena ca pratyayena raṃjanīye vā vastuni, dveṣaṇīye vā vastuni, manyanīye
T06srabhusu:2909: | na cāsya samudācarati rāgo, yaduta tena vastunā [|] yathā rāga evaṃ
T06srabhusu:2913: yena pudgalena pūrvamanyāsu jātiṣu na rāga āsevito bhavati, bahulīkṛtaḥ |
T06srabhusu:2916: sa tena hetunā tena pratyayenaitarhi raṃjanīye vastuni samavahite, saṃmukhībhūte, adhimātre, pracure, udva(ulva)ṇe rajyaṃ rāgamutpādayati |
T06srabhusu:2963: āha [|] sa eva dharmānusārī pudgalo yasmin samaye śrāmaṇyaphalamadhigacchati |
T06srabhusu:2971: viharati, na ca sarveṇa sarvamāsravakṣayamanuprāpnotyayamucyate kāyasākṣī pudgalaḥ ||
T06srabhusu:2973: yoyaṃ pudgalastrayāṇāṃ saṃyojanānāṃ prahāṇātsatkāyadṛṣṭeḥ, śīlavrataparāmarśasya, vicikitsāyāḥ strota āpanno bhavati |
T06srabhusu:2980: yasya sakṛdāgāminaḥ pudgalasya anāgāmiphalapratipannakasya kāmāvacarāṇāṃ kleśānāmadhimātramadhyadeśāḥ prahīṇā bhavanti |
T06srabhusu:3003: 'ntarābhavaparinirvāyiṇaḥ pudgalāḥ ekatyamabhi saṃkṣipya antarāparinirvāyī pudgala ityucyate
T06srabhusu:3010: yobhisaṃskāreṇa prayatnena khedamārgaṃ saṃmukhīkṛtya tatropapannaḥ parinirvātyayamucyate sābhisaṃskāraparinirvāyī pudgalaḥ ||
T06srabhusu:3014: prathame dhyāne upapannaḥ sa na tatrastha eva parinirvāti |
T06srabhusu:3021: yo mṛdvindviyagātraḥ (gotraḥ) pudgalaḥ laukikebhyo dṛṣṭadharmasukhavihārebhyaḥ parihīyate
T06srabhusu:3024: yaduta etāmeva parihāṇimadhipatiṃ kṛtvā tanmātro vāsya kuśalapakṣo bhavati |
T06srabhusu:3025: no tu teṣāṃ teṣāṃ rātriṃdivasānāṃ kṣaṇalavamuhūrttānā (ṇā)matyayādatyarthaṃ
T06srabhusu:3034: no tvaṣṭau vimokṣān kāyena sākṣātkṛtyopasampadya viharati |
T06srabhusu:3048: samāpattiprabhedena upapattiprabhedena parihāṇi prabhedenā varaṇaprabhedena ca ||
T06srabhusu:3056: yoyaṃ rāgonmadaḥ pudgalaḥ sa rāgacaritaḥ [|] yo dveṣonmadaḥ sa dveṣacaritaḥ |
T06srabhusu:3065: iha rāgacaritaḥ pudgalaḥ parītte sarvanihīne raṃjanīye vastuni ghanamadhimātraṃ rāgaparyavasthānamutpādayati
T06srabhusu:3066: kaḥ punarvādo madhyapraṇīte [|] tacca punārāgaparyavasthānaṃ saṃtatyā cirakālamavasthāpayati
T06srabhusu:3072: nātyarthaṃ pareṣāṃ viheṭhanajātīyo yaduta kāyena, vācā durvivejyaśca bhavati,
T06srabhusu:3081: smitapūrvaṃgama ityevaṃbhāgīyāni rāgacāritasya pudgalasya liṃgāni veditavyāni |
T06srabhusu:3095: karkaśendriyaḥ paruṣendriyaśca bhavatyatyarthaṃ pareṣāṃ viheṭhanajātīyo bhavati |
T06srabhusu:3121: pudgalaḥ mohasthānīye vastuni parīttaṃ, ghanaṃ, prabhūtaṃ mohaparyavasthānamutpādayati |
T06srabhusu:3139: parahāyaḥ parapraṇeya ityevaṃ bhāgīyāni mohacaritasya pudgalasya liṃgāni veditavyāni ||
T06srabhusu:3141: iha mānacaritaḥ pudgalo mānasthānīye vastuni parīttepi ghanaṃ mānaparyavasthānamutpādayati
T06srabhusu:3142: kaḥ punarvādo madhyādhimātre [|] tasya ca mānaparyavasthānasya dīrghakālaṃ santatimavasthāpayati
T06srabhusu:3144: [katamāni mānacaritasya pudgalasya liṃgāni [|] iha mānacaritaḥ pudgalaḥ mānasthānīye vastuni parīttepighanaṃ mānaparyavasthānamutpādayati kaḥ punarvādo madhyādhimātre |
T06srabhusu:3150: bhavatyunnatendriyaśco[nnatendriyaśca] kāyamaṇḍanānuyuktaśca bhavatyadhimātramunnatāñca vācaṃ bhāṣate, nāvanatāṃ,
T06srabhusu:3151: sātāpikagurusthānīyānāṃ ca na kālena kālaṃ yathārūpāmapacitiṃ kartā bhavati |
T06srabhusu:3153: apraṇatakāyo nābhi vādanavandanapratyutthānānāṃ jālisāmīcīkarmaśīla, ātmapragrāhako bhavatyātmotkarṣo parapaṃsakaḥ |
T06srabhusu:3158: upanāhī cetyevaṃbhāgīyāni mānacaritasya pudgalasya liṃgāni veditavyāni ||
T06srabhusu:3160: iha vitarkacaritaḥ pudgalaḥ vitarka sthānīye vastuni parīttepi ghanaparyavasthānamutpādayati
T06srabhusu:3179: lokacitreṣu chandarāgānusṛtaḥ [|] dakṣonalasa ityevaṃ bhāgīyāni vitarkacaritasya pudgalasya liṃgāni veditavyāni || idaṃ caritaprabhedena pudgalavyavasthānaṃ veditavyam ||
T06srabhusu:3181: asti pudgalaḥ śrāvakayāne kṛtapraṇidhānaḥ [|] asti pratyekabuddhayāne [|] asti mahāyāne [|] tatra yoyaṃ pudgalaḥ |
T06srabhusu:3184: tatrayoyaṃ pudgalaḥ pratyekāyāṃ bodhau kṛtapraṇidhānaḥ so 'pi syātpratyekabuddhagotraḥ,
T06srabhusu:3185: syācchāvakagotraḥ, syānmahāyānagotraḥ [|] tatra yoyaṃ pudgalo mahāyāne kṛtapraṇidhānaḥ so 'pi syāchrāvakagotraḥ, syātpratyekabuddhagotraḥ,
T06srabhusu:3189: sa śrāvakagotratvādavaśyamante kāle tatpraṇidhānaṃ (Śbh_Sh: 190) vyāvartyaṃ śrāvakayānapraṇidhāna evāvatiṣṭhate |
T06srabhusu:3194: śrāvakagotrāścaite pudgalā veditavyāḥ || evaṃ praṇidhānaprabhedena pudgalavyavasthānaṃ bhavati ||
T06srabhusu:3196: eṣāṃ yathoddiṣṭānāṃ yathāparikīrttitānāṃ pudgalānāṃ catasṛbhiḥ pratipadbhirniryāṇaṃ bhavati
T06srabhusu:3199: asti pratipatsukhā dhandhābhijñā asti pratipatsukhā kṣiprābhijñā || tasya mṛdvindriyasya pudgalasya mauladhyānalābhino yā pratipadiyamucyate duḥkhā dhandhābhijñā |
T06srabhusu:3200: tatra tīkṣṇendriyasya pudgalasya mauladhyānalābhino yā pratipadiyamucyate duḥkhā kṣiprābhijñā
T06srabhusu:3201: tatra mṛdvindriyasya pudgalasya mauladhyānalābhino yā pratipadiyamucyate sukhā dhandhābhijñā
T06srabhusu:3202: tatra tīkṣṇendrisya pudgalasya mauladhyānalābhino yā pratipadiyamucyate sukhā kṣiprābhijñā
T06srabhusu:3207: caturṇāṃ pratipannakānāṃ strota āpattiphalapratipannakasya sakṛdāgāmiphalapratipannakasya anāgāmiphalapratipannakasya, arhatta(arhattva)phalapratipannakasya,
T06srabhusu:3214: tadyathā śraddhānusāridharmānusāriṇā [|] yaḥ pudgalaḥ śraddhānusāreṇa prayuktaḥ |
T06srabhusu:3215: sa śraddhānusārī, yo dharmeṣu parapratyayavinayānusāreṇa prayuktaḥ sa dharmānusārī |
T06srabhusu:3218: tadyathā kāyasākṣiṇaḥ (sākṣī) aṣṭau vimokṣān kāyena sākṣātkṛtyopasampadya viharati |
T06srabhusu:3236: tadyathā samayavimuktasyārhataḥ yo bhavyo dṛṣṭadharmasukhavihārebhyaḥ parihāṇāya,
T06srabhusu:3238: bhavyo dṛṣṭadharmasukhavihārebhyaḥ parihāṇāya [|] eva maparihāṇiprabhedena pudgalavyavasthānaṃ bhavati |
T06srabhusu:3245: evamāvaraṇaprabhedena pudgalavyavasthānaṃ bhavatyebhistribhirbhedairyayoddiṣṭairyathoddiṣṭānāṃ pudgalānāṃ yathākramaṃ vyavasthānaṃ veditavyam ||
T06srabhusu:3255: tadyathā savikalpaṃ pratibimbaṃ, nirvikalpaṃ pratibimbaṃ, vastuparīttatā |
T06srabhusu:3258: yathāpīhaikatyaḥ saddharmaśravaṇaṃ vā avavādānuśāsanīmvā niśritya, dṛṣṭamvā, śrutamvā, parikalpitaṃ vopādāya jñeyavastusabhāgaṃ sa vikalpaṃ pratibimbaṃ samāhitabhūmikai rvipaśyanākārairvipaśyati vicinoti |
T06srabhusu:3262: tatra jñeyamvastu [|] tadyathā aśubhā vā, maitrī vā, (Śbh_Sh: 194)
T06srabhusu:3271: vā, tanniśrayeṇa samāhitabhūmikaṃ manaskāraṃ saṃmukhīkṛtya, tāneva dharmānadhimucyate |
T06srabhusu:3273: sa tasmin samaye pratyakṣānubhāvika iti vā[dhi]mokṣaḥ pravarttate |
T06srabhusu:3279: sa tādṛśā(śo) manaskārānubhavaḥ samāhitabhūmiko, yena tasya jñeyasya
T06srabhusu:3280: vastunaḥ anusadṛśaṃ tad bhavati (|) pratibhāsaṃ, yena taducyate |
T06srabhusu:3283: santīrayaṃstasmin prakṛte, jñeye vastuni parīkṣya guṇadoṣāvadhāraṇaṃ karoti |
T06srabhusu:3286: ihāyaṃ yogī pratibimbānnimittamudgṛhya na punaḥ vicinoti |
T06srabhusu:3291: api tu navākārayā cittasthityā adhyātmameva cittaṃ sthāpayati |
T06srabhusu:3298: samādhatte [|] tasya tasminsamaye nirvikalpaṃ tatpratibimbaṃ ālambanaṃ bhavati |
T06srabhusu:3305: itīmāni tasya jñeyavastusabhāgasya pratibimbasya paryāyanāmāni veditavyāni |
T06srabhusu:3311: vedanāskandho vā, saṃjñāskandho [vā], saṃskā[ra]skandho vā, vijñānaskandho
T06srabhusu:3323: iti yā cālambanasya yāvadbhāvikatā, yā ca yathāvadbhāvi[ka]tā
T06srabhusu:3334: āśrayaparivṛtteśca pratibimbamatikramya tasminneva jñeye vastuni nirvikalpaṃ pratyakṣaṃ jñānadarśanamutpadyate
T06srabhusu:3365: sādhu, sādhu, revata, sādhu khalu tvaṃ revata |
T06srabhusu:3367: tena hi śrṛṇu ca, sādhu ca,
T06srabhusu:3368: manasi kuru, bhāṣiṣye [|] iha, revata bhikṣuryogī yogācāraḥ caritamvā
T06srabhusu:3375: [sa ce]drevata, bhikṣuryogī yogācāraḥ (ro) rāgacarita eva, sa na śubhālambane cittamupanibaghnāti
T06srabhusu:3378: mohacarito vā idaṃ pratyayatāpratītyasamutpāde, mānacarito dhātuprabhede |
T06srabhusu:3379: sa cedrevata, sa bhikṣuryogī yogācārovitarkacarita eva ānāpānasmṛtau cittamupanibaghnāti
T06srabhusu:3382: cetsa, revata, bhikṣuḥ saṃskārāṇāṃ svalakṣaṇe saṃmūḍhaḥ, kintu kauśalye cittamupanibaghnāti
T06srabhusu:3385: kāmānāmaudārikatve, rūpāṇāṃ śāntatve, rūpebhyo vā vairāgyaṃ karttukāmaḥ |
T06srabhusu:3387: sarvatra vā satkāyānnirvekṣukāmo, vimoktukāmaḥ, duḥkhasatye(ṣu) samudayasatye,
T06srabhusu:3393: bhikṣuryadyadeva jñeyaṃ vastu nicettukāmo bhavati, pracettukāmaḥ |
T06srabhusu:3399: vijñātamvā [|] sa tadeva dṛṣṭamadhipatiṃ kṛtvā, śrutaṃ, mataṃ, vijñātamadhipatiṃ kṛtvā,
T06srabhusu:3402: sa na tadeva jñeyamvastu samāhitaṃ sammukhībhūtaṃ paśyatyapi tu tatpratirūpakamasyotpadyate
T06srabhusu:3404: darśanamātramvā, pratismṛtamātramvā yadālambanamayaṃ bhikṣuryogī yogācāraḥ samyagevālambane cittamupanibaghnāti |
T06srabhusu:3405: sa cedayaṃ, revata, bhikṣuryogī yogācāra ālambane cittamupanibaghnātyā (ti yā)vad(j) jñeyaṃ jñātavyaṃ bhavati |
T06srabhusu:3409: kathaṃ ca, revata, bhikṣuryogī yogācāra[ḥ] anirākṛtadhyāsī (yī) bhavati |
T06srabhusu:3410: sa cetsa, revata, bhikṣurevamālambane samyakprayujyamāna[ḥ] sātatyaprayogī ca bhavati |
T06srabhusu:3420: evaṃ hi sa, revata, bhikṣuryogī yogācāraḥ anirākṛtadhyāyī bhavati |
T06srabhusu:3428: tatra yattāvadāha || nimitteṣu caranyogī anena tāvacchamathanimitte,
T06srabhusu:3435: pāriśuddhiṃ vigacchatītyanena kārya[pari]niṣpattirākhyātā || punarapi coktaṃ bhagavatā
T06srabhusu:3436: cittanimittasya kovidaḥ pravivekasya (prāvivekyasya?) ca vidante rasaṃ |
T06srabhusu:3437: dhyāyī nipakaḥ pratismṛto bhuṃkte prītisukhaṃ nirāmiṣaṃ [||]
T06srabhusu:3438: tatra yattāvadāha, cittanimittasya kovida ityanena savikalpaṃ nirvikalpaṃ ca pratibimba[ṃ] nimittaśabdenākhyātaṃ |
T06srabhusu:3441: prāvivekyasya ca vidante rasamityanenālambane samyakprayuktasya prahāṇārāmatā bhāvanārāmatā cākhyātā |
T06srabhusu:3445: bhuṃkte prītisukhaṃ nirāmiṣamityanena kāyapariniṣpattirākhyātā || tadevaṃ satyetadvyāpyālambanamāptāgamaviśuddhaṃ (Śbh_Sh: 202) veditavyaṃ ||
T06srabhusu:3448: tatra caritaviśodhanamālambanaṃ katamat || tadyathā aśubhā [|] maitrī |
T06srabhusu:3466: tadyathā- keśā, romāṇi, nakhā, dantā, rajo, malaṃ,
T06srabhusu:3467: tvaṅmānsa(māṃsa)masthi, snāyu[ḥ], sirā, vṛkkā (kkaṃ), hṛdayaṃ, plīhakaṃ,
T06srabhusu:3469: purīṣamaśru, svedaḥ, kheṭā, śiṃghāṇakaṃ, vasā, lasīkā, majjāmedaḥ, pittaṃ,
T06srabhusu:3491: yatsarvanihīnamvastu, sarvanihīno dhātustadyathā kāmadhātuḥ, yasmātpunarhīnataraścāvarataraśca, pratikruṣṭataraścāsau dhāturnāsti |
T06srabhusu:3522: tatra yadā vinīlakamvā, vipūyakamvā, vimadrāmakamvā, vyādhmātmakamvā,
T06srabhusu:3527: | yadā punarasthi vā śaṃkalikāmvā manasi karoti |
T06srabhusu:3529: yadā vikṣiptakaṃ manasikaroti tadā upacārarāgāccittaṃ viśodhayati |
T06srabhusu:3530: ataeva bhagavatā bahirdhopādāya pratyaśubhatā sā catasṛṣu śiva pathikā[su vya]vasthāpitā |
T06srabhusu:3533: ekāhamṛtā vā, saptāhamṛtā vā, kākaiḥ kuraraiḥ khādyamānā,
T06srabhusu:3536: ayamapi me kāya evaṃ bhāvī, evaṃ bhūta, evaṃ dharmatāmanatīta iti |
T06srabhusu:3543: dantamālā, śiraḥkapālaṃ tathā bhinnapratibhinnāni ekavārṣikāni dvivārṣikāni (rṣikāṇi) |
T06srabhusu:3554: idaṃ tāvadrāgacaritasya caritaviśodhanena sālambanaṃ saṃbhavaṃ pratyetaducyate |
T06srabhusu:3566: tatra yo hitādhyāśayaḥ, sukhopasaṃhārāya cādhimokṣaḥ samāhitabhūmikaḥ
T06srabhusu:3569: tatra yattāvadāha maitrīsahagatena cittenetyanena triṣu pakṣeṣu
T06srabhusu:3570: mitrapakṣe, amitra pakṣe, udāsīnapakṣe hitadhyāśaya ākhyātaḥ |
T06srabhusu:3573: tatrāvairatayā hitādhyāśayaḥ sā punaravairatā dvābhyāṃ padābhyāmākhyātā(ḥ)
T06srabhusu:3579: vipulena mahadgatena pramāṇenetyanena mṛdumadhyādhimātrasya sukhasyopasaṃhāra ākhyātaḥ |
T06srabhusu:3588: aduḥkhāsukhite mitrapakṣe, amitrapakṣe, udāsīnapakṣe, sukhakāme veditavyaḥ |
T06srabhusu:3589: yastu duḥkhito vā, aduḥkhito vā punarmitrapakṣaḥ |
T06srabhusu:3590: amitrapakṣa udāsīnapakṣo vā [|] tatra yo duḥkhitaḥ sa karuṇāyā ālambanaṃ |
T06srabhusu:3591: yaḥ sukhitaḥ sa muditāyā ālambanamiyamucyate maitrī [|] tatra vyāpādacaritaḥ pudgalaḥ (Śbh_Sh 210) maitrī bhāvayan sattveṣu yo vyāpādastaṃ pratanu
T06srabhusu:3603: yadālambanaṃ manasi kurvan mohādhikaḥ pudgalo mohacaritaḥ mohaṃ prajahāti |
T06srabhusu:3612: tatrādhyātmiko yadasminkāye adhyātmaṃ pratyātmaṃ khakkhaṭaṃ kharataramupādattaṃ |
T06srabhusu:3616: dantā, rajo,malaṃ, tvaṅmānsamasthi, snāyu[ḥ], sirā, vṛkkā(kkaṃ), hṛdayaṃ,
T06srabhusu:3623: vā, kaṭhillā vā, vṛkṣā vā, parvatāgrā vā, iti vā punaranyopyevaṃbhāgīyaḥ
T06srabhusu:3634: pittaṃ, śleṣmā, pūyaḥ, śoṇitaṃ, mastakaṃ, mastakaluṃgaṃ, praśrāvoya(srāvo
T06srabhusu:3640: taḍāgā (Śbh_Sh 214) vā, nadyo vā,prasravaṇāni vā, iti yo vā
T06srabhusu:3646: tadyathā yadasminkāye tejo yenāyaṃ kāya ātapyate |
T06srabhusu:3649: yasya cotsadatvāt jārito jārita iti saṃkhyāṃ gacchati ||
T06srabhusu:3668: sa punaḥ santyasmin kāye ūrdhvaṃgamā vāyavaḥ, adhogamā vāyavaḥ, pārśvaśayā vāyavaḥ |
T06srabhusu:3682: vāyavaḥ, arajaso vāyavaḥ, [parīttā] mahadgatā vāyavaḥ, viśvā vāyavo,
T06srabhusu:3683: vairambhā vāyavaḥ vāyumaṇḍalakavāyavaḥ [|] bhavati ca samayaḥ yanmahān vāyuskandhaḥ samudāgataḥ vṛkṣāgrānapi pātayati |
T06srabhusu:3687: ye sattvāścīvarakarṇikena vā paryeṣante, tālavṛntena vā, vidhamanakena vā |
T06srabhusu:3697: iti yo vā puranarapyopyevaṃbhāgīyaḥ [?] ayaṃ ucyate ākāśadhātuḥ ||
T06srabhusu:3701: tatra mānacaritaḥ pudgala imaṃ dhātuprabhedaṃ manasi kurvan kāye piṇḍasaṃjñāṃ vibhāvayati
T06srabhusu:3716: tatra śvāsaḥ yaḥ praśvāsasamanantaraṃ antarmukho vāyuḥ pravarttate |
T06srabhusu:3718: tatrāntarāśvāso ya uparatesminnāśvāse na tāvatpraśvāsa utpadyate |
T06srabhusu:3734: te ca yathāyogaṃ sa cetkāyasaṃnniśritā [eva] pravarteran |
T06srabhusu:3740: te ca na yathāyogaṃ tena caturthadhyānasamāpannopapannānāṃ, kalalagatānāñcārbudagatānāṃ,
T06srabhusu:3750: audārikaṃ ca sauṣiryaṃ, sūkṣmaṃ ca (|) sauṣiryaṃ |
T06srabhusu:3767: tatrāśithilaprayogatayā kausīdyaprāptasya styānamiddhamvā cittaṃ paryavanaha (hya)ti, bahirdhā vā vikṣipyate |
T06srabhusu:3774: te punaḥ sphurakā vāyavo vivarddhamānā rujakā bhavanti |
T06srabhusu:3792: tadā āśvāsa praśvāsopanibaddhayā smṛtyā ekamiti gaṇayati |
T06srabhusu:3793: yadā āśvāse niruddhe praśvāsa utpadya nirgato bhavati |
T06srabhusu:3795: eṣā hi gaṇanā saṃkhyā nātisaṃkṣiptā nātivistarā iyamucyate ekaikagaṇanā ||
T06srabhusu:3803: āśvāsaṃ ca praśvāsaṃ cedaṃ dvayamekatyamabhisaṃkṣipyaikamiti gaṇayati tenocyate dvayaikagaṇanā
T06srabhusu:3809: pratilomaṃ daśa upādāya, navāṣṭau, sapta, ṣaṭ,
T06srabhusu:3812: yadā sa ekaikagaṇanāṃ niśritya, dvayaikagaṇanāmvā, anulomagaṇanāyāṃ,
T06srabhusu:3817: ekaikagaṇanayā vā, dvayaikagaṇanayā vā, dvayamekaṃ kṛtvā gaṇayati |
T06srabhusu:3818: tatra dvayaikagaṇanayā catvāra āśvāsapraśvāsā ekaṃ bhavati |
T06srabhusu:3826: tasya ca gaṇanāprayuktasya sa cedantarāccittaṃ vikṣipyate tadā punaḥ pratinivartyādito gaṇayitumārabhate
T06srabhusu:3827: anulomamvā, pratilomamvā [|] yadā cāsya gadhayāccittaṃ svarasenaiva bāhimārga(svarasavāhimārgeṇaiva)
T06srabhusu:3829: pravarttamāse āśvāsa(se) pravṛttigrāhakaṃ, niruddhe āśvāse praśvāsaśūnyāvasthāgrāhakaṃ, pravṛtte praśvāse pravṛttigrāhakaṃ, nivṛtte
T06srabhusu:3838: cittasthitaye cittanirataye [|] anyathā gaṇanāmantareṇa teṣāṃ styānamiddhamvā cittaṃ paryavahet, bahirdhā vā cittaṃ vikṣipyeta, gaṇanāprayuktena tu teṣāmetanna bhavati |
T06srabhusu:3839: ye tu tīkṣṇendriyāḥ paṭubuddhayaḥ teṣāṃ punargaṇanāprayogeṇa priyārohatā bhavati |
T06srabhusu:3840: tatropadiṣṭā evaṃ gaṇanāprayogaṃ laghu laghveva pratividhyanti |
T06srabhusu:3841: na ca tenābhiramante [|] te punarāśvāsapraśvāsālambanāṃ smṛtimupanibadhya
T06srabhusu:3850: ye cāśvāsapraśvāsā yaścaiṣāmāśrayakāyastaṃ manasi kurvan rūpaskandhamavatarati |
T06srabhusu:3851: yā teṣāmāśvāsapraśvāsānāṃ tadgrāhikayā smṛtyā saṃprayuktā anubhāvanā sa vedanāskandha ityavatarati
T06srabhusu:3853: yā cāsau smṛtiryā ca cetanā, yā ca (|) tatra prajñā |
T06srabhusu:3860: vastumātraṃ, tadā sa eṣāmeva saṃskārāṇāṃ pratītyasamutpādamavatarati |
T06srabhusu:3866: kāyaḥ punaścittaṃ ca kiṃ pratyayaṃ ca [|]
T06srabhusu:3869: iti hi avidyāpratyaya(ḥ) pūrvakaḥ saṃskāraḥ sarvasaṃskārapratyayaṃ
T06srabhusu:3870: jīvitendriyaṃ, jīvitendriyapratyayaḥ kāyo, vijñānaṃ ca, kāyacittapratyayā āśvāsapraśvāsāḥ
T06srabhusu:3879: sa evaṃ pratītyasamutpāde kṛtaparicayo ya ete saṃskārāḥ pratītyasamutpannāḥ |
T06srabhusu:3885: | te jāti dharmāṇo, jarādharmāṇo, vyādhidharmāṇo, maraṇadharmāṇaḥ |
T06srabhusu:3886: ye jātijarāvyādhimaraṇadharmāṇaste duḥkhā, ye duḥkhāstenātmānaḥ, asvatantrāḥ,
T06srabhusu:3892: yatpunarasyā duḥkhajanikāyāstṛṣṇāyā aśeṣaprahāṇametacchāntametatpraṇītametattamevaṃ ca me jānata, evaṃ bahulavihāriṇastṛṣṇāyā aśeṣaprahāṇaṃ bhaviṣyatīti |
T06srabhusu:3893: evaṃ hi samudayasatyaṃ, nirodhasatyaṃ, mārgasatyamavatīrṇo bhavati |
T06srabhusu:3897: darśanaprahātavyeṣu dharmeṣu prahīṇeṣu bhāvanāprahātavyā avaśiṣṭā bhavanti |
T06srabhusu:3901: smṛta āśvāsaḥ (ta (Śbh_Sh 230) āśvasan) smṛta āśvasimīti śikṣate |
T06srabhusu:3909: praśrabhya kāyasaṃskārān praśvasan, praśrabhya kāyasaṃskārān praśvasimīti śikṣate |
T06srabhusu:3911: cittasaṃskārapratisamvedī praśrabhya cittasaṃskārānāśvasan, praśrabhya cittasaṃskārānāśvasimīti śikṣate |
T06srabhusu:3912: praśrabhya cittasaṃskārān (Śbh_Sh 231) praśvasan, praśrabhya cittasaṃskārān praśvasimīti śikṣate
T06srabhusu:3922: caturṇāṃ smṛtyupasthānānāṃ āśvā sapraśvāsālambanaṃ ca (|) manaskāramārabhate |
T06srabhusu:3925: yadā āśvāsaṃ vā praśvāsamvā ālambate tadā dīrgham āśvasimi praśvasimīti śikṣate |
T06srabhusu:3944: api tu khalu tasyāsevanānvayādbhāva nānvayād bahulīkarānvayāt |
T06srabhusu:3947: kṛtaparicayasya anye ca mṛdavaḥ sukhasaṃsparśāḥ pravarttante |
T06srabhusu:3950: sa caivamānāpānasmṛtiprayogeṇa ca yuktaḥ sa cellābhī bhavati |
T06srabhusu:3951: prathamasya vā dhyānasya, dvitīyasya vā yasmin samaye prītipratisaṃvedī āśvasan,
T06srabhusu:3954: niṣprītikasya tṛtīyasya dhyānasya [|] sa tasmin samaye sukhapratisaṃvedī bhavati |
T06srabhusu:3957: tasyaivaṃ prītipratisaṃvedino vā, sukhapratisaṃvedino vā [|] sa cetkadācitkarha (rhi) citsmṛtisaṃpramo ṣādutpadyate |
T06srabhusu:3958: asmīti vā ayamahamasmīti vā bhaviṣyāmīti vā, na bhaviṣyāmīti vā, rūpī bhaviṣyāmyarūpī bhaviṣyāmi
T06srabhusu:3970: sa cetpunarlābhī bhavati maulānāṃ prathamadvitīyatṛtīyadhyānānāṃ sa cāvaśyamanāgamyasya prathamadhyānasāmantakasya lābhī bhavati |
T06srabhusu:3976: samāhitamasamāhitaṃ, subhāvitamasubhāvitaṃ, vimuktaṃ cittamavimuktaṃ cittamiti yathābhūtaṃ prajānāti |
T06srabhusu:3979: sa yadā styāna[middha]nivaraṇe cittaṃ niśritaṃ (|) bhavati |
T06srabhusu:3994: tasya nivaraṇebhyo vimuktacetaso mārgabhāvanāyā āntarāyikebhyaḥ anuśayā
T06srabhusu:3996: prahātavyāḥ [|] sa teṣāṃ prahāṇāya mārgaṃ saṃmukhīkaroti yaduta saṃskārānityatāmeva sādhu ca, suṣṭhu ca, yoniśaḥ pratyavekṣate |
T06srabhusu:3999: tena ca pūrvaṃ prathamadvitīyatṛtīyadhyānasanniśrayeṇānāgamyasaṃniśrayeṇa vā punaḥ śamathayogaḥ [|] ṛjuṃ etarhi anityānudarśi(rśī)vipaśyanāyāṃ yogaṃ karotyevaṃ asya taccittaṃ śamathavipaśyanāparibhāvitaṃ dhātuṣu vimucyate |
T06srabhusu:4006: sa evaṃ trīndhātūn śāntato manasi kurvan, kṣemata, ārogyataḥ, śamathavipaśyanāṃ bhāvayati
T06srabhusu:4009: prahāṇānudarśī, virāgānudarśī, nirodhānudarśī āśvasannirodhānudarśī āśvasimīti śikṣate
T06srabhusu:4017: yatra vitarkacaritaḥ pudgalaḥ prayujyamānaḥ priyāro hatayā prayujyate |
T06srabhusu:4020: āsannāsannaṃ yenāsya tatra prayujyamānasya yo vitarkasaṃkṣobhaḥ sa na bhavati |
T06srabhusu:4034: tatra rūpaskandho yatkiṃcidrūpaṃ sarvaṃ taccatvāri mahābhūtāni |
T06srabhusu:4038: sūkṣmvā, hīnamvā, praṇītamvā, dūre vā, antike vā |
T06srabhusu:4042: tatra saṃjñāskandhaḥ katamaḥ [|] tadyathā sanimittasaṃjñā, animittasaṃjñā,
T06srabhusu:4050: ṣaṭcetanā kāyāḥ cakṣuḥ saṃsparśajā (Śbh_Sh 242) cetanā, śrotraghrāṇajihvakāyamanaḥ saṃsparśajā cetanā [|] cetanāṃ ca saṃjñā ca sthāpayitvā || ye tadanye caitasikā
T06srabhusu:4056: atītānāgatapratyutpannamādhyātmikaṃ (Śbh_Sh 243) vā bāhyamvā iti vistareṇa pūrvavat || ima ucyante skandhāḥ ||
T06srabhusu:4062: tatra katamā nānātmakatā skandhānāmanya eva rūpaskandho (Śbh_Sh 244) 'nyo
T06srabhusu:4071: kiṃ ca na tasmātparaṃ upalabhate, vikalpayati |
T06srabhusu:4096: idamucyate dhātukauśalyaṃ || yadaṣṭādaśānāṃ dharmāṇāṃ svarusvakāddhātoḥ pravṛttiṃ jānāti |
T06srabhusu:4109: spraṣṭavyāya tanaṃ, mana āyatanaṃ, dharmāyatanaṃ ca |
T06srabhusu:4117: śrotravijñānasya sa saṃprayogasyotpattaye [|] evaṃ yāvanmanaḥ samanantaraṃ tajjo manasikārodhipatipratyayo
T06srabhusu:4127: vistareṇa yāvadevamasya kevalasya mahato duḥkhaskandhasya samudayo bhavatyayamucyate pratītyasamutpādaḥ
T06srabhusu:4128: yatpurardharmā eva dharmānabhiṣpandayati(nti) dharmā eva dharmān pariṣpandayanti |
T06srabhusu:4129: saṃskārā eva dharmāṇāmāhārakāḥ tena hetusamutpannatvāt pratītyasamutpannatvātvādabhūtvā bhavanti
T06srabhusu:4131: tasmādanityā ete saṃskārā ye punaranityāste jātidharmāṇo, jarāṃdharmāṇo, vyādhidharmāṇo,
T06srabhusu:4139: sthānāsthānakauśalyaṃ punaḥ pratītyasamutpāda eva veditavyaṃ || tatrāyaṃ viśeṣaḥ [|] sthānāsthānakauśalyenā viṣamahetukatāṃ jānāti |
T06srabhusu:4141: akuśalānāmaniṣṭa iti || yadevaṃ jñānamidamucyate sthānāsthānakauśalyaṃ || taccaitatpañcasthānakauśalyaṃ samāsataḥ svalakṣaṇakauśalyaṃ bhavati |
T06srabhusu:4148: adhobhūmīnāmaudārikatvaṃ tadyathā kāmadhātau prathamadhyānasya evaṃ yāvannaiva saṃjñānāsaṃjñāyatanasya
T06srabhusu:4153: tatra svabhāvaudārikatā kāmadhātāvapi pañca skandhāḥ saṃvidyante |
T06srabhusu:4154: prathame tu dhyāne ye kāmāvacarāste sādīnavatarāśca duḥkhavihārata[rāś]ca
T06srabhusu:4156: hīnatarāḥ pratikruṣṭatarāśca [|] iyameṣāṃ svabhāvaudārikatā prathame tu dhyāne [|] tathā tena te śāntatarāḥ praṇītatarā ityucyante |
T06srabhusu:4159: prahātavya evaṃ yāvadvijñānaskandha iyamucyate skandhaudārikatā || evamuparimābhūmiṣu svabhāvo (vau) dārikatā saṃkhyaudārikatā ca |
T06srabhusu:4164: alpāyuṣkatarāśca, naivasaṃjñānāsaṃjñāyatanaṃ punaḥ śāntameva upari śreṣṭhatayā bhūmerabhāvāt
T06srabhusu:4173: idaṃ laukikānāṃ laukikena mārgeṇa kleśaviśodhanamālambanaṃ tathāpi tasyādharimāṃ bhūmimādīnavataḥ paśyataḥ |
T06srabhusu:4174: rogataḥ, ayogakṣemataḥ, uparimāṃca bhūmiṃ śāntataḥ [|] ye adhobhūmikāḥ kleśā yāvadākiṃcanyāyatanabhūmikāḥ,
T06srabhusu:4178: lokottareṇa vā punarmārgeṇa kleśaviśodhanamālambanaṃ caturvidhaṃ, tadyathā
T06srabhusu:4185: tatra samudaya āryasatyaṃ tṛṣṇā paunarbhavikī nandīrāgasahagatā tatra tatrābhinandinī ||
T06srabhusu:4186: tatra niro[dha ā]ryasatyaṃ yadasyā eva tṛṣṇāyā aśeṣaprahāṇaṃ ||
T06srabhusu:4189: tatra kṛṣṇapakṣaṃ śuklapakṣaṃ copādāya hetuphalavyavasthānena catuḥsatyavyavasthānaṃ ||
T06srabhusu:4213: samānāni, satyatā (to) jānanti paśyanti (|) yathābhūtaṃ, bālāstu na jānanti, na paśyanti
T06srabhusu:4217: duḥkhamiti jāyamānasya duḥkhā vedanotpadyeta (|) kāyika caitasikī, na tu ja[ā]tireva duḥkhaṃ, duḥkhanidānaṃ sā, evaṃ yāvadicchāvighāto duḥkhamiti
T06srabhusu:4220: kāyikacaitasikaṃ, na tvicchāvighāta eva (|) duḥkhaṃ, duḥkhanidānaṃ punaḥ sa iti peyālam
T06srabhusu:4229: kena punaḥ kāraṇena bhagavatā duḥkhaduḥkhataiva parikīrttitā |
T06srabhusu:4231: vipariṇāmaduḥkhatā, saṃskāraduḥkhatā punaḥ paryāyeṇa [|] tathā hi duḥkhaduḥkhatāyā (Śbh_Sh 256) māryāṇāṃ bālānāñca tulyā duḥkhatābuddhiḥ pravarttate |
T06srabhusu:4232: saṃvejikātyarthaṃ duḥkhaduḥkhatā pūrvamakṛtaprajñānāmevaṃ ca deśyamāne sukhamavatāro bhavati
T06srabhusu:4234: tatra trividhāyā duḥkhatāyāḥ kathaṃ vyavasthānaṃ bhavati |
T06srabhusu:4235: yattāvadduḥkhaṃ jātirduḥkhaṃ yāvadicchāvighāto duḥkhamityanena sādhiṣṭhānā duḥkhā vedanā ākhyātā || sā ca duḥkhaduḥkhatā [|] idaṃ duḥkhaduḥkhatāyā vyavasthānaṃ |
T06srabhusu:4236: ye vā punaretadvipakṣā dharmāstathā yauvanaṃ jarāyā, vyādherārogyaṃ,
T06srabhusu:4240: vedanāyāṃ pravṛttāḥ kleśāḥ sādhiṣṭhānā, ye cārogyādiṣu sukhasthānīyeṣu
T06srabhusu:4241: dharmeṣu tannirjātāyāṃ ca vedanāyāṃ ye pravṛttāḥ kleśā iyamucyate vipariṇāma duḥkhatā ||
T06srabhusu:4242: tatra sukhā vedanā sādhiṣṭhānā anityatayā pa[ri]ṇamantī |
T06srabhusu:4244: kleśāḥ punaḥ sarvatra pravṛttāḥ paryavasthānaṣa(śa) eva duḥkhā bhavanti |
T06srabhusu:4245: vipariṇāmaśca sa cetasaḥ tasmādvipariṇāmaduḥkhatetyucyate || yathoktaṃ bhagavatā-
T06srabhusu:4246: avatīrṇavipariṇatena cittena mātṛgrāmasya hastigrahaṇaṃ ceti vistaraḥ ||
T06srabhusu:4256: sarvatragā upādānaskandheṣu saṃkṣepata āryā ca dukhaduḥkhatā, yā ca kleśasaṃgṛhītā
T06srabhusu:4257: vipariṇāmadharmatā, ye (yā) ca sādhiṣṭhānā sukhā vedanā tāṃ sthāpayitvā,
T06srabhusu:4259: duḥkhāḥ(duḥkha)sahagatāstannirjātāstadutpattipratyayā stasya cotpannasya sthitibhājanā iyamucyate saṃskāraduḥkhatā || ye skandhā anityā
T06srabhusu:4262: duḥkhaduḥkhatāyā vipariṇāmaduḥkhatāyā asvavaśavartinaśca [|] iyamucyate saṃskāraduḥkhatayā duḥkhatā [|] idaṃ saṃskāraduḥkhatāyā vyavasthānaṃ |
T06srabhusu:4263: tabha(tra)tṛṣṇā prārthanābhilāṣobhinandaneti paryāyāḥ [|] sā punaḥ prārthanā tribhirmukhaiḥ pravṛttā(s)tadyathā punarbhavaprārthanā,
T06srabhusu:4265: (Śbh_Sh 258) tatra yā punarbhavaprārthanā mā paunarbhavikī tṛṣṇā |
T06srabhusu:4266: viṣayaprārthanā punardvividhā [|] prāpteṣu viṣayeṣu saumanasyādhyavasānasahagatā, aprāpteṣu ca viṣayeṣu saṃyogābhilāṣasahagatā
T06srabhusu:4267: [|] tatra yā prāpteṣu viṣayeṣu saumanasyādhyavasānasahagatā nandīrāgasahagatetyucyate |
T06srabhusu:4268: yā punaraprāpteṣu viṣayeṣu saṃyogābhilāṣasahagatā tatra tatrābhinandinītyucyate |
T06srabhusu:4294: tataḥ paścādgaṃbhīrāṇi prathamasya vā satyasyābhisamayāya tatprathamato 'vavadate |
T06srabhusu:4296: tataḥ paścātsamudayanirodhamārgasatyasya, prathamasya dhyānasya samāpattaye tatprathamatovavadate
T06srabhusu:4299: gurusthānīyānāṃ, yogajñānāṃ, ācāryāṇāmupādhyāyasya vā, tathāgatasya vā,
T06srabhusu:4318: tatra [|] deśanā prātihāryeṇa cittacaritaṃ samanveṣya anuśāstiprātihāryeṇa yathendriyaṃ, yathācaritaṃ, yathāvatāraṃdharmadeśanāṃ deśayati |
T06srabhusu:4330: cittaikāgratā[ñ]ca, prathamaṃ dhyānaṃ yāvaccaturthaṃ dhyānamupasampadya viharati |
T06srabhusu:4334: api tu dhyānāni niśritya tatprathamataḥ satyābhisamayomā vakrāntirbhavati |
T06srabhusu:4335: na tu sarveṇa sarvaṃ vinā dhyānaiḥ tasmātpradhānāni dhyānāni kṛtvā adhicittaṃ śikṣetyuktāni
T06srabhusu:4336: tatrādhiprajñaṃ śikṣā yā caturṣvāryasatyeṣu yathābhūtaṃ jñānaṃ [|]
T06srabhusu:4338: kena kāraṇena tisra eva śikṣā na tadūrdhvaṃ |
T06srabhusu:4344: tathā hi śīlaṃ pratiṣṭhāya cittaikāgratāṃ spṛśati (||) cittasamādhiṃ [||] tatra jñānasanniśrayārthena adhicittaṃ śikṣā |
T06srabhusu:4346: smṛtyā jñeye vastuni yathābhūtaṃ jñānadarśanaṃ pravarttate |
T06srabhusu:4348: tathā hi suviśuddhena jñānadarśanena kleśaprahāṇaṃ sākṣātkaroti |
T06srabhusu:4349: eṣa hi svārtha e[tat] paramaṃ kṛtyaṃ yaduta kleśaprahāṇaṃ
T06srabhusu:4353: avipratisāriṇaḥ prāmodyaṃ, prītiḥ, praśrabdhiḥ, sukhaṃ, sukhitasya cittasamādhiḥ [|] samāhitacitto yathābhūtaṃ prajānāti |
T06srabhusu:4364: tatra kathamadhikārārthenā (nā a)dhicittamadhikṛtya yacchīlaṃ sā adhiśīlaṃ
T06srabhusu:4372: etāḥ śikṣāḥ asminneva śāsane asādhāraṇā ito bāhyairevamadhikārthena [|]
T06srabhusu:4373: asti punaradhicittaṃ śikṣā yā adhiprajñaṃ śikṣāyā āvāhikā, astyadhiprajñaṃ śikṣā yā adhicittaṃ śikṣāyā āvāhikā |
T06srabhusu:4377: mauladhyānānāṃ, śaikṣo, dṛṣṭapadaḥ, tataḥ paścādbhāvanāprahātavyānāṃ kleśānāṃ prahāṇāya prayujyamāna[ḥ] smṛtisaṃbodhyaṃgaṃ bhāvayati |
T06srabhusu:4379: adhicittaṃ punaḥ śikṣā adhiprajñāyā āvāhikā pūrvamevoktā || tatra astyadhiśīlaṃ śikṣā |
T06srabhusu:4383: na tvastyadhiprajñaṃ śikṣā yā vinādhiśīlenādhicittena ca |
T06srabhusu:4386: tatra tisraḥ śikṣā veditavyā[ḥ] || idaṃ tāvacchikṣāvyavasthānaṃ |
T06srabhusu:4391: tatra sarveṇasarvamavītarāgaḥ satyānyabhisamāgacchan saha satyābhisamayātsrota (-yena strota) āpanno bhavati |
T06srabhusu:4413: ātmā vā, sattvo vā, jīvo vā, janturvā, idamasat |
T06srabhusu:4416: nirvāṇe punaḥ tatra praṇidhānavataḥ praṇidhānaṃ bhavati |
T06srabhusu:4431: śikṣāprayuktasya kulaputrasyādhimātramantarāyakaraḥ paripanthakaḥ, satkāyaparyāpanneṣu saṃskāreṣu niyantirālasyaṃ, kausīdyaṃ |
T06srabhusu:4435: sa punaḥ katamastadyathā (Śbh_Sh 269) raseṣu vā, satyeṣu vā, skandheṣu vā [|]
T06srabhusu:4436: karmaphale vā prahāṇaprayuktasya ca kāyadauṣṭhulyaśaithilikasya śamathavipaśyanāpakṣālamanasikāraḥ
T06srabhusu:4442: lobhena vā, yaśasāvā, praśaṃsayā vā, anyatamānyatamena vā sukhalavamātratvena, nandīsaumanasyamauddhatyamavyupaśamaḥ
T06srabhusu:4453: duḥkhāmiryāvatprāṇahāriṇībhirjīvitaniyanti[ḥ] |, jīvitāśā tadāśānugatasya (Śbh_Sh 270) śocanā, klāmyanā, paridevanā iti |
T06srabhusu:4455: katame daśa śikṣāpadānāṃ vilomānāṃ dharmāṇāṃ pratipakṣeṇa śikṣānulomikā bhavanti |
T06srabhusu:4465: āsevitā bhāvitā bahulīkṛtā daśavidhasya śikṣāparipanthakasya daśānāṃ śikṣāvilomānāṃ dharmāṇāṃ prahāṇāya samvartante |
T06srabhusu:4489: tatra sātatyasatkṛtyakāritā [|] ṣaḍrūpeṇa prayogeṇa abandhyañca kālaṃ karoti |
T06srabhusu:4491: tatra tīvra[c]chandatā [|] yathāpi taduttare vimokṣe spṛhāmutpādayati |
T06srabhusu:4494: tatra yogabalādhānatā [|] dvābhyāṃ kāraṇābhyāṃ yogabalādhānaprāpto bhavati
T06srabhusu:4505: kāyacittadauṣṭhulyaṃ tadadhiprajñaṃ dharmavipaśyanayā, prasadanīyena ca manaskāreṇa praśrambhayati
T06srabhusu:4506: prakṛtyaiva vā prahīṇakleśasya kleśapakṣaṃ kāyacittadauṣṭhulyaṃ avigataṃ bhavati |
T06srabhusu:4514: tathā kleśānāṃ prahīṇāprahīṇānāṃ mīmānsā (māṃsā) manaskāramadhipatiṃ kṛtvā abhīkṣṇaṃ pratyavekṣate
T06srabhusu:4515: tatra prahīṇatāṃ jñātvā punaḥ punastameva mārgaṃ bhāvayati |
T06srabhusu:4526: aviparītagrāhī, prāpte prāpta saṃjñī, adhigate adhigatasaṃjñī [|] itīme daśa dharmāḥ śikṣākāmasya yoginaḥ || ādimadhyaparyavasānamupādāya śikṣāmanulomayati (nti), na vilomayanti |
T06srabhusu:4542: pratyayavikalānāṃ, te hi dūramapi, paramapi gatvā avaśyameva
T06srabhusu:4545: tenaiva teṣāṃ tāvatkālika eva bhraṃśo bhavati |
T06srabhusu:4551: ayoniśaḥ prayujyamāno nārādhako bhavati (|) yogasya, nārādhayati (|) dhyāyyaṃ dharmaṃ kuśalaṃ [|] yathāpīhaikatyaḥ bahukleśo bhavati |
T06srabhusu:4559: alpamvā, prabhūtaṃ vā, araṇye vā punarviharati āgatāgatānāñca
T06srabhusu:4570: api adhvādenteṣu gredhaṃ nigamayamvā varttate (apyadhvānteṣu grāmo nigamo vā vartate) vā [...]yatasyaivaṃ bhavati |
T06srabhusu:4572: gṛhipravrajitā, ye mayi saṃbhāvanājātā yeṣāṃ mahatsaṃsa(ma)taḥ te
T06srabhusu:4573: cedyā(nmā)mupasaṃkramya yoge manasikāre śamathavipaśyanāyā[ṃ] praśnaṃ pṛccheyuḥ |
T06srabhusu:4574: teṣāṃ cāhaṃ pṛṣṭo vyākuryāṃ na jānāmītyevaṃ sati yā saṃbhāvanā sā ca hīyenna (hīyeta, na) ca syāmarhatsammataḥ, yannvahaṃ svayameva cintayitvā, tulayitvopaparīkṣya yogaṃ vyavasthāpayeyaṃ sa etamevārthamadhipatiṃ kṛtvā lābhasatkārābhigṛddha ekākī rahogataḥ svayameva cintayitvā, tulayitvā, tulayitvopaparīkṣya yogaṃvyavasthāpayati |
T06srabhusu:4575: sa cāsya yogo na sūtre bhavati |
T06srabhusu:4591: te ca tato nidānam pratītā bhaveyurapratītavacanaiśca sāṃ codayeyuḥ |
T06srabhusu:4593: evamahaṃ punarapi na satkṛtaḥ (|) syānna gurukṛto, rājñāṃ rājāmātrāṇāṃ yāvaddhanināṃ śreṣṭhināṃ sārthavāhānāṃ, na ca punarlābhī syāṃ cīvarapiṇḍapātaśayanāsanaglānapratyayabhaiṣajyapariṣkārāṇāmiti sa tāmeva lābhasatkārakāmatāmadhipatiṃ kṛtvā adharme dharmasaṃjñī, vinidhāya saṃjñāṃ rūpi[ṇī]madharmaṃ dharmato dīpayati |
T06srabhusu:4600: ayamevaṃ rūpo mithyāpratipattikṛto yogabhraṃśassaddharmapratirūpako hyasaddharmaḥ saddharmasyāntardhānāya [|] itīme catvāro yogabhraṃśā dhyāyinā bhikṣuṇā yogācāreṇa parijñeyā varjayitavyāḥ ||
T06srabhusu:4626: tatra vīryamapi caturvidha[ṃ] tadyathā śra[vaṇā]ya, cintanāyai, bhāvanāyai
T06srabhusu:4637: evaṃ pratisaṃlayanapraviṣṭasya kālena kālaṃ śamathavipaśyanāṃ bhāvayata evamahorātrānuyuktasya caṃkramaniṣadyābhyā[ṃ] nivaraṇebhyaścittaṃ viśodhayataḥ |
T06srabhusu:4639: avinyastayāgatā(prayogatā) [|] evaṃ yathāśrutānāṃ dharmāṇāmekākino rahogatasyārthaṃ cintayata
T06srabhusu:4677: yo labdhamanaskārasya ca laukikena mārgeṇa gacchato lokottareṇa vā (yo) lakṣaṇa pratisaṃvedī manaskāraḥ |
T06srabhusu:4684: apare catvāro manaskārāḥ tadyathā ānulomikaḥ, prātipakṣikaḥ, prasadanīyaḥ,
T06srabhusu:4691: tatra prasadanīya yena līnaṃ cittaṃ pragrāhakairnimittairabhipramoca(da)yati |
T06srabhusu:4697: yamadhipatiṃ kṛtvā prahīṇā prahīṇatāṃ kleśānāṃ pratyavekṣate |
T06srabhusu:4698: tatrālambanaṃ manasi kurvatā kati nimittāni manasi karttavyāni bhavanti |
T06srabhusu:4715: vā, ko (a)manuṣya kṛto vā, śabda kṛto vā, vyāpādakṛto vā |
T06srabhusu:4718: uttaptatarāyā vipaśyanāyāḥ uttaratra nidānanimittaṃ, tathā śamathapūrvaṃgamā vipaśyanā,
T06srabhusu:4724: tatra layanimittaṃ yenālambananimittena nidānanimittena cittaṃ līnatvāya paraiti |
T06srabhusu:4732: tāni punarnimittāni yathā samāhitāyāṃ bhūmau ebhirmanaskārairālambanamadhimucyate |
T06srabhusu:4741: tatra prabhāsvarodhimokṣo ya ālokanimitte sūdgṛhīte ālokasahagataḥ |]
T06srabhusu:4752: tatra yo mahadgataḥ śraddhācchandasahagato mahadgatamvā ālambanamadhimucyate |
T06srabhusu:4760: tatra pariśuddho 'dhimokṣaḥ yaḥ prabhāvitaḥ, pariniṣpannaḥ paryavasānagataḥ |
T06srabhusu:4761: apariśuddho vā punaryo na subhāvito, na (Śbh_Sh 283) pariniṣpanno na paryavasānagataḥ |
T06srabhusu:4795: tatra prathamakarmika ekāgratāyāṃ yāvanmanaskāraṃ na prāpnoti |
T06srabhusu:4798: adhigatepi manaskāre kleśasya cittaṃ vimocayitukāmasya yallakṣaṇapratisaṃvedino manaskārasyārambhaḥ pratigrahaścābhyāsaḥ |
T06srabhusu:4801: lakṣaṇapratisaṃvedinaṃ manaskāraṃ sthāpayitvā tadanyeṣu ṣaṭsu manaskāreṣu prayoganiṣṭhāpanneṣu kṛtaparicayo bhavati |
T06srabhusu:4840: paścātpura imameva kāyaṃ yathāsthitaṃ yathāpraṇihitaṃ ūrdhvaṃ pādatalādadhaḥ keśamastakātpūrṇaṃ nānāvidhasyāśuceḥ pratyavekṣate |
T06srabhusu:4844: sādhu ca, suṣṭhu ca, sūdgṛhītaṃ bhavati |
T06srabhusu:4850: sā khalveṣā traiyadhvikānāṃ saṃskārāṇāṃ pratītyasamutpannānāṃ vipaśyanākārā pratyavekṣāparidīpitā
T06srabhusu:4858: niṣaṇṇo vā nipannaṃ pratyavekṣata ityanena pratyutpannena manaskāreṇātītasya jñeyasya pratyavekṣaṇā paridīpitā |
T06srabhusu:4863: purato vā gacchantaṃ pratyavekṣata ityanena pratyutpannena manaskāreṇa |
T06srabhusu:4865: tatra ya utpannotpanno manasikāro [a]nantaraniruddhaḥ sa purato yāyī [|] tatra anantarotpannaḥ
T06srabhusu:4870: tatra śamathaṃ ca vipaśyanāṃ ca bhāvayanstadubhayapakṣyāmālokasaṃjñāṃ bhāvayati
T06srabhusu:4879: pañcānāmindriyāṇāṃ, paṃcānāṃ balānāṃ, saptānāṃ bodhyaṃgānāmāmāryāṣṭāṅgasya mārgasya [|]
T06srabhusu:4925: yā kāyamadhipatiṃ kṛtvā- śrutamayī vā prajñābhāvanāmayī vā [|] yayā prajñayā sarvaṃkāyaṃ sarvākāraṃ samyagevopaparīkṣate |
T06srabhusu:4928: tatra smṛtipadasya kāyamadhipatiṃ kṛtvā (||) ye dharmā udgṛhītāsteṣāmeva
T06srabhusu:4929: ca dharmāṇāṃ yorthaḥ (|) cintito, ye (Śbh_Sh 293) ca bhāvanayā sākṣātkṛtā[ḥ] |
T06srabhusu:4930: tatra vyaṃjane, cārthe ca, sākṣākriyāyāṃ ca yaścetasaḥ
T06srabhusu:4931: asaṃmoṣaḥ sūdgṛhītā vā me te ete dharmā na veti || sūpalakṣitā vā tatra
T06srabhusu:4933: susaṃsparśitā[ḥ] (susaṃspṛṣṭāḥ) tatra tatra vimuktyā na veti rupasthitā bhavatīdaṃ smṛterupasthānaṃ
T06srabhusu:4934: api ca smṛtyā rakṣāyai smṛterupasthānaṃ viṣayāsaṃkleśāyālambanopanibaddhāya
T06srabhusu:4947: kauśalyālambane, kleśaviśodhane vā ebhistribhirākārairyā sūpasthitasmṛtitā idamucyate smṛterupasthānaṃ
T06srabhusu:4948: tatra vedanā katamā [|] tadyathā sukhā, duḥkhā, (Śbh_Sh 294) aduḥkhāsukhā ca vedanā |
T06srabhusu:4954: nirāmiṣāpi, evaṃ gardha(vā) śrite (tā), naiṣkramyāśritā vedanā, sukhāpi duḥkhāpyaduḥkhāpyaduḥkhāsukhāpi
T06srabhusu:4959: samohaṃ, vigatamohaṃ, saṃkṣiptaṃ, vikṣiptaṃ, līnaṃ, pragṛhītaṃ |
T06srabhusu:4980: tatra sukhāvedanā yatsukhavedanīyaṃ sparśaṃ pratītyotpadyate [|] sātaṃ,
T06srabhusu:4998: sā nirāmiṣā || yā punardhātupatitā, bhavapatitā sā sāmiṣā [|] yā puna(nā) rūpārūpya pratisaṃyuktā, vairāgyānukūlā vā, sā naiṣkramyāśritā |
T06srabhusu:4999: yā punaḥ kāyapratisaṃyuktā, na ca vairāgyānukūlā, sā gardhāśritā ||
T06srabhusu:5016: uddhataṃ cittaṃ yadati saṃpragrahādauddhatyaparyavasthitamanubaddhacittaṃ yatpragrahakāle cābhisaṃkṣepakāle copekṣā prāptaṃ [|]
T06srabhusu:5018: tatra samāhitaṃ cittaṃ yannivaraṇavimokṣānmauladhyānapraviṣṭaṃ, na susamāhitaṃ yadapraviṣṭaṃ
T06srabhusu:5019: tatra subhāvitaṃ cittaṃ yadasyaiva samādherdīrghakālaparicayānnikāmalābhī bhavatyakṛcchralābhī
T06srabhusu:5025: cittaṃ yanna sarvato nā(nā)pyatyantato vimuktamitīmāni caturdaśa cittāni (|) vihāragatāni veditavyāni |
T06srabhusu:5028: kleśaviśuddhiṃ punarārabhya vihāragatāni ṣaṭ cittāni yāvatsuvimuktaṃ cittaṃ na suvimuktamiti
T06srabhusu:5029: yatpunaḥ satyadhyātmaṃ nivaraṇe asti me nivaraṇamiti jānāti |
T06srabhusu:5030: asati nivaraṇe nāsti me nivaraṇamiti jānāti |
T06srabhusu:5036: asati yāvatpunaḥ (nmanaḥ) saṃyojane nāsti me manaḥ saṃyojanamiti prajānāti |
T06srabhusu:5041: satyadhyātmaṃ smṛtisaṃbodhyaṃge asti me [smṛti] saṃbodhyaṃgamiti prajānāti |
T06srabhusu:5048: satyadhyātmaṃ smṛtisaṃbodhyaṃgamevaṃ dharmavinayavīryapraśrabdhisamādhyupekṣāsaṃbodhyaṃgaṃ veditavyamiti yadevaṃ svabhāvādīnavapratipakṣākāraiḥ saṃkliṣṭadharmaparijñānamidaṃ
T06srabhusu:5050: smṛtyupasthānapakṣame (kṣae) vaṃ vedanā[yāṃ] yaccitte (yāvaccite) dharmeṣu yathāyogaṃ veditavyam
T06srabhusu:5052: kathaṃ bahirdhā kathamadhyātmabahirdhā [|] yadā adhyātmaṃ pratyātmaṃ satva(ttva)saṃkhyāte
T06srabhusu:5055: (Śbh_Sh 300) kathaṃ bahirdhā kathamadhyātmabahirdhā [|] yadā adhyātmaṃ pratyātmaṃ, yadā bahirdhā
T06srabhusu:5057: yadā bahirdhā (rdho)paraktaṃ sattvasaṃkhyātaṃ rūpamālambanīkarotyevamadhyātmabahirdhā kāye kāyānudarśī viharati |
T06srabhusu:5069: dharmāstānālambanīkurvannadhyātmabahirdhā vedanāyāṃ, citte dharmeṣu dharmānudarśī viharati
T06srabhusu:5071: indriyasaṃgṛhītaṃ rūpamālambanīkurvan, adhyātmaṃ kāye kāyānupaśyī (darśī) viharati |
T06srabhusu:5078: anindriyasaṃgṛhītameva rūpamadhyātmamupagatamupādattaṃ rūpamālambanīkurvannadhyātmabahirdhā kāye kāyānudarśī viharati] [|] evaṃ pūrvaṃ [ṃ] trividhaṃ rūpamupādāya |
T06srabhusu:5080: (yo)tpannā vedanā, cittaṃ, dharmāstānyathāyogamālambanīkurvan tathādarśī viharatīti veditavyaṃ
T06srabhusu:5082: yatsamāhitabhūmikaṃ praśrabdhisahagataṃ rūpamālambanīkarotyevamadhyātmaṃ kāye kāyānudarśī viharati |
T06srabhusu:5085: paradauṣṭhulyasahagataṃ praśrabdhisahagataṃ ca rūpamālambanīkurvan adhyātmabahirdhā kāye |
T06srabhusu:5087: evaṃ tadupādāyotpannā vedanā, cittaṃ, dharmā yathāyogaṃ veditavyāḥ |
T06srabhusu:5090: bāhyaṃ bhūtarūpamālambanī kurvan bahirdhā kāye kāyānudarśī viharati |
T06srabhusu:5094: evaṃ tadupādāya yā utpannā vedanā cittaṃ dharmāstepi yathāyogaṃ veditavyāḥ |
T06srabhusu:5101: [|] avijñāna[ka]sya ca rūpasyānāgate kāle avijñānatāṃ, tulyadharmatāṃ,
T06srabhusu:5102: samadharmatāṃ ālambanīkurvannadhyātmabahirdhā kāye kāyānudarśī viharatyevaṃ tadupādāya, yā utpannā vedanā, cittaṃ, dharmāstepi yathāyogaṃ veditavyāḥ |
T06srabhusu:5103: aparaḥ paryāyaḥ [|] ātmanaḥ anta[ḥ] kāyaṃ keśaromanakhādibhiḥ ākārairālambanīkurvannadhyātmabahirdhā kāye kāyānudarśī viharati ||
T06srabhusu:5104: pareṣāmantaḥ kāyaṃ keśaromanakhādibhirākārairālambanīkurvanbahirdhā kāye kāyānudarśī viharatyadhyātmaṃ cittaṃ ca bahiḥkāyavipariṇataṃ vinīlakādibhirākāraiḥ |
T06srabhusu:5106: vinīlakādibhirākāraistulyadharmatayā ālambanīkurvan bahirdhā kāye kāyānudarśī viharati |
T06srabhusu:5113: tatra caturṇāmviparyāsānāṃ pratipakṣeṇa bhagavatā catvāri smṛtyupasthānāni vyavasthāpitāni
T06srabhusu:5114: tatrāśucau śucīti viparyāse pratipakṣeṇa kāyasmṛtyupasthānaṃ vyavasthāpitaṃ |
T06srabhusu:5122: yatkiṃcidveditamidamatra duḥkhasyeti yathābhūtaṃ prajānātyevamasya yo duḥkhasukhe sukhamiti
T06srabhusu:5128: bahunānāprakāratāṃ cittasyopalabhya yaḥ anitye nityamiti viparyāsaḥ [sa]
T06srabhusu:5132: saṃkleśānāṃ sadbhāvādyeṣāṃ nānātmadṛṣṭyādikānāṃ kuśalānāṃ dharmāṇāmasadbhāvātskandheṣvātma darśanaṃ bhavati |
T06srabhusu:5142: skandhamātraṃ, dharmamātraṃ, yathābhūtamaprajānan yathā kāye āśritaḥ |
T06srabhusu:5143: yadāśritaśca sukhaduḥkha ja dharmādharmābhyāṃ saṃkliśyate vyavadā(dī)yate
T06srabhusu:5149: vijñāne, ātmagrāheṇa saṃmūḍhā, ātmavastusammohāpanayanārthaṃ dharmasmṛtyupasthānaṃ vyavasthāpitam
T06srabhusu:5164: viśudhyate yataśca yaśca yena saṃkliśyate viśudhyate ca |
T06srabhusu:5175: | tatra yā prajñā smṛtiśca samādhisaṃgrāhikā tatsvabhāvasmṛtyupasthānaṃ |
T06srabhusu:5184: sa evaṃ caturṣu smṛtyupasthāneṣu kṛtaparicaya audāriko(kau)dārikaṃ
T06srabhusu:5189: utpannānāṃ sthitaya iti vistareṇa pūrvavadyāvaccittaṃ pragṛhṇāti |
T06srabhusu:5191: tatra katame pāpakā akuśalā dharmā[ḥ] [|] yatkāmāvacaraṃ kliṣṭaṃ kāyakarma, vākkarma, manaskarma, kāyavāṅmanoduścaritasaṃgṛhītaṃ |
T06srabhusu:5192: yena tatsamutthāpakāḥ kleśāste punarye asamavahitā, asaṃmukhībhūtāste utpannā,
T06srabhusu:5193: (Śbh_Sh 308) ye samavahitāḥ saṃmukhībhūtāste utpannāḥ [|] tatra kuśalā dharmā ye tatprātipakṣikā
T06srabhusu:5196: utpannāśca pāpakā akuśalā dharmāstatra yadā anutpannānāṃ pāpakānāmakuśalānāṃ dharmāṇāmanutpādāya spṛhāmutpādayati |
T06srabhusu:5198: sarveṇa sarvaṃ sarvathā notpādayiṣyāmītyevaṃ chandaṃ janayati |
T06srabhusu:5204: te punaḥ pāpakā akuśalā dharmā atītavastvālambanā vā, anāgatavastvālambanā
T06srabhusu:5206: yenoktaviṣayālambanā[ḥ], pratyakṣaviṣayālambanāśca ye atītānāgatāvasthālambanāste, ye coktaviṣayālambanā, ye vartamānaviṣayālambanāste pratyakṣaviṣayālambanā[ḥ |]
T06srabhusu:5225: evamayamanutpannānāṃ pāpakānāmakuśalānāṃ dharmāṇāmanutpādāyotpannānāṃ ca prahāṇāya vyāyacchata ityucyate |
T06srabhusu:5226: sa cedayamvarttamāne ālambane carati, tathā tathā carati |
T06srabhusu:5235: santi pāpakā akuśalā dharmā ye saṃkalpavaśe (bale)notpadyante |
T06srabhusu:5250: utpannānāñca prahāṇāya vyāyaccha(te) tatra ye viṣayabalena saṃkalpabalena cotpadyante |
T06srabhusu:5254: [a]saṃmukhībhūtasya (tāḥ) teṣāṃ pratilambhāya saṃmukhībhāvāya ca smṛti mutpādayati [|] cittaṃ praṇidhatte [|] tīvrā pratilabdhukāmatā |
T06srabhusu:5257: kṛ(ya)ttu utpannānāṃ ca kuśalānāṃ dharmāṇāṃ sthitaye, asaṃmoṣāya,
T06srabhusu:5270: utpannānāṃ kuśalānāṃ dharmāṇāṃ sthitaye asaṃmoṣāya bhāvanāparipūraye [c]chandaḥ |
T06srabhusu:5289: evaṃ vistareṇa yāvadutpannānāṃ kuśalānāṃ dharmāṇāṃ sthitaye |
T06srabhusu:5308: tadyathā kṛṣṇapakṣyāṇāṃ tatraikaṃ samvaraṇaprahāṇaṃ yadutpannānāmpāpakānāmakuśalānāṃ dharmāṇāṃ
T06srabhusu:5310: dvitīyaṃ prahāṇaprahāṇaṃ yadanutpannānāmanutpādāya [c]chandaṃ janayatīti vistareṇa, utpannaṃ hi saṃvarayitavyaṃ |
T06srabhusu:5312: anutpannaṃ ca yattadasamudācārataḥ prahīṇamevaṃ tadasaṃmukhībhāvataḥ prahātavyamiti kṛtvā
T06srabhusu:5316: anutpannānāṃ kuśalānāṃ dharmāṇāmutpādāyeti vistareṇa yāvaccittaṃ pragṛhṇāti, pradadhātīti
T06srabhusu:5317: tathā hi kuśalā dharmā āsevyamānā, bhāvyamānā, apratilabdhāśca pratilabhyante |
T06srabhusu:5328: evamanutpannāḥ kuśalā dharmā anurakṣitā bhavantyayaṃ tāvatsamyakprahāṇānāṃ vistaravibhāgaḥ
T06srabhusu:5339: | yatprahātavyasya vustanaḥ prahāṇāya, prāptavyasya vastunaḥ prāptaye
T06srabhusu:5341: vīryamārabdhavyamanuśayaprahāṇāya ca, kālena kālaṃ śamathapragrahopekṣānimittāni (Śbh_Sh 314) bhāvayitavyāni |
T06srabhusu:5342: paryavasthānaprahāṇānuśayaprahāṇāya ca ye prātipakṣikā dharmāḥ kuśalāste samudānayitavyāḥ
T06srabhusu:5343: taccaitatsarvaṃ caturbhiḥ samyakprahāṇaiḥ paridīpitaṃ bhavatyayaṃ samāsārthaḥ ||
T06srabhusu:5348: tatra chanda(samādhi)madhipatiṃ kṛtvā yaḥ pratilabhyate samādhirayaṃ chandasamādhiḥ |
T06srabhusu:5365: sa (sā) atītā (te) vā, anāgatapratyutpanne vā punarālambane pāpakākuśalādharmāsthānīye
T06srabhusu:5368: tatrālambane vicaratyantasya vālambanasya svabhāvato nidānataḥ pratipakṣataśca |
T06srabhusu:5378: kuśalāndharmān kuśalākuśalasthānīyāṃśca dharmān svabhāvato, nidānata, ādīnavataḥ,
T06srabhusu:5381: tadbahulavihāriṇo yā utpadyante cittasyaikāgratāḥ vistareṇa yāvadayaṃ |
T06srabhusu:5389: samādhipramukheṣu dharmeṣvanutpanneṣu te pāpakā akuśalā dharmā dharma mudā haranti |
T06srabhusu:5396: tadbahulavihārī ca spṛśati] cittasyaikāgratāṃ yena ca nirabhimāno bhavati |
T06srabhusu:5399: tatpratipakṣāśca me samādhipramukhāḥ kuśalā dharmā[ś]ca pratilabdhā, bhāvitā, na tvanuśayaprātipākṣikā iti yathābhūtaṃ prajānāti |
T06srabhusu:5401: sa taṃ caturvidhaṃ samādhimadhipatiṃ kṛtvā paryavasthāneṣu dūrīkṛteṣu |
T06srabhusu:5405: vyāyacchata iti vistareṇa caturbhiḥ samyakprahāṇaiḥ prayujyate
T06srabhusu:5420: tatra smṛtiryā navākārā navākārāyāścittasthiteḥ śamathapakṣyāyāḥ saṃgrāhikā |
T06srabhusu:5424: prahīṇāprahīṇato mīmānsa(māṃsa) mānasya yaścittābhisaṃskāraḥ śamathavipaśyanānukūlaḥ kāyakarma vākkarma samutthāpayati |
T06srabhusu:5426: ābhyāṃ dvābhyāṃ kāraṇābhyāṃ prahīṇatāmanuśayānāṃ paricchinatti jānāti |
T06srabhusu:5430: tatra chanda(cchanda)śca, eta(ṣa) eva yo vyāyāmaḥ idaṃ vīryaṃ, yāśraddhā sā śuddhā, yā ca praśrabdhiryā ca smṛtiryacca saṃprajanyaṃ |
T06srabhusu:5434: ye ca ime prahāṇasaṃskārāḥ prahīṇeṣvanuśayeṣu, (Śbh_Sh 321) parikṣipte samādhau,
T06srabhusu:5443: paripūrṇaḥ [|] sa evaṃ pariśuddhe citte, paryavadāte, anaṃgaṇe, vigatopakleśe, ṛjubhūte
T06srabhusu:5446: eṣā hi parā ṛddhiḥ, parā samṛddhiḥ |
T06srabhusu:5453: pareṣāṃ cādhigame śāstuḥ śrāvakāṇāṃ ca yo [a]bhisaṃpratyayaḥ |
T06srabhusu:5459: ye [a]pi te vīryādayaḥ teṣāmapi lokottaradharmotpattaye ādhipatyaṃ |
T06srabhusu:5471: asaṃhāyā(ryā)sā śraddhā devena vā, māreṇa vā,
T06srabhusu:5476: taiḥ sa balairbalavān sarvaṃ mārabalaṃ vijitya prayujyate |
T06srabhusu:5479: tatra yaśca(yacca) śraddhendriyaṃ, yacca śraddhābalaṃ caturṣvetadavetya
T06srabhusu:5487: na tu taccharīratāṃ tallakṣaṇatāṃ [|] tatra vīryendriyaṃ caturṣu
