T06srabhusu:5491: samyakprahāṇāni, tānyatra samyakprahāṇānyabhipretāni tāni hyatyantatāyai pāpakānāmakuśalānāṃ dharmāṇāṃ prahāṇāya samvarttante ||
T06srabhusu:5495: yāni dhyānānyagāmitāyāṃ prāyogikāni (ṇi) tatra prajñendriyaṃ caturdhvāryasatyeṣu draṣṭavyamiti
T06srabhusu:5514: bhūyasyā mātrayā abhivarddhamānā [|] nirarcciṣamagniṃ pātayatyagnipatanasamanantarameva cārcirjāyate |
T06srabhusu:5517: yathā abhimanthana vyāyāma evaṃ pañcānāmindriyāṇāmāsevanā draṣṭavyā |
T06srabhusu:5518: yathā adharaṇyā tatprathamata eva ūṣmagataṃ bhavati |
T06srabhusu:5525: yathā dhūmaprādurbhāva evaṃ satyānulomāḥ kṣāntayo draṣṭavyāḥ || yathāgneḥ patanaṃ nirarcciṣa evaṃ laukikā agradharmā draṣṭavyāḥ |
T06srabhusu:5526: yathā tadanantaramarcciṣaḥ (|) utpāda evaṃ lokottarā anāsravā dharmā draṣṭavyā (|) ye laukikā agradharmasagṛhītānāṃ pañcānāmindriyāṇāṃ samanantaramutpadyante |
T06srabhusu:5537: yacca vīryaṃ, yā ca prītiritīmāni trīṇi vipaśyanāpakṣyāṇi |
T06srabhusu:5538: tatra yā ca praśrabdhiryaśca samārdhiyā copekṣā itīmāni trīṇi śamathapakṣyāṇi [|] smṛtirabhayapakṣyā(s)
T06srabhusu:5539: | sa tasmin samaye tatprathamato bodhyaṃgalābhācchaikṣo bhavati |
T06srabhusu:5543: tatra yā ca samyagdṛṣṭiryaśca samyaksaṃkalpaḥ, yaśca samyagvyāyāmaḥ |
T06srabhusu:5547: tatra yā ca samyaksmṛtiḥ, yaśca samyaksamādhirayaṃ samādhiskandhaḥ |
T06srabhusu:5550: āryasya śaikṣasya dṛṣṭapadasyāyaṃ mārga iyaṃ pratipadaṣṭābhiraṃgaiḥ saṃgṛhītā(ḥ) ||
T06srabhusu:5553: tatra yaśca bodhyaṃgakāle tattvāvabodhaḥ (||) pratilabdhaḥ, pratilabhya ca yattasyaiva prajñayā vyavasthānaṃ karoti || yathāvigatasyāvabodhasya,
T06srabhusu:5560: sa evaṃ rūpādvitarkādvitarkayati [|] sa cetpunaḥ kathāyāṃ cittaṃ (Śbh_Sh 328)
T06srabhusu:5574: vihāragato vā punaḥ paryeṣiteṣu cīvarādiṣu gate,
T06srabhusu:5584: te anena pūrvameva manaskāralābhādbodhyaṃgaireva saha labdhā bhavanti |
T06srabhusu:5586: kena kāraṇena dīrgha kālaṃ hyetadāryāṇāṃ satāṃ samyaggatānāmiṣṭaṃ kāntaṃ priyaṃ mana āpaṃ kaccidahaṃ tadvāgduścaritasya,
T06srabhusu:5590: kāntaṃ priyaṃ mana āpaṃ tadanena tasminsamaye pratilabdhaṃ bhavati |
T06srabhusu:5592: tathā hi sa labdheṣvāpakānteṣu śīleṣu, na saṃprajā[nā]no mṛṣāṃ vācaṃ bhāṣate |
T06srabhusu:5597: iti tānyāpakāntāni śīlānyadhipatiṃ kṛtvā mārgabhāvanākāle yāvatpravartate |
T06srabhusu:5598: yacca kāyakarma yaścājīvaḥ tepi samyagvākkarmāntājīvā ityucyante |
T06srabhusu:5605: yaccatvāri smṛtyupasthānānyadhipatiṃ kṛtvā aviparyāyasaṃgṛhītā smṛtiḥ navākārā navākāracittasthitisaṃgrāhikā
T06srabhusu:5609: tadetatsarvamabhisamasya āryāṣṭāṃgo mārgaścārakaraṇīye ca vihārakaraṇīye cāvasthitaḥ |
T06srabhusu:5612: śamatho vipaśyanā ca [|] tatra yā samyagdṛṣṭiḥ |
T06srabhusu:5615: tatra yā ca samyaksamṛtiryaśca samyaksamādhisyaṃ śamathaḥ |
T06srabhusu:5621: jñānamātrapratibaddhavastudarśanamārgaḥ jñānotpattimātreṇa kleśān prajahātyanena kāraṇena vākkarmāntājīvā bhāvanāmārge vyavasthāpitāḥ |
T06srabhusu:5622: iti ya evameṣāmanayā ānupūrvyā saptatriṃśatāṃ bodhapakṣyāṇāṃ
T06srabhusu:5636: api ca pūrvotpannasya mārgasya paścādutpanno mārgaḥ |
T06srabhusu:5638: madhyo, viśiṣṭo (Śbh_Sh 332) vā, punaḥ [|] tatra kena kāraṇena catvāri vyavasthāpitāni |
T06srabhusu:5641: tadyathā nirvastukānāṃ kleśānāmapāyagamanahetubhūtānāṃ prahāṇātpratipakṣotpādācca srota āpattiphalaṃ vyavasthāpitaṃ |
T06srabhusu:5644: durākhyātadharmavinaya pakṣe ca, trayāṇāṃ saṃyojanānāṃ mārgotpattaye
T06srabhusu:5647: yayā yamādita eva na prayutyata ityādita u[t]trāsikā satkāyadṛṣṭiḥ |
T06srabhusu:5653: api svābhyāsāttasya yāvad yathābhūtadarśanaṃ na bhavati |
T06srabhusu:5658: tasyāsya srota āpannasya paraṃ sapta bhavā avaśiṣṭā bhavanti |
T06srabhusu:5661: devabhavasaṃgṛhītānmanuṣyasaṃgṛhītāṃśca [|] yeṣāṃ prahāṇātparamekaṃ devabhavamabhinirvarttayatyekaṃ manuṣyabhavaṃ [|] tasminsamaye sakṛdāgāmiphalaṃ vyavasthāpyate |
T06srabhusu:5663: iha pratyāgamajanmikaṃ kleśaṃ prahāya tadā anāgāmiphalaṃ vyavasthāpyate ||
T06srabhusu:5666: tatpunaḥ sakṛdāgāmiphalaṃ trayāṇāṃ saṃyojanānāṃ prahāṇādrāgadveṣamohānāṃ ca |
T06srabhusu:5678: ayaṃ tveṣāṃ viśeṣo rāgādicaritaḥ prayujyamānaścireṇādhigantā bhavati |
T06srabhusu:5679: samabhāgacarito nāticireṇa, mandarajaskastu āśu tvarita tvaritaṃ cittasthitamadhigacchati
T06srabhusu:5681: samabhāgacaritasya pudgalasya mandarajaskasya ca katamāni liṃgāni |
T06srabhusu:5683: samabhāgacaritasya pudgalasya sarvāṇi tāni liṃgāni saṃvidyante |
T06srabhusu:5685: rāgādicaritānāṃ, tāni rāgā[dī]ni tu nādhimātrāṇi, na pradhānāni |
T06srabhusu:5686: tathā rāgādicaritānāṃ samaprāptāni (Śbh_Sh 335) bhavanti pratyayeṣu satsu na prajñāyante |
T06srabhusu:5704: yā dṛṣṭe dharme caritaviśodhanenālambanaviśodhanena na śakyate viśodhayituṃ |
T06srabhusu:5705: tatra vipākāvaraṇaṃ yatrāryamārgasya apravṛttiraprasāda upapattyāyatane [|] tatra vā vipākamabhinirvarttayati
T06srabhusu:5707: tatropapatro jāto bhavatyeḍamūko hastasaṃbādhikaḥ apratibalo bhavati |
T06srabhusu:5710: 336) śīlaṃ ca suviśuddhaṃ dṛṣṭiśca ṛjvī [|] tatra śīlaṃ suviśuddhaṃ |
T06srabhusu:5714: adhimuktisaṃprayogāddhi tamāryā [a]śāṭhyatayā sucintita dharmārthasya niḥkāṃkṣanirvicikitsāprayoganiryāṇatayā yā dṛṣṭiḥ śraddhayā
T06srabhusu:5716: asmāddharma vinayādasaṃhāryādadhimuktyā ca saṃprayuktā buddhānāṃ buddhaśrāvakāṇāṃ ca |
T06srabhusu:5721: vigatamāyāśāṭhyā ca yā dṛṣṭiḥ yayā ṛjuko bhavati |
T06srabhusu:5739: tatra puṇyasabhāro yenāpyetarhi ānulomikāḥ pariṣkārāḥ prādurābhavanti |
T06srabhusu:5752: tathā paripakvendriyasya śīlasamvara, indriyasamvara iti vistareṇa pūrvavat |
T06srabhusu:5771: yathoktaṃ śramaṇālaṃkāre tairayaṃ prakṛtyaiva samanvāgato bhavati |
T06srabhusu:5772: itīmānyevaṃ bhāgīyāni mandarajaskasya pudgalasya liṃgāni veditavyāni ||
T06srabhusu:5795: darśanabhāvanāprahātavyānāṃ kleśānāṃ vijayāttatra tathāgato bodhisattvaścāyatyāṃ bodhāya pratipannāḥ
T06srabhusu:5800: tatra ye pṛthagjanakalyāṇakā ātmahitāya pratipannā śajjinaḥ
T06srabhusu:5803: aprāptasya prāptaye anadhigatasyādhigamāya āsākṣātkṛtasya sākṣātkriyāyai prayuktā, bhavyāśca
T06srabhusu:5804: pratibalā, yāvadasākṣātkṛtasya sākṣātkriyāyai [|] ima ucyante mārga
T06srabhusu:5806: apyeṣāmūṣmā yene[ya]masya āryasya prajñendriyasyotpattaye, na mṛtā jīvantītyucyate |
T06srabhusu:5808: tatra yoyaṃ pudgalo duḥśīlaḥ pāpadharmā yāvadabrahamacārī [brahmacārī] (ri) pratijñaḥ |
T06srabhusu:5809: ayamucyate mārgadūṣī dūṣitonena mārgo bhavati mūlata āditaḥ |
T06srabhusu:5828: tatra saṃjñābrāhmaṇa iti loke nāma bhavati, saṃjñā, samājñā,
T06srabhusu:5844: tatra tadantaraprahāyī yo laukikena mārgeṇa kāmavītarāgaḥ pṛthagjanaḥ |
T06srabhusu:5879: api ca pravrājayatyātmanaḥ pāpakānakuśalān dharmān sa pravrajita ityucyate |
T06srabhusu:5891: yadvā saṃpra [.........................................] jña upāyajña[ḥ] kuśala ityarthaḥ
T06srabhusu:5896: sa tāvadupāyajñopi sātatikopi kṛtaparicayopi nārādhako bhavati |
T06srabhusu:5901: tatra paripakvendriyo, bhavatyupāyajño, na sātatiko, na kṛtaparicayaḥ |
T06srabhusu:5905: sātatikaḥ, kṛtaparicayaśca bhavatyevaṃ sa ārādhako bhavati |
T06srabhusu:5925: yaścāsau mṛtyuryena ca mṛtyuṃ namayati, krāmayatyantarāyikena vastunā [|]
T06srabhusu:5932: yena naiva vā śaknoti maraṇadharmatāṃ samatikramitum || kālāntareṇa vā samatikrāmati |
T06srabhusu:5936: tatra yo vītarāgaḥ (|) eva hastagato yathākāmaṃ karaṇīyaḥ |
T06srabhusu:5944: yasya raṃjanīyeṣu rūpeṣu sahagatvarasampraṣṭavyadharmeṣu nimittagrāhitāyāmanuvyaṃjanagrāhitāyāṃ cittaṃ praskandati |
T06srabhusu:5946: evaṃ bhojaneṣu mātrajñasya viharataḥ praṇīteṣu raseṣu chandarāgamanunayena cittaṃ praskandati
T06srabhusu:5947: bhaktavaiṣamye evaṃ pūrvarātrāpararātraṃ jāgarikāyo gamananuyuktasya viharataḥ |
T06srabhusu:5952: abhikramapratikramādiṣu śiśumudāravarṇaṃ raṃjanīyaṃ mātṛgrāmaṃ dṛṣṭvā ayoniśo nimittagrāheṇa cittaṃ praskandati |
T06srabhusu:5955: tadyathā gṛhasthapravrajitaiḥ saṃsargārāmatāyāṃ, pāpamitraiḥ saha ekavyavasitāyāṃ,
T06srabhusu:5958: buddhe, dharme, saṃghe, duḥkhe, samudaye, nirodhe, mārge |
T06srabhusu:5962: araṇyagato vā, vṛkṣamūlagato vā, śūnyāgāragato vā, mahāntambhayabhairavaṃ
T06srabhusu:5974: itīmānyevaṃbhāgīyāni mārakarmāṇi veditavyāni tāni caturṇāṃ mārāṇāṃ yathāyogaṃ ||
T06srabhusu:6011: vā, puruṣo, gurusthānīyo vā, caturṣu sthāneṣu smṛtimupasthāpya
T06srabhusu:6018: na lābhasatkārārthamevaṃ ca punarupasaṃkramya kālenāvakāśaṃ kṛtvā, ekāṃsamuttarāsaṃgaṃ kṛtvā, dakṣiṇaṃ jānumaṇḍalaṃ pṛthivyāṃ pratiṣṭhāpya, nīcataramevāsane niṣadya, sapratīśena yoga āyācitavyaḥ ahamasmiṃ (smi) yogenārthī, yogaṃ ādikṣvānukampāmupādāya |
T06srabhusu:6019: ityevañca punarāyācitena yoginā yogajñena sa ādikarmikaḥ,
T06srabhusu:6044: bahujanahitāya, lokānukampāyai, (Śbh_Sh 353) arthāya, hitāya, sukhāya devamanuṣyāṇāmityevaṃbhāgīyaiḥ ślakṣṇairvacanapathaiḥ |
T06srabhusu:6046: (saṃharṣya) prahāṇe cānuśaṃsaṃ darśayitvā, caturṣu paripṛcchāsthānīyeṣu dharmeṣu paripraṣṭavyaḥ
T06srabhusu:6048: dharmaṃ, saṃghaṃ, no cetobahirdhānyaṃ śāstāraṃ vā, dakṣiṇīyamvā saṃjānāti,
T06srabhusu:6049: kaccitte ādipariśodhitādbrahmacaryasya bhāvanāyai śīlaṃ ca te saviśuddhaṃ,
T06srabhusu:6050: dṛṣṭiśca ṛjvī kaccitte āryasatyānāmuddeśavibhaṃgamāramya dharmaḥ śrutaścodgṛhītaśca |
T06srabhusu:6051: alpo vā, prabhūto vā, kaccitte nirvāṇā dhimuktaṃ
T06srabhusu:6055: tata uttari caturṣu sthāneṣu caturbhiḥ kāraṇaiḥ samanveṣitavyaḥ |
T06srabhusu:6059: caritataśca samanveṣitavyaḥ kathayā, ceṣṭayā, cetaḥ paryāyasthānena paryeṣitavyaḥ |
T06srabhusu:6064: pratyekabuddhayāne mahāyāne [|] (Śbh_Sh 355) sa yatra yatra kṛtapraṇidhāno bhaviṣyati |
T06srabhusu:6067: kathaṃ pṛcchayā gotramindriyaṃ caritaṃ ca [|] samanveṣitavyaṃ |
T06srabhusu:6069: āyuṣmānātmano gotramvā, indriyamvā, caritaṃ vā [|] kiṃ gotrohaṃ |
T06srabhusu:6070: kīdṛśāni me indriyāṇi mṛdūni, madhyāni, tīkṣṇāni, kiṃ rāgacaritaḥ |
T06srabhusu:6083: tasya tata uttarakālaṃ kathayā tāvattrīṇi samanveṣitavyāni |
T06srabhusu:6085: citrairgamakaidhurairvacanapathaiḥsa tasyāṃ kathāyāṃ kathyamānāyāṃ sa cecchrāvakagotro bhavatyatyarthaṃ tayā kathayā prīyate |
T06srabhusu:6088: mahāyānapratisaṃyuktāyāmvā punaḥ kathāyāṃ kathyamānāyāṃ yo mahāyānagotraḥ so 'tyarthaṃ prīyate
T06srabhusu:6101: sa prasadanīyāyāṃ kathāyāṃ kathyamānāyā matyarthaṃ prasīdati ramate |
T06srabhusu:6104: cāptā ca magru (aśru?) prapātaṃ ca snigdhasantānatāṃ, mṛducittatāṃ, dravacittatāṃ copadarśayati
T06srabhusu:6106: nirvedhikāyāṃ kathāyāṃ kathyamānāyāṃ nirvāṇapratisaṃyuktāyāṃ nirāmiṣamu[t]trasya saṃtrāsamāpadyate
T06srabhusu:6123: śrāvakagotrasya, rāgacaritānāṃ ca pudgalānāṃ tāni ceṣṭetyucyate |
T06srabhusu:6124: tayā ca ceṣṭayā yathāyogaṃ gotramindriyaṃ caritaṃ ca samanveṣitavyaṃ |
T06srabhusu:6126: yathāpi sa yogī yogajño lābhī bhavati cetaḥ paryāyajñānasya [|] sa tena paracittajñānena gotramindriyaṃ, caritaṃ ca yathābhūtaṃ prajānāti |
T06srabhusu:6127: (Śbh_Sh 358) etāni catvāri sthānānyebhiścaturbhiḥ kāraṇaissamanveṣya pañcasu sthāneṣu vinayate
T06srabhusu:6130: tatra samādhisaṃbhārarakṣopacayaḥ yāvatā śīlasamvareṇa samanvāgato bhavati |
T06srabhusu:6131: tatra cāpramādavihārī bhavatyapapariṇāya buddhānuśiṣṭasya ca buddhānujñātasya
T06srabhusu:6132: pudgalasya, śīlaskandhasya śikśāpadapratipattyā vīryaṃ na sransa (sraṃsa)yati |
T06srabhusu:6135: yathā śīlasamvara evamindriyasamvaraḥ, bhojane mātrajñatā, pūrvarātrāpararātraṃ
T06srabhusu:6137: yasya yasya saṃbhāraparigṛhītasya dharmapravibhāgasya lābhī bhavati |
T06srabhusu:6138: sa taṃ vā rakṣatyuttari (raṃ) ca pravibhāgasya pāripūraye |
T06srabhusu:6141: sa evaṃ hānabhāgīyāṃśca dharmān virajyati, śeṣabhāgīyāṃśca dharmān pratiṣevamāṇaḥ
T06srabhusu:6148: parvatakandaraṃ vā, giriguhā vā, palālapuṃjāni vā śūnyāgāramityucyate |
T06srabhusu:6157: puṣkariṇīsampannaṃ, śubhaṃ, ramaṇīyaṃ, notkūlanikūlaṃ, na sthāṇukaṇṭakadhānaṃ |
T06srabhusu:6169: (Śbh_Sh 360) punaraparaṃ ye te ānulomikā jīvitapariṣkārāścī varādayaḥ |
T06srabhusu:6176: gaṃbhīraṃ cārthapadaṃ prajñayā pratividhya suṣṭhu ca prakāśayanti |
T06srabhusu:6181: niṣadya yāvatā evaṃ rātryāḥ prathamaṃ yāmaṃ, madhyame na (ca) yāme dakṣiṇena pārśvena (ṇa) śayyāṃ kalpayati |
T06srabhusu:6184: tasminnidaṃ sampanne śayanāsane, tathā buddhānujñāte mañce vā, pīṭhe vā, tṛṇe vā, saṃstaraṇe vā niṣīdati |
T06srabhusu:6186: kena kāraṇena pañca kāraṇāni samanupaśyan saṃpiṇḍitena kāyena praśrabdhirutpadyate |
T06srabhusu:6192: tathā pare aneneryāpathena niṣaṇṇaṃ dṛṣṭvā atyarthamabhiprasīdanti buddhaiśca buddhaśrāvakaiścāyaṃ īryāpatho niṣevitaścānujñātaśca [|] imāni paṃcakāraṇāni |
T06srabhusu:6198: tatra ṛjunā kāyena pragṛhītena styānamiddhaṃ cittaṃ na paryādāya tiṣṭhati |
T06srabhusu:6199: niṣkuhakena citte bahirdhā vikṣepo na paryādāya tiṣṭhati |
T06srabhusu:6204: api ca samādhinimittālambanā pratibhālambanā smṛtiḥ pratimukhe (khī) tyucyate |
T06srabhusu:6211: | tatra kāyavyapakarṣo yo gṛhasthapravrajitaiḥ sārdhamavihāritā || tatra cittavyapakarṣaḥ yaḥ kliṣṭamavyākṛtaṃ ca manaskāraṃ ca varjayitvā |
T06srabhusu:6212: samāhitabhūmikaṃ vā samādhisaṃbhāraprāyogikaṃ vā manaskāraṃ bhāvayati |
T06srabhusu:6223: ye dharmā udgṛhītā[ḥ] śrutā, yā cāvavādānuśāsanī pratilabdhā bhavati |
T06srabhusu:6224: gurubhyastāmadhipatiṃ kṛtvā samāhitabhūmikanimittaṃ saṃmukhīkṛtya tadālambanāṃ pravāhayuktāṃ smṛtimanuvarttayati |
T06srabhusu:6236: tenālambanena satataṃ ca satkṛtya ceyaṃ pravāhayuktatā |
T06srabhusu:6240: samādhiriti sā khalveṣā ekāgratā śamathapakṣyā vipaśyanāpakṣyā ca |
T06srabhusu:6241: tatra yā navākārāyāṃ cittasaṃtathau (sthitau) vā [sā] śamathapakṣyā,
T06srabhusu:6257: tadba[la]maudārikamasaṃsthitamaparisaṃsthitaṃ tasminnevālambane pravarddhanayogena prasādayogena sābhinigrahaṃ sūkṣmīkurvan abhisaṃkṣipan
T06srabhusu:6269: tāmadhipatiṃ kṛtvā teṣu nimitteṣu tasya cittasya prasaraṃ na dadāti |
T06srabhusu:6301: yacchrutaṃ, yā cintā [tā]madhipatiṃ kṛtvā cittamādita ālambane sthāpayati |
T06srabhusu:6312: tatra navākārāyāṃ cittasthitau catvāro manaskārā veditavyāḥ |
T06srabhusu:6319: upasthāpayato, damayataḥ, śamayataḥ, vyupaśamayataḥ, sacchidravāhano manaskāraḥ |
T06srabhusu:6324: yaḥ punarevamadhyātmaṃ cetaḥśamathasya lābhī vipaśyanāyāṃ prayujyate |
T06srabhusu:6325: tasyaita eva catvāro manaskārā vipaśyanāpakṣyā bhavanti ||
T06srabhusu:6344: sā khalveṣā vipaśyanā trimukhī ṣaḍvastuprabhedālambanā veditavyā(ḥ) |
T06srabhusu:6357: yadā punastīrayitvā upaparīkṣya yathā vyavasthāpitameva pratyavekṣate |
T06srabhusu:6362: arthaṃ, vastu, lakṣaṇaṃ, pakṣaṃ, kālaṃ, yuktiñca paryeṣyannetānyeva (paryeṣamāṇa etānyeva) pratyavekṣate |
T06srabhusu:6367: dvividhaṃ vastu [|] ādhyātmikaṃ bāhyañca [|] evaṃ vastu paryeṣate |
T06srabhusu:6392: ayandharmaḥ, idaṃ kāritraṃ, ayamidaṃ kāritra iti [|]
T06srabhusu:6394: āptāgamamanumānaṃ pratyakṣaṃ ca [|] kimasti (|) atrātmā, nāstīti kiṃ pratyakṣamupalabhyate
T06srabhusu:6395: na veti, kimanumānena prayujyate na veti |
T06srabhusu:6396: tatra dharmatāyuktayā tathābhūtatāṃ dharmāṇāṃ prasiddhadharmatāmacintyadharmatāmavasthitadharmatāmadhimucyate, na cintayati |
T06srabhusu:6401: kena punaḥ kāraṇena ṣaṭprabhedā vyavasthāpitā[ḥ |] āha |
T06srabhusu:6415: āha [|] aśubhādhipateyaṃ dharmaṃ śrutamudagṛhītamadhipatiṃ kṛtvā samāhitabhūmikena
T06srabhusu:6422: kathaṃ vastu paryeṣate [|] sa evamarthapratisaṃvedī tāmaśubhatāṃ
T06srabhusu:6425: adhyātmaṃ tāvadantaḥ kāyagatāmaśubhatāṃ pratyaśubhatāmadhimucyate || santyasminkāye keśaromāṇi
T06srabhusu:6427: tāṃ punaranekavidhāmantaḥ kāyagatāmaśubhatāṃ dvābhyāṃ dhātubhyāṃ saṃgṛhītāmadhimucyate |
T06srabhusu:6433: yadanena mṛtakuṇapaṃ svayaṃ vā dṛṣṭaṃ bhavati |
T06srabhusu:6434: purato vā śrutaṃ parikalpitaṃ vā, puna[ḥ] striyā vā, puruṣasya vā,
T06srabhusu:6435: mitrasya vā, amitrasya vā, udāsīnasya vā |
T06srabhusu:6437: dahrasya vā, madhyasya vā, vṛddhasya vā [|]
T06srabhusu:6438: tatra nimittamudgṛhya ekāhamṛtaṃ pragaḍitaśoṇitamayaṃ prāptapūyabhāvaṃ vinīlakamityadhimucyate
T06srabhusu:6441: saptāhamṛtaṃ saṃjātakṛmi ādhmātaṃ ca vimadrāmakaṃ vyādhmātakamityadhimucyate kākaiḥ kuralai(rai)ḥ khādyamānaṃ gṛddhaiḥ śvabhiḥ śrṛgālairvikhādikamityadhimucyate |
T06srabhusu:6443: diśodiśamaṃgapratyaṃgeṣu vikṣipteṣu viśleṣiteṣu samānse(māṃse)ṣu nirmānse (māṃse)ṣu kiṃcicchiṣṭamānse(māṃse)ṣu
T06srabhusu:6469: api ca dvau śaṃkalikāyānimittagrāhau citrakṛtāyāḥ pāṣāṇa kāṣṭhaśādakṛtāyā vā |
T06srabhusu:6479: sa khalveṣa bāhyāyā varṇanibhāyā upādāyarūpagatāyāstrividho (|) vipariṇāmaḥ |
T06srabhusu:6485: tatrāsthikā (vā), śaṃkalikā vā ityayamubhayapakṣyo vipariṇāma iti |
T06srabhusu:6490: yathā cādhyātmaṃ bahiḥ kāyasyāśubhāvarṇanibhayā apariṇatā yāvadbahirdhā bahiḥ kāyasyāśubhā varṇanibhā vipariṇatā adhyātmikayā aśubhayā varṇanibhā samānadharmatāṃ tulyadharmatāmadhimucyate iyamapi me śubhā varṇanibhā evaṃ dharmiṇīti |
T06srabhusu:6491: ye 'pi kecitsattvā anayā śubhayā varṇanibhayā samanvāgatāsteṣāmapi sāśubhāyāṃ evaṃ dharmiṇī tadyatheyambāhyā || evaṃ sāmānyalakṣaṇaṃ paryeṣate |
T06srabhusu:6495: varṇanibhayā etāmaśubhamatā (tāṃ) yathābhūtamaprajānannadhyātmaṃ vā bahirdhā vā śubhāyāṃ varṇanibhāyāṃ saṃrāgamutpādayāmi viparyāsa eva kṛṣṇapakṣasaṃgṛhītaḥ |
T06srabhusu:6500: aśubhadharmatānugatā yathābhūtānupaśyanā śuklapakṣyā [|] eṣa dharmaḥ aduḥkhaḥ |
T06srabhusu:6511: varṇanibhā seyamvarttamānamadhvānamupādāya yā punariyaṃ bahirdhā aśubhā varṇanibhā iyamapi vartamāna (tā)mevādhvānamupādāya |
T06srabhusu:6514: saiṣā tāvadatītamadhvānamupādāya śubhā satī tadyathā me etarhi |
T06srabhusu:6516: evamānupūrvyā etarhi vartamānamupādāya aśubhā saṃvṛttā, sā me iyaṃ [a]śubhā varṇanibhā varttamānamadhvānamupādāyāśubhā satī |
T06srabhusu:6521: iti hyatītānāgatapratyutpanneṣvadhvasu ayamapi me kāya evaṃbhāvī, evaṃbhūta, etāṃ ca dharmatāmanatīta ityevaṃ kālaṃ samanveṣate |
T06srabhusu:6525: sattvo vādhyātmaṃ vā, bahirdhāvopalabhya[mānaḥ] yaḥ śubho vā syādaśubho vā [|] (Śbh_Sh 376) api ca rūpamātrametatkaṇḍavaramātrametadyatreyaṃ saṃjñā samājñā prajñaptirvyavahāraḥ śubhamiti vā aśubhamiti vā |
T06srabhusu:6529: tasyāsya mṛtasya kālagatasyānupūrveṇa vipariṇatā imā avasthāḥ prajñāyante
T06srabhusu:6530: | yaduta vinīlakamitivā yāvadasthiśaṃkalikāyā vā ayamapi me kāyaḥ |
T06srabhusu:6533: yena hetunā, yena nidānena iyaṃ tāvatkālikī śubhā varṇanibhā |
T06srabhusu:6535: | antaḥkāyaḥ punarnityaṃ nityakālamadhyātmaṃ ca bahirdhā cāśubhā evaṃ saṃvṛtiparamārthanidānataḥ
T06srabhusu:6542: aśubhā āsevitā bhāvitā bahulīkṛtā kāmarāgaprahāṇāya samvarttata ityayaṃ tāvanme āptāgamaḥ
T06srabhusu:6562: maitryadhipateyaṃ dharmamadhipatiṃ kṛtvā hitasukhādhyāśayagatasya sarveṣu sukhopasaṃhārādhimokṣalakṣaṇā maitrītyetamarthapratisamvedyarthaṃ paryeṣate |
T06srabhusu:6565: mitrapakṣaṃ vā adhyātmamamitrodāsīnapakṣaṃ bahirdhā evaṃ ca vastuni maitrīṃ samanveṣate |
T06srabhusu:6567: ya ete trayaḥ pakṣāḥ aduḥkhā sukha(tā)ḥ |
T06srabhusu:6572: ye punarete aduḥkhāsukhitāḥ pakṣāḥ sukhakāmāsteṣāṃ (Śbh_Sh 378) trividhā sukhakāmatā prajñāyate
T06srabhusu:6576: tadubhayaviparītalakṣaṇā(ṇaṃ)tena kāmasukhino bhavantvanavadyena [|] evaṃ saprītikena niṣprītikena ca sukhena veditavyam |
T06srabhusu:6594: nātra kaścidyaḥ ākrośate vā, ākruśyate vā |
T06srabhusu:6600: śabdamātra[ṃ] māṣamātrametadapi ca tathā saṃbhūtoyaṃ kāyo rūpī audārikaścāturmahābhūtiko yatra
T06srabhusu:6607: sarva eva sattvā jātijarāvyādhimaraṇadharmāṇaste prakṛtyaiva duḥkhitā stan me pratirūpaṃ syāt
T06srabhusu:6608: yadyahaṃ prakṛtiduḥkhiteṣu sattveṣu bhūyo duḥkhopasaṃhārameva kuryāṃ, na sukhopasaṃhāraṃ tadamitro (traṃ) mitrasya kuryādyadete sattvā
T06srabhusu:6612: yonena dīrghasyādhvanotyayānmātā vā bhū[t] pitā vā, bhrātā vā, bhaginī vā, ācāryo
T06srabhusu:6613: vā, upādhyāyo vā, gururvā, gurusthānīyo veti |
T06srabhusu:6616: pariniṣpattiḥ, mitrābhitrabhāvo, mitropi (tramapi) ca kālāntareṇāmitro (traṃ) bhavati |
T06srabhusu:6625: yo me pāpakāriṣu sattveṣu vyāpādaḥ maraṇa eṣa dharma iti vistareṇa pūrvavat |
T06srabhusu:6631: ye tāvadatītamadhvānamupādāya sukhakāmāḥ sattvāḥ te atītāḥ, teṣāṃ kiṃ punaḥ sukhopasaṃhāraṃ kariṣyāmaḥ |
T06srabhusu:6633: yāvadanāgatādadhvano nityakālaṃ sukhino bhavanti (ntī) tyevaṃ maitryā(ḥ)kālaṃ paryeṣate |
T06srabhusu:6635: nāsti kaścidātmā vā, sattvo vā ya eṣa sukhakāmo vā
T06srabhusu:6638: api tu skandhamātrametat saṃskāramātrakametadyatraiṣā saṃjñā saṃjñaptirvyavahāraḥ |
T06srabhusu:6639: te punaḥ saṃskārāḥ karmakleśahetukā ityevamapekṣāyuktyā maitrīmparyeṣate |
T06srabhusu:6640: prasiddhadharmatā khalveṣā [a]cintyadharmatā yanmaitrīvyāpādabhāvanā prahāṇāya samvarttata ityevaṃ dharmatāyuktyā maitrīmparyeṣate |
T06srabhusu:6642: tatra kathamidaṃ pratyayatā pratītyasamutpādālambanā vipaśyanāprayuktārthaṃ paryeṣate |
T06srabhusu:6643: tadadhipateyaṃ dharmamadhimatiṃ kṛtvā teṣāṃ teṣāṃ dharmāṇāmutpādātte te dharmā utpadyante, teṣāṃ teṣāṃ dharmāṇāṃ
T06srabhusu:6644: nirodhātte te dharmā nirudhyante [|] nāstyatra dharmī kaścidīśvara, kartā
T06srabhusu:6645: sraṣṭā, nirmātā dharmāṇāṃ, na prakṛtirna puruṣāntaraṃ, pravarttako dharmāṇāmityevamarthapratisaṃvedī arthaṃ paryeṣate |
T06srabhusu:6652: ajñānamiti vistareṇa yathā pratītyasamutpādavibhaṃge evaṃ svalakṣaṇaṃ paryeṣate [|] punaḥ (||) pravicinoti |
T06srabhusu:6653: evaṃ pratītyasamutpannāḥ saṃskārāḥ sarva ete abhūtvā bhāvād, bhūtvā (Śbh_Sh 383) ca prativigamātpūrvāparyeṇānityā jātijarāvyādhimaraṇadharmakatvāt |
T06srabhusu:6654: duḥkhā asvatantratvādantaḥ puruṣānupalambhācca śūnyā anātmānaśca || eṣāṃ ca sāmānyalakṣaṇaṃ paryeṣate |
T06srabhusu:6656: yo (ya) eṣvanityeṣu duḥkhaśūnyānātmakeṣu saṃskāreṣu yathābhūtaṃ pratisammohaḥ |
T06srabhusu:6663: yaḥ karttā vā pratisaṃvedako vā syānnānyatra dharmasaṃketāt |
T06srabhusu:6664: teṣvevāvidyāpratyayeṣu (Śbh_Sh 384) saṃskāreṣu yāvajjātipratyaye jarāmaraṇe saṃjñā prajñaptirvyavahāraḥ kārako vedaka ityevaṃ nāmā, evaṃ
T06srabhusu:6665: jātya, evaṃ gotra, evamāhāra, evaṃ sukhaduḥkha pratisaṃvedī, evaṃ
T06srabhusu:6671: tatrātmabhāvaphalaṃ yadetadvipākajaṃ ṣaḍāyatanaṃ viṣayopabhogaphalaṃ yo (yā) iṣṭāniṣṭakarmādhipateyā ṣaṭsparśasaṃbhavā vedanā [|]
T06srabhusu:6674: punarbhavavijñānāṃkuraprādurbhāvāya tadbījaṃ, vijñānaparigṛhītaṃ paunarbhavikanāmarūpabījaṃ ṣaḍāyatanabījaṃ sparśavedanābījamiti |
T06srabhusu:6683: yadbalena yatsāṃmukhyena tatkarma vipākadānadāna samarthaṃ bhavatyayamabhinirvṛttihetuḥ |
T06srabhusu:6684: imaṃ ca dvividhaṃ hetumadhipatiṃ kṛtvā evaṃ asya trividhaḥ duḥkhatānupakṣasya kevalasyāsya duḥkhaskandhasya samudayo bhavatīti |
T06srabhusu:6689: prasiddhadharmatāpyeṣa te (ṣeti) evaṃ kāryakāraṇayuktimupapattisādhanayuktiṃ dharmatāyuktiñca paryeṣate ||
T06srabhusu:6701: iti yaḥ piṇḍasaṃjñino dhātunānātvaṃ ajānānasyā[ne]na kāyena nānādhātukena unnatirmanya (nvā) nā maraṇa eṣa dharmaḥ kṛṣṇapakṣyaḥ viparyayācchuklapakṣya ityeva[ṃ] pakṣaṃ paryeṣate |
T06srabhusu:6704: tadyathā tṛṇaṃ vāpratītya, kāṣṭhamvā cākāśaṃ parivāritamagāro [a]gāra iti saṃkhyāṃ gacchatyevameva ṣaḍdhātūnupādāya |
T06srabhusu:6706: | tvaṅmānsa(māṃsa) śoṇitaṃ cākāśe parivārite saṃjñā prajñaptirvyavahāro bhavati |
T06srabhusu:6711: āptāgamopyeṣa pratyātmajñānamanumānikopyeṣa vidhiḥ prasiddhadharmatācintyadharmatetyevaṃ kāryakāraṇayuktimupapattisānayuktiṃ dharmatāyuktiṃ ca paryeṣate ||
T06srabhusu:6720: ni[ḥ]śvāsaḥ [|] amī dīrghā āśvāsapraśvāsā, amī hrasvā imānsarvakāyena
T06srabhusu:6728: evamāśvāsapraśvāseṣvanupasthitasmṛteḥ yo vitarkakṛtaḥ saṃkṣobhaścetasaḥ maraṇa(dharma) eṣadharmaḥ kṛṣṇapakṣyaḥ |
T06srabhusu:6731: atītānāgata pratyutpanneṣvadhvasvā [śvāsapra]śvāsapratibaddhaḥ kāyaḥ kāyacitta (ḥ) pratibaddhāścāśvāsapraśvāsā ityevaṃ kālaṃ paryeṣate |
T06srabhusu:6732: nānyatra kaścidya āśvasiti praśvasiti vā asya caite āśvāsapraśvāsāḥ |
T06srabhusu:6733: api tu hetusamutpanneṣu, pratītyasamutpanneṣu saṃskāreṣviyaṃ saṃjñā |
T06srabhusu:6739: evaṃ caritaviśodhanenālambanena ṣaḍvastūni paryeṣya, adhyātmaṃ cittaṃ punaḥ punaḥ śamayataḥ (yan), punaḥ punaretadeva yathāparyeṣitaṃ |
T06srabhusu:6740: vipaśyanākāraiḥ paryeṣate |tasya śamathaṃ niśritya vipaśyanā viśudhyate |
T06srabhusu:6746: ca nava vidhaḥ kṛṣṇapakṣasaṃgṛhīto yoginā veditavyaḥ |
T06srabhusu:6755: anayā navavidhayā śuklapakṣasaṃgṛhītayā tvaritatvaritaṃ cittaṃ samādhīyate |
T06srabhusu:6757: yāvatī cānena bhūmirgantavyā bhavatyanuprāptavyā tāṃ laghu laghvevāgantā bhavatyadhandhāyamānaḥ
T06srabhusu:6767: ānāpānasmṛtau, samabhāgacaritaḥ mandarajaskaḥ punaḥ yatrālambane priyārohatā bhavati |
T06srabhusu:6771: abhyāso 'nena kṛto bhavati yo antataḥ parītto 'pi na (Śbh_Sh 390) sarveṇa sarvamādikarmika eva bhavati |
T06srabhusu:6772: tathā hyādikarmikasyānurūpe 'pyālambane na prayuktasya nivāraṇāni nābhīkṣṇaṃ
T06srabhusu:6783: yasyārthāya sa tannimnena cetasā tatpravaṇena tatprāstāreṇa (bhāreṇa) ca sarvaṃ karoti |
T06srabhusu:6784: laghulaghveva ca kṛtvā, pariprāpya, punareva prayujyate |
T06srabhusu:6785: niyamya pratisaṃlayanāya sa cedbhikṣubhikṣuṇyupāsaka kṣatriyabrāhmaṇaparṣadbhiḥ sārdhaṃ samāgacchati
T06srabhusu:6793: bahavo me pratyayā maraṇasya- vāto vā me kupyeta,
T06srabhusu:6794: pittamvā, śleṣmamvā(śleṣma vā), bhuktaṃ vā viṣamyeta, yena me viṣūcikā
T06srabhusu:6798: manuṣyādapi me bhayamityetāni sthānāni nityakālasya (Śbh_Sh 391) na-
T06srabhusu:6799: karotyapramattaśca viharatyevaṃ ca punarapramatto vihara[ti |] api bata jīveyaṃ saptāhaṃ ṣaṭ pañcacatustridvire (dvaye)kāhayāmamardhayāmamapi
T06srabhusu:6800: muhūrtamapi ardhamuhūrtamapi [|] aho bata jīveyaṃ yāvatpiṇḍapātaṃ parimuñjeyaṃ |
T06srabhusu:6802: yāvacca jīveyaṃ tāvadyogamanasikāreṇa śāstuḥ śāsane yogamāpadyeyaṃ |
T06srabhusu:6803: ya i(di)yatā mayā bahukṛtyaṃ syādyaduta śāstuḥ śāsane itīyamaśithilaprayogatā |
T06srabhusu:6809: śamathakālañca [|] vipaśyanāṃ vipaśyanānimittaṃ vipaśyanākālaṃ, pragrahaṃ pragrahanimittaṃ, pragrahakālaṃ |
T06srabhusu:6813: bhavati, nirvikalpaṃ, śānta praśāntaṃ, śamathasthitaṃ, niṣkevalaṃ,
T06srabhusu:6820: yo vipaśyanā prayoga idaṃ nidānaṃ (na)nimittaṃ [|] śamathakālaḥ katamaḥ |
T06srabhusu:6822: uddhate citte ūrdhvamvābhiśaṃkini śamathasya kālo bhāvanāyai |
T06srabhusu:6823: tathā vipaśyanāparibhāvite citte iti karaṇīyavyākṣepopahate śamathakālo bhāvanāyai |
T06srabhusu:6826: tatrālambananimittaṃ vipaśyanānimittaṃ [śamatha]pakṣyaṃ jñeyavastusabhāgaṃ pratibimbamālambananimittaṃ yenālambanena prajñāṃ vyavacārayati |
T06srabhusu:6827: tatra nidānanimittaṃ vipaśyanāparibhāvite cetasi uttaratra vipaśyanāpariśuddhaye cetaḥ śamathabimbayogaḥ
T06srabhusu:6828: tatra vipaśyanākālaḥ śamathaparibhāvite cetasi ādita eva cājñeyavastuyathābhūtāvabodhāya vipaśyanāyāḥ kālo bhāvanāyai |
T06srabhusu:6830: yānyatamānyatamena prasadanīyenālambanenodgṛhītena (Śbh_Sh 393) cittasaṃharṣaṇā saṃdarśanā samādāpanā [|] tatra pragrahanimittaṃ yena ca prasadanīyenālambanena nimittena cittaṃ pragṛhṇāti |
T06srabhusu:6831: yasya vīryārambhaḥ tadānulomikastatra pragrahakālaḥ līnaṃ cittaṃ līnatvābhiśaṃkini pragrahasya kālo bhāvanāyai |
T06srabhusu:6842: tatra katamā upekṣā lakṣaṇā (upalakṣaṇa)prayogatā [|] tānyeva nimittāni sugṛhītāni bhavanti
T06srabhusu:6845: tadā vyuttiṣṭhate samādhigocaraṃ (|) pratibimbamutsṛjya samāhitabhūmikāprākṛtālambanamanasikāreṇa [|] iyamupalakṣaṇāprayogatā |
T06srabhusu:6856: na ca śiśumudāravarṇaṃ raṃjanīyaṃ mātṛgrāmaṃ dṛṣṭvā nimittagrāhī bhavatyanuvyaṃjanagrāhī, bhojane ca samakārī bhavati |
T06srabhusu:6869: nimittamātrānusāriṇyā vipaśyanayā [|] tena manasikārastadālambano muhurmuhurvibhāvayitavyo, muhurmuhuḥ saṃmukhīkartavyaḥ |
T06srabhusu:6875: tatra navākāracittasthityā vipaśyanā pūrvaṃgamayā adhyātmaṃ cittābhisaṃkṣepataḥ |
T06srabhusu:6885: vyāpya tadālambanaṃ vibhāvanālakṣaṇaṃ vyavasthāpitamasmiṃstvarthe adhyātmaṃ nimittābhisaṃkṣepataḥ
T06srabhusu:6888: tatrādikarmike(ṇa) tatprathamakalpiko (karmikeṇa) ādita eva cittaṃ na
T06srabhusu:6894: tathā prayukta utpannotpanneṣu sarvabāhyanimitteṣu asmṛtyamanasikāraṃ karoti |
T06srabhusu:6896: sa tatra yogaṃ kurvan pratigṛhṇāti, sa nirmimitte cālambane
T06srabhusu:6899: nimittamātrānusāriṇyā vipaśyanayā paryeṣaṇāpratyavekṣaṇānucāriṇyā [|] na caikāṃśena vipaśyanāprayukto bhavati |
T06srabhusu:6902: tena tadālambanaṃ tasminsamaye muktaṃ bhavati, nodgṛhītaṃ |
T06srabhusu:6922: tadyathā citrakaraścitrakarāntevāsī vā tatprathamaścitrakarmaṇi prayuktaḥ syāt |
T06srabhusu:6923: sa ācāryasyāntikācchikṣāpūrvagamaṃ rūpakamādāya dṛṣṭvā dṛṣṭavā pratirūpakaṃ karoti |
T06srabhusu:6926: ya yathā yathā bhaṅktyā bhaṅktyā karoti |
T06srabhusu:6927: tathā tathāsyottaraṃ rūpakaṃ pariśuddhataraṃ paryavadātataraṃ khyāti |
T06srabhusu:6932: na janvandhasya tadrūpakapariśuddhiṃ nigacchedevamihāpi nayo veditavyaḥ |
T06srabhusu:6944: tatra rūpiṇāṃ dharmāṇāṃ yannimittaṃ pratibimbaṃ, pratibhāsaṃ(saḥ) tadaudārikaṃ nirmāṇasadṛśamarūpiṇāmvā punardharmāṇāṃ nāmasaṃketapūrvakaṃ yathānubhāvādhipateyaṃ |
T06srabhusu:6947: saiṣā navavidhā śuklapakṣyā śamathavipaśyanānulomā prayogatā veditavyā |
T06srabhusu:6952: caturbhiḥ kāraṇairevaṃ samyakprayukto yogī āvaraṇe svañcittaṃ pariśodhayati |
T06srabhusu:6961: tatra paritamanā yā naiṣkramyaprāvivekyaprayuktasya kliṣṭā utkaṇṭhā, aratiḥ |
T06srabhusu:6969: ahamasmi lābhī, anye ca na tatheti |
T06srabhusu:6987: mameti vā, ayogavihitāṃ saṃjñāṃ manasi karotyayamatrāyoniśasta(śaḥ) |
T06srabhusu:6989: asminnāvaraṇe sati saṃvidyamāne caturvidhepyanadhigataṃ nādhigatāt parihīyate |
T06srabhusu:6991: saṃkliṣṭavihārī ca bhavati, duḥkhavihārī ca bhavatyātmā caitamavavadati |
T06srabhusu:7001: pratipannaḥ yordhaprayogaḥ [|] tatra śuśrūṣā, paripṛcchā pratipakṣaḥ |
T06srabhusu:7007: pūrvaṃ me (mayā)vivekābhyāso na kṛto, yena me etarhi vivekaprayuktasya paritamanā utpadyate [|] sa cedetarhi na kariṣyāmyabhyāsaḥ (saṃ) evamāyati[ḥ]
T06srabhusu:7011: tatra svabhāvaṃ parijñāya āvaraṇataḥ, saṃkleśataḥ, tāvacchamathabāhulyaṃ
T06srabhusu:7016: aparivarjanācca punarasya parivarjanīyasya ko doṣa ityata ādīnavaṃ paryeṣate |
T06srabhusu:7017: parivarjitasya cāyatyāṃ kathamanutpādo bhavatītyataḥ pratipakṣaṃ bhāvayatyevamanenāvaraṇebhyaścittaṃ pariśodhitaṃ bhavati |
T06srabhusu:7020: yaduta ebhireva tribhirmukhaiḥ ṣaṇṇāṃ vastūnāmekaikaśyā (syā a)nantākārapraveśanayena,
T06srabhusu:7021: yathā ca yathā vipaśyanā samyakprayuktasya pṛthuvṛddhivaipulyatāṃ
T06srabhusu:7025: tasya yathā yathā kāyaḥ praśrabhyate, cittaṃ ca,
T06srabhusu:7027: yathā cittaikāgratā vivardhate tathā tathā kāyaḥ praśrabhyate, cittaṃ ca,
T06srabhusu:7028: ityetau dvau dharmāvanyonyaṃ nirvṛtāvanyonyaṃ pratibaddhoyaduta cittaikāgratā, pratyakṣajñānotpattiḥ
T06srabhusu:7033: viharato vā, viṣayasaṃmukhībhāve [a]pi nimittapratyavekṣaṇayāpi prakṛtyaivānabhisaṃskāreṇa bahutarāśubhatāsaṃprakhyānaṃ |
T06srabhusu:7050: vyāpādasthānīyeṣu dharmeṣu cittaṃ na praskandatīti vistaraḥ |
T06srabhusu:7051: bahutaramanityatā, duḥkhatā, nairātmyaṃ khyāti, na nityasukhasattvāya dṛṣṭisahagataṃ sammohanimittaṃ mohaparyavasthānīyeṣu dharmeṣu |
T06srabhusu:7054: na tveva pi (ci)ttasaṃjñā, mānaparyavasthānīyeṣu dharmeṣu cittaṃ na praskandatīti vistaraḥ
T06srabhusu:7058: na tveva prapañcasaṃjñā vitarkaparyavasthānīyeṣu dharmeṣu cittaṃ na praskandatīti vistaraḥ
T06srabhusu:7059: tatra niyatā(taṃ)śamathaśca vipaśyanā cobhe mitrībhūte samayugamvarttete |
T06srabhusu:7063: (Śbh_Sh 405) cittasthitau navamasyākārasya yaduta samāhitatāyāḥ [|] sa ca taṃ pariniṣpannaṃ
T06srabhusu:7065: tasya tasminsamaye dharmānvipaśyataḥ [|] svarasavāhana eva mārgo bhavatyanābhogavāhanaḥ
T06srabhusu:7072: arthatastu lakṣaṇauḥ pacchaiḥ (pakṣaiḥ) kālaiśca saha yuktibhiḥ ||
T06srabhusu:7076: samyak prayogatā caiva navādhārā dvidhā matā |
T06srabhusu:7079: tatra manaskārabhāvanā katamā [|] āhādikarmikastatprathamakarmika evaṃ vyāpini lakṣaṇe vyavasthāpite ekāgratāyāmā (ā)varaṇaviśuddheśca
T06srabhusu:7082: sa tatprathamata ekāgratāṃ prahāṇābhiratiṃ cādhigamiṣyāmīti caturbhirmanaskāraiḥ prayujyate
T06srabhusu:7087: saṃvejanīyeṣu dharmeṣu cittaṃ samvejayatyayaṃ cittasantāpano manaskāraḥ
T06srabhusu:7089: yenāyaṃ prasadanīyena manaskāreṇa cittamabhipramodayatyayaṃ (|) cittābhiṣyandano manaskāraḥ
T06srabhusu:7092: yenāyaṃ manaskāreṇa kālena kālaṃ cittaṃ samvejanīyeṣu dharmeṣu saṃvejayitvā (saṃvejya) kālena kālamabhipramodanīyeṣu dharmeṣu cittamabhipramodayitvā (modyādhyātmaṃ
T06srabhusu:7095: nirvikalpakatāyāmevaṃ sthāpayatyekāgrāṃ smṛtiṃ pravarttayati yenāsya hetunā, (Śbh_Sh 407) yena pratyayena kāyacittadauṣṭhulyapratipakṣeṇa kāyacittahlādanakarī kāyapraśrabdhiścittapraśrabdhiścotpadyate ayamucyate praśrabdhijanako manaskāraḥ |
T06srabhusu:7097: yena manaskāreṇa kālena kālaṃ cittena tathādhyātmaṃ saṃśayamiti (saṃśamayati) tena punaḥ punarabhīkṣṇaṃ adhiprajñaṃ dharmavipaśyanāyāṃ yogaṃ karoti |
T06srabhusu:7098: yaduta tamevādhyātmaṃ cetaḥśamathaṃ niśritya [|] ayamucyate jñānadarśanaviśodhano manaskāraḥ
T06srabhusu:7099: katamaḥ kālena kālaṃ saṃvejanīyeṣu dharmeṣu cittaṃ samvejayatyevamasya taccittaṃ taptaṃ bhavati
T06srabhusu:7104: tadyathā ātmavipattiḥ, paravipattiśca, vartamāne samavahite saṃmukhībhūte yoniśo manasikārānvayātsamvejanīyaṃ
T06srabhusu:7108: abhyatīte kṣaṇe niruddhe vigate vipariṇate yoniśo manasikārānvayātsamvejanīyaṃ (Śbh_Sh 408) sthānaṃ bhavati |
T06srabhusu:7118: sa evaṃ ratnānyanusaraṃścittamabhipramodayati lābhā me sulabdhāḥ |
T06srabhusu:7120: lābhā me sulabdhā yo (a)haṃ svākhyāte dharmavinaye pravrajitaḥ |
T06srabhusu:7122: yasya me sabrahmacāriṇaḥ śīlavanto guṇavantaḥ peśalāḥ |
T06srabhusu:7130: śāstari tathāgate [a]rhati samyaksaṃbuddhe, tasya ca svākhyāte
T06srabhusu:7131: dharmavinaye, tatra ca supratipanne śrāvakasaṃghe, ahamebhiḥ sabrahmacāribhiḥ śīlasāmānyagataḥ
T06srabhusu:7141: ebhiḥ sabrahmacāribhiḥ śīlasāmānyagato, dṛṣṭisāmānyagataḥ, sadbhiḥ sāmānyagataiḥ (samyaggataiḥ)
T06srabhusu:7142: satpuruṣaiḥ, bhavyo [a]hamasmyevaṃbhūta, evaṃ pratipanno, dṛṣṭa eva dharme
T06srabhusu:7147: yadanena pūrveṇāparamārabdhavīryeṇa viharatā viśeṣādhigamaḥ kṛto bhavati |
T06srabhusu:7157: yaduta saṃvegapraharṣābhyāṃ yataścittamevaṃ kṛṣṇapakṣa vimukhaṃ ca |
T06srabhusu:7159: kṛtvā, abhiṣyandanīyena manaskāreṇa kālena kālamadhyātmaṃ ca pradadhāti |
T06srabhusu:7160: yaduta cetaḥśamathena praśrabdhijanakena manaskāreṇa kālena kālaṃ dharmānvicinoti |
T06srabhusu:7168: tadyathā jātarūparajataṃ dakṣeṇa karmāreṇa vā, karmā[rā]ntevāsinā vā kālena kālaṃ yadā saṃtāpitaṃ ca bhavati |
T06srabhusu:7173: yatreṣṭā(ma)laṃkāravikṛtistatra pariṇamayatyena (va)meva yoginā yadā taccittamabhidhyādimalakaṣāye vimukhībhāvenodvejitaṃ ca bhavati |
T06srabhusu:7177: śamathapakṣe vā vipaśyanāpakṣe vā tatra tatra sūpaśliṣṭaṃ ca bhavati |
T06srabhusu:7187: bhadramukha, trīṇi nimittodgrāhakāni (ṇi) kāraṇāni niśritya yaduta
T06srabhusu:7190: prasadanīyamādīnavanimittamālokanimittaṃ vasturūpaṇānimittañca [|] sa cetsa yogaprayukta ādikarmiko rāgacarito bhavatyaśubhāvineyaḥ kathaṃ sa pañcānāṃ nimittānāmudgrahaṇāyā[va]bodhyate |
T06srabhusu:7195: sa cedanyatra grāme, nigame vānyatamaṃ puruṣamvā, striyamvā ābādhikaṃ śrṛṇoṣi
T06srabhusu:7196: | duḥkhitambāḍhaglānaṃ, mṛtamvā kālagataṃ, puruṣamvā striyamvā [|] api tu tasya puruṣasya vā, striyā vānyatamānyatamaṃ mitrāmātyajñātisālohitaṃ,
T06srabhusu:7202: no vānyasmiṃ (smin) grāmanigame, no ca tasminneva grāmanigame, na pareṣāma (raira)pi tvātmanaiva spṛṣṭo bhavasi |
T06srabhusu:7204: sarvaṃ dṛṣṭvā śrutvā caivaṃ cittaṃ saṃvejaya |
T06srabhusu:7206: kṛcchra ātmabhāvapratilabdho yatremā evaṃ rūpātmamaśca (rūpā ātmanaśca)
T06srabhusu:7212: api caikeṣāṃ śīlavipattirapi, dṛṣṭivipattirapi yato nidānaṃ sattvā dṛṣṭe ca dharme duḥkhavihāriṇo bhavanti |
T06srabhusu:7215: ca, sugatigamanāya tā apyanityā[ḥ], tāsāmapi anityatā prajñāyate |
T06srabhusu:7217: asaṃmukhībhūtāyāmapi vipattau durlabhā sampattirvināśadharmiṇī ca, evaṃ ca punaścittamudvejayitvā(jya) sādhu ca, (Śbh_Sh 413) suṣṭhu ca, yoniśaḥ pradadhatsva |
T06srabhusu:7220: aparinirvṛtasyāvimuktacetasaḥ etā vipattisampattayo, na me saṃmukhībhāvaṃ,
T06srabhusu:7223: | tīvraṃ, kharaṃ, kaṭukamanālāpamalabhyametatsthānaṃ tasmādetatsarvārthamadhipatiṃ kṛtvā prahāṇaratiratena me bhavitavyamapramattena, evaṃ bahulavihāriṇo me apyevāsyānarthasyākriyā syādityevaṃ yoniśaḥ pradadhatsva, evaṃ tvaṃ saṃvejanīyaṃ nimittamudgṛhya,
T06srabhusu:7224: punaḥ prasadanīyaṃ nimittamudgṛhṇīṣva [|] evaṃ ca punarudgṛhṇīṣva [|]
T06srabhusu:7227: [vā], yā (yo) me smṛtisaṃpramoṣādvā, anādarādvā kleśapracuratayā vā,
T06srabhusu:7230: śikṣā[ṃ] yathādharmaṃ pratikṛtyādhyāśayena ca punarakaraṇāya cittamutpāditaṃ |
T06srabhusu:7237: sa cetpariśuddhaḥ śīlaskandhaḥ, na punaste cetanā karaṇīyā |
T06srabhusu:7240: evaṃ cāvipratisāriṇā na cetanā karaṇīyā, kaccinme prāmodyaṃ utpadyeta |
T06srabhusu:7244: sa cet punarbhavasi pūrveṇāparaṃ parīttasyāpi viśeṣādhigame prītirjanayitavyā, bhavyohamasmi,
T06srabhusu:7249: anenāpyadhiṣṭhānena mānasaṃ saṃpraharṣaya || sa cetpunarlābhī bhavati pūrveṇāparaṃ paracittasyāpi viśeṣādhigamasya [|] sa tvaṃ tamadhipatiṃ kṛtvā pareṣāṃ ca paripūrṇe viśeṣādhigame yaduta
T06srabhusu:7255: ehi, tvaṃ, bhadramukha, saṃvejanīyena nimittena saṃtāpitacittaḥ,
T06srabhusu:7259: 415) śamathapakṣe, vipaśyanāpakṣe vā, tatra tatrālambane cittaṃ sthitaṃ bhaviṣyati |
T06srabhusu:7260: adhyātmaṃ susaṃsthitaṃ, kāyacittapraśrabdhicittaikāgratāśca pratilapsyase [|] evaṃ kṛṣṇapakṣavimukhībhūtaḥ
T06srabhusu:7261: yaduta saṃvegābhiṣyandanatayā sarvaṃ punarasyādīnavanimittamudgṛhṇīṣva yaduta nimittebhyo vipakṣebhyabhyaścopakleśebhyaśca [|]
T06srabhusu:7262: tatra nimittāni rūpanimittādīni daśa, vitarkāḥ kāmavitarkādayo 'ṣṭau,
T06srabhusu:7266: itīme vitarkā aunmuktasaṃkṣobhakārakāścittasya [|] itīme upakleśā anupaśamakārakāścittasya
T06srabhusu:7270: duḥkhāvihāra eṣa cittasya, tasmādime nimittavitarkopakleśāḥ duḥkhā anāryā
T06srabhusu:7282: upasaṃkramyāraṇyagato vā, vṛkṣamūlagato vā, śūnyāgāragato vā, maṃce vā,
T06srabhusu:7283: pīṭhe vā, tṛṇasaṃstarake vā niṣīda [|] paryaṅkamābhujya, pādau prakṣālya,
T06srabhusu:7284: ṛjuṃ kāyaṃ praṇidhāya, pratimukhāṃ (khīṃ) smṛtimupasthāpya, niṣadya tatprathamata ekāgratāyāṃ cittāvikṣepe smṛtyupanibaddhaṃ kuru, tatra ca ṣaṭsaṃjñāṃ (ḥ) nirvikalpasaṃjñāmupasaṃśamasaṃjñāṃ nirvyāpārasaṃjñāmanautsukyāsaṃkṣobhasaṃjñānniṣparidāhanairvṛtyāśubhasaṃjñāṃ |
T06srabhusu:7285: tatra ca te vikṣepāvikṣepaparijñāvadhānaṃ pratyupasthitaṃ bhavatu |
T06srabhusu:7286: yena vikṣepāvikṣepaparijñāvadhānena tathā tathā nimittavitarkopakleśeṣu vikṣepañca parijānīṣva,
T06srabhusu:7288: tathā tathāvahito bhava yathā te ekāgratopanibaddhā, adhyātmaṃ cetaḥśamathopanibaddhā sarvā cittasantatiścittadhārā paurvāparyeṇa (Śbh_Sh
T06srabhusu:7290: nirvikalpā upaśāntā [|] sa cetpunaḥ saṃpramoṣā[t]smṛtisaṃpramoṣāttathā śamathaprāpte cetasi nimittavitarkopakleśānabhyāsadoṣādābhāsamāgacchanti |
T06srabhusu:7304: taṃ kaścideva[ṃ] vadedidaṃ te bhoḥ, puruṣa, tailapātrapūrṇaṃ samatittikamanabhiṣekyamantarā ca janakāyaḥ sannipateta |
T06srabhusu:7306: pariharttavyamayaṃ ca te utkṣiptāsiko vadhakapuruṣaḥ pṛṣṭhataḥ pṛṣṭhataḥ samanubaddhaḥ |
T06srabhusu:7307: sa cettvamasmāttailapātrādekabindumapi pṛthivyāṃ nipātayiṣyasi tataste utkṣiptāsiko badhakapuruṣa ucchinnamūlaṃ śiraḥ prapātayiṣyati |
T06srabhusu:7308: kiṃ manyadhve bhikṣavaḥ api nu sa puruṣaḥ amanasikṛtvā tailapātramamanasikṛtvā tailapātramamanasikṛtvā utkṣiptāsikaṃ badhakapuruṣaṃ janapadakalyāṇī[ṃ]
T06srabhusu:7309: manasi kuryānmahājanasamājamno, no, bhadanta, tatkasya hetostathā hi tena
T06srabhusu:7310: puruṣeṇo[tkṣi]ptāsiko vadhakapuruṣaḥ pṛṣṭhataḥ pṛṣṭhataḥ samanubaddho dṛṣṭaḥ |
T06srabhusu:7311: tasyaivaṃ syāt [|] sa cedahamasmāttailapātrādekabindumapi pṛthivyāṃ pātayiṣyāmi |
T06srabhusu:7312: ato me utkṣiptāsiko badhakapuruṣaḥ ucchinnamūlaṃ śiraḥ prapātayiṣyati |
T06srabhusu:7315: tadeva tailapātraṃ sarvacetasā samanvāhṛtya samyageva pariharedevameva bhikṣavaḥ |
T06srabhusu:7317: gurukṛtya sarvacetasā samanvāhṛtyate me (ta ime) śrāvakā iti [|] tatra janapadakalyāṇīti kāya[c]chandādyupakleśaparyavasthānīyānāndharmāṇāmetadadhivacanaṃ |
T06srabhusu:7325: kāyacittapraśrabdhisnehanārthena utkṣiptāsiko badhakapuruṣa itinimittavitarkopakleśeṣu pūrvodgṛhītasyādīnasyaitadadhivacanaṃ [|] satkṛtya viharati |
T06srabhusu:7336: sa cetpunaranabhyāsamoṣānna ramate sopāyaṃ ca tadālamba tasmānnirvikalpādālambanād vyutthāya savikalpa ālambane smṛtyupanibaddhaṃ kurute |
T06srabhusu:7337: yadeva te pūrvodgṛhītamaśubhanimittaṃ tadeva manasi kuru tatprathamato nimittamātrānusāriṇyā vipaśyanayā yaduta
T06srabhusu:7338: vinīlakamvā, vipūyakamvā, yāvadasthiśaṃkalikāmvā || tathā prayuktaśca tatprathamava(ta) ekaṃ vinīlakamadhimucyasva, (Śbh_Sh 420)
T06srabhusu:7345: yeṣāṃ na syādavakāśaḥ antato daṇḍaviṣṭambhanakoṭīmātramapi [|] yathāvinīlakānāmevaṃ yāvada sthiśaṃkalikānāṃ sarvamevamadhimuktimanaskāraṃ niśritya
T06srabhusu:7346: bhūtamanaskāramavatara, evaṃ ca punaravatara, yāvantyetāni vinīlakāni mayādhimuktāni yāvadasthiśaṃkalikā ato [a]pramāṇavarāṇi me
T06srabhusu:7347: pūrvāntabhārabhya, tatra tatra bhavagaticyutyupapādeṣu, mṛtasya kālagatasya yāni vinīlakāni nirvṛttāni, yāvadasthiśaṃkalikānirvṛtyāṃ |
T06srabhusu:7348: yeṣāṃ pūrvā koṭirna prajñāyate, nivartamānānāṃ, tāḥ sa cetkaścit saṃharet saṃhṛtāśca na vinaśyeyuḥ, na ca pūtībhaveyuḥ |
T06srabhusu:7349: nāsti sa pṛthivīpradeśo yatra teṣāmavakāśaḥ syāt |
T06srabhusu:7350: ekakalpikā nāmapi, tāvadyāvadasthiśaṃkalikānāṃ sa cetkaścitsaṃhārako bhavet |
T06srabhusu:7352: yathā pūrvasyāntara (pūrvānta)mārabhyaivama parāntamapi yāvat (|) duḥkhasyāntaṃ na (Śbh_Sh
T06srabhusu:7355: na caitāni vinīlakāni yāvadasthiśaṃkalikā [yā] vipaśyanāprayuktena sakṛdvipaśyitavyā[ni],
T06srabhusu:7356: nānyatraikaṃ vinīlakamadhimucya punaścittaṃ śamayitavyaṃ tāvacca tadvinīkamadhimoktavyaḥ (vyaṃ) yāvattasmenā (sminnā)lambane
T06srabhusu:7359: tasmin samaye adhyātmaṃ sā(saṃ?) śamayitavyaṃ yathā vinīlakamevaṃ yāvadasthiśaṃkalikaikā evaṃ yāvadapramāṇā anenaiva nayena
T06srabhusu:7361: cittamadhyātmaṃ saṃśamayitvā (saṃśamya) vimoktavyāstataḥ sarvapaścādapramāṇāni vinīlakānyapramāṇā yāvadasthiśaṃkalikā adhyātmaṃ cittābhisaṃkṣepeṇa vibhāvayatyanābhāsagatāyāṃ sthāpayati na ca tāni nimittānyutsṛjati || savikalpāni nāpi ca kalpayati |
T06srabhusu:7367: evaṃ ca te śamathavipaśyanāmārge ālokasaṃjñāṃ bhāvayataḥ |
T06srabhusu:7368: sa ce dādita eva avispaṣṭodhivimokṣo bhaviṣyatyālambane samya[gā]bhāsaḥ |
T06srabhusu:7374: sa bhūyasyā mātrayā vispaṣṭataratāṃ pracurābhāsataratāñca gamiṣyati |
T06srabhusu:7376: śamathanimittena, vipaśyanānimittena, lokanimittena, sūdgṛhītena kālamadhyātmaṃ cittaṃ saṃśayamayankālena kālaṃ dharmānvicinvanti(cinvan),
T06srabhusu:7378: yadutāśubhāprayogamevādhipatiṃ kṛtvā, evaṃ ca punarvicinvan bahirdhā ṣaṭtriṃśato (t)dravyāṇi kāyāt keśādi prasāvaparyantā (ntaṃ)
T06srabhusu:7379: nimittamudgṛhya adhyātmametāni sarvāṇi aśucidravyāṇyadhimucyādhyātmaṃcittaṃ saṃśamaya (sva), idaṃ te bhaviṣyatyadhyātmaṃ kāyena kāyānupaśyanāyāḥ yadutātmano 'ntaḥ
T06srabhusu:7380: kāyamārabhya, sa tvaṃ punarapi bahirdhā aśubhānimittenodgṛhītena vinīlakaṃ
T06srabhusu:7382: vādhimokṣeṇa, mahadgatena vā [a]pramāṇena vādhimucyādhimucyādhyātmaṃ cittaṃ saṃśamaya, idaṃ te bhaviṣyati |
T06srabhusu:7384: yaduta parasāntatikaṃ bahiḥkāyamārabhya, sa tvaṃ punarapyātmanaḥ antaḥkāye
T06srabhusu:7390: idaṃ te bhaviṣyatyadhyātmabahirdhā kāye kāyānupaśyanāyāḥ sa[t]tvaṃ,
T06srabhusu:7391: punarapi catvāro 'rūpiṇaḥ skandhāḥ śrutacintādhipateyena parikalpanimittagrāheṇa triṣu bhāgeṣvadhimucyasva śamathapakṣye,
T06srabhusu:7393: yadādhyātmaṃ cittamabhisaṃkṣipasi tatra nirmimittanirvikalpopaśamākārā nirvyāpārānutsukāsaṃkṣobhaniḥparidāha nairvṛtyasukhasaṃjñākārā avikṣepālambanā vedanādayaścatvāro [a]rūpiṇaḥ
T06srabhusu:7395: pratikṣaṇaṃ pratikṣaṇamanyo 'nyatayā navanavaniṣpurāṇatayā pravartanta ityadhimucyasva, idaṃ te bhaviṣyatyadhyātmabahirdhā vedanāsu,
T06srabhusu:7398: viṣayālambanā asamāhitabhūmipatitā abhyapatitāḥ (Śbh_Sh 424) kṣīṇā, ye caitarhi smṛtisaṃpramoṣāccittakṣepe satyutpadyante nimittavitarkopakleśālambanādhipateyā vedanādayaścatvāro [a]rūpiṇaḥ
T06srabhusu:7402: bahirdhā vedanācittadharmānupaśyanāyāḥ sattvaṃ, punarapi vipaśyanānimittamudgṛhya sanimitte saṃkalpe manaskāre sthitaḥ |
T06srabhusu:7407: idaṃ te bhaviṣyati bahirdhā vedanāyāṃ, citte,
T06srabhusu:7409: evaṃ hi tvamaśubhāprayogamadhipatiṃ kṛtvā catvāri smṛtyupasthānānyavatīrṇo bhaviṣyasi |
T06srabhusu:7412: sa tvamevamupasthitayā smṛtyā caturṣu smṛtyupasthāneṣu yaṃ yameva grāmaṃ vā, nigamaṃ bopaniśritya viharasi, sa tvaṃ tameva grāmaṃ vā, nigamaṃ vā |
T06srabhusu:7416: ahiśvabhrasthāṇukaṇṭakapalvalaprapātasyandikagūthakaṭhallapāpike yā caryā śayanāsanaparivarjanā [|] (Śbh_Sh 425) arakṣitaste ātmā bhavati |
T06srabhusu:7417: yeṣu ca te viṣayanimitteṣvindriyāṇi prerayitavyāni teṣvanābhogatayā asaṃvṛtānīndriyāṇi bhavantu
T06srabhusu:7422: sūpasthitayāsmṛtyā, tadgatena mānasena mātrayā piṇḍapātaṃ paribhuṃkṣva |
T06srabhusu:7426: adharmyā ca te [tvayā] kathā sarveṇa sarvaṃ parivarjayitavyā |
T06srabhusu:7429: tatkasya hetoḥ [|] vigṛhya kathāsaṃrambhānuyogamanuyuktasya puruṣapudgalasya viharataḥ kathābāhulye cittaṃ santiṣṭhate |
T06srabhusu:7435: kuru, te (sa tvam) agnimathanaprayogeṇa ca sātatyasatkṛtyaprayogatayā
T06srabhusu:7436: pratatakārī bhava, evaṃ tu punaścitaṃ praṇidhatsva |
T06srabhusu:7437: sa cedyāvadāyurjambūdvīpe sarveṣāṃ jaṃbūdvīpakānāṃ manuṣyāṇāmabhūttatsarvamabhisamastaṃ mamaikasyaitarhi (Śbh_Sh 426) syāt |
T06srabhusu:7439: sātatyasatkṛtyaprayogatayā pratatakārī bhavā[mi] [|] evaṃ ca punaścittaṃ
T06srabhusu:7441: sa cedyāvadāyurjabūdvīpe manasikāre śamathavipaśyanāyāṃ yogaṃ na riṃcayaṃ(yan) yadutāsyaiva yogaprayogasya mahāphalatāṃ
T06srabhusu:7442: mahānuśaṃsatāṃ ca viditvā prāgevāsmin pari(praṇi)dhatte [|] āyuṣītvare jīvite dūramapigatvā varṣaśati(ta)ke parigaṇyamānamauntike [|]
T06srabhusu:7443: evaṃ hi tvaṃ yathānuśiṣṭaḥ pratatakārī vātyantakārī ca |
T06srabhusu:7446: mṛdukāṃ kāyapraśrabdhiṃ cittaikāgratāṃ tataścottari vipulālaukikalokottarāṃ sampadamārāgayiṣyati(si)
T06srabhusu:7448: aśubhāprayukto yogajñenācāryeṇa codyamānaḥ samyaga(k) codito bhavatyevaṃ ca pratipadyamānaḥ
T06srabhusu:7450: yathā [a]śubhāvineyo [a]śubhāyāṃ, tathā maitryavineyādayo [a]pi ānāpānasmṛtiparyavasānāya yathāyogaṃ veditavyāstatrāyaṃ viśeṣaḥ |
T06srabhusu:7453: mitrapakṣādudāsīnapakṣācca (Śbh_Sh 427) nimittamudgṛhya pratirūpaśayanāsanagato hi sukhādhyāśayagatena manaskāreṇa samāhitabhūmikena pūrvamekaṃ mitramadhimoktavyamekamamitramekamu(ka u)dāsī
T06srabhusu:7454: naṃ (naḥ), teṣu ca tri[ṣu] pakṣeṣu tulyaṃ hitasukhādhyāśayagatena
T06srabhusu:7459: tataḥ paścād dve mitrāṇi, trīṇi, catvāri,
T06srabhusu:7460: pañca, daśa, viṃśa, triṃśatpūrvavadyāvatsarvā diśo vidiśaśca mitrāmitra
T06srabhusu:7462: nirantarā yatra nāstyantaramantato daṇḍakoṭīviṣkambhanamātramapi yathā mitrapakṣeṇaivamamitrodāsīnapakṣeṇa veditavyaṃ |
T06srabhusu:7463: sa ca maitrīprayogaṃ ca na jahāti |
T06srabhusu:7468: ete [a]pi sattvāḥ pareṣāṃ mitrabhūtā, amitrabhūtā, udāsīnabhūtāśca, yathā me te [a]pi
T06srabhusu:7470: yathāhaṃ tathaite sattvā, yathā me ātmanaḥ sukhameṣaṇīyaṃ sattvānāmātmasamatayātmatulyatayā (Śbh_Sh 428) eṣāṃ sattvānāṃ mayābhihitasukhopasaṃhārakaraṇāya itīdamasyādhyātmabahirdhā kāye
T06srabhusu:7474: rūpanimittantu yogī udgṛhya varṇasaṃsthānanimittaṃ, vijñaptinimittaṃ ca mitrāmitrodāsīnapakṣād(kṣebhyo) 'dhimucyate |
T06srabhusu:7483: topa(copa)gatāstadanena paryāyeṇa sarva eva sattvāssamasamā, nāstyatra kācinmitratā vā, amitratā vodāsīnatā vā, pariniṣpannetyanenaiva paryāyeṇa tulyahitasukhopasaṃhāratā ca karaṇīyā |
T06srabhusu:7484: yathā pūrvāntamārabhya evamaparāntamapyāramya, satyāṃ saṃsṛtau saṃsāre yepi ca mayā sattvāḥ pūrvāntamārabhya tanmaitreṇa cittenānukampitāḥ |
T06srabhusu:7485: kiṃ (Śbh_Sh 429) cāpi te [a]bhyatītā apitu tānetarhyanukampe yaduta
T06srabhusu:7488: bhūtā bhaviṣyan (abhūvan), ye, [a]pi ca na bhūtā anāgate [a]dhvani sukhitā bhavantu |
T06srabhusu:7489: evaṃ bhūtamanaskārānupratiṣṭhasya maitrīvihāriṇaḥ yaḥ puṇyābhiṣyandaḥ kuśalābhiṣyandaḥ |
T06srabhusu:7496: tatredaṃpratyayatāpratītyasamutpāda ādikarmikaḥ śrutacintādhipateyena parikalpitaṃ na nimittamudgṛhṇātyanyeṣāṃ sattvānāmajñānaṃ |
T06srabhusu:7497: sammoho yeneme pratyakṣamanityaṃ nityato [a]vagacchanti pratyakṣamaśuci śucitaḥ, duḥkhaṃ
T06srabhusu:7499: viparyastā ete sattvā viparyāsa hetordṛṣṭe dharme, vedanāsu samparāye cātmabhāvābhirnivṛttau, tṛṣyanti, tṛṣitāśca jātimūlakāni karmāṇi kṛtvā evamāyatyāṃ karmakleśahetu [............]
T06srabhusu:7501: | ayamapi kevalo duḥkhaskandha evameva saṃbhūta iti |

T06srabhusu:7509: yadi na punarātmano vartamānān skandhān pratītyasamutpannān manasikaroti |

T06srabhusu:7523: ye deśā [astyādestāraṇīyā] vāyugatena sacchidrāḥ, suśirāḥ, sāvakāśāḥ,
T06srabhusu:7528: na ca tajjo manaskāraḥ pratyupasthito bhavati |

T06srabhusu:7533: tānyetāni catvāri mahābhūtāni tatprathamato [a]ṅgapratyaṃgo(gato) [a]rthaṃ vināpyadhimucyate [|] tataḥ paścāt |
T06srabhusu:7541: ayaṃ) dhātuprabhedaprayuktasya cārthaprabhedaparyantaḥ rūpiṇāṃ tābaddhātūnāmākāśadhātoḥ punaḥ
T06srabhusu:7542: yatpunarasya tasmin prayoge śamathavipaśyanābhāvanāyāṃ vikṣepāvikṣepaparijñāvadhānamidamasya saṃprajanyasya smṛtisamatāyāśca [|]
T06srabhusu:7543: yatpunaḥ saṃveganimittaṃ, prasadanīyaṃ ca nimittaṃ sūdgṛhītaṃ bhavatīdamasyābhidhyādaurmanasya vinayasya, tasyaivamātāpino viharato yāvat (d) dvitīyaloke [a]bhidhyādaurmanasyaṃ pūrvameva
T06srabhusu:7551: cittakāyapraśrabdhiścābhivara[ṃ] nī audārikāṃ sūpalakṣyāṃ cittaikāgratāṃ kāyapraśrabdhimāvahati
T06srabhusu:7552: yaduta hetupāraṃ paryādānayogena, na tasya, na cirasyedānīmaudārikīcittakāyapraśrabdhiścittaikāgratā ca |
T06srabhusu:7571: tata ūrdhvamayaṃ yogī ādikarmikaḥ samanaskāro bhavati |
