T06srabhusu:7583: sa cedraṃjanīye viṣaye carati, na tīvraṃ rāgaparyavasthānamutpādayati |
T06srabhusu:7586: yathā raṃjanīye evaṃ dveṣaṇīye, mohanīye mānasthānīye, vitarkasthānīye veditavyam |
T06srabhusu:7587: niṣaṇṇasya cāsya pratisaṃlayane cittaṃ pratidadhatastvaritatvaritaṃ cittaṃ praśrabhyate || kāyaśca [|]
T06srabhusu:7607: evaṃ parīttaprahāṇaratipraviṣṭasya tadūrdhvaṃ dve gatī bhavataḥ |
T06srabhusu:7619: yadā cāsya dṛṣṭisthiraḥ kharaśca manaskāraḥ saṃvṛtto bhavati |
T06srabhusu:7623: tadā sa laukikena mārgeṇa gantukāmastatra ca prayogamārabhate lokottareṇa vā mārgeṇa [|]
T06srabhusu:7633: no tu dṛṣṭa eva dharme (|) amī catvāraḥ pudgalā dṛṣṭa eva dharme
T06srabhusu:7659: kāmānāṃ ṣaḍvastūni paryeṣamāṇaḥ arthanya svūlakṣaṇaṃ (arthaṃ, svalakṣaṇaṃ,
T06srabhusu:7688: te 'pi jātyādidharmatayā avinirmuktāstāvatkālikī sā teṣāṃ sampat |
T06srabhusu:7699: paryeṣamāṇā api satvāḥ (ttvāḥ) kāmān paryeṣaṇākṛtaṃ (|) duḥkhaṃ pratisaṃvedayanti |
T06srabhusu:7707: tāva(t) tṛptitā ca paryāptitā vā, anena paryāyeṇa kāmā vigarhitā buddhaiḥ buddhaśrāvakaiśca sadbhiḥ samyaggataiḥ, satpuruṣaiḥ [|]
T06srabhusu:7709: nāsti cāsya kiṃcit pāpakamakuśalaṃ karmākaraṇīyaṃ vadāmi |
T06srabhusu:7715: ye ca dṛṣṭadhārmikāḥ (|) kāmāḥ, ye ca sāṃparāyikāḥ, ye ca divyāḥ, ye ca mānuṣyakāḥ |
T06srabhusu:7719: vyāpādā[ḥ], saṃrambho vā, ye vā punarāntarāyikā
T06srabhusu:7720: bhavantyāryaśrāvakasyāśikṣamāṇasyānekaparyāyeṇa kṛṣṇapakṣapatitā ete kāmā yadbhūyasā [|] evampakṣaṃ paryeṣate |
T06srabhusu:7724: evaṃ bahūpadravāḥ, bahūpasargā, bahvādīnavā ityevaṃ kālamparyeṣate |
T06srabhusu:7726: mahatā saṃrambheṇa, mahatyā paryeṣṭyā, mahatā pariśrameṇa vividhairvicitraiḥ śilpakarmasthānaiḥ kāmāḥ saṃhriyante |
T06srabhusu:7727: nirvartyante, upacīyante [|] te punaḥ sūpacitā api, sunirvartitā api |
T06srabhusu:7730: | asya vā punaḥ kāyasyādhyātmikasya rūpiṇa audārikasya
T06srabhusu:7736: hrīkopanapraticchādanāya (|) ca vastraṃ [|] nidrāklamaduḥkhapratīghātāya ca śayanāsanaṃ |
T06srabhusu:7738: vyādhiduḥkhapratighātāya ca (|) glānabhaiṣajyamiti duḥkhapratīkārabhūtā ete kāmā iti |
T06srabhusu:7740: na saktena nānyatra vyādhigrastenaivātureṇa vyādhimātropaśamāya bhaiṣajyamāptāgamo 'pyeṣaḥ
T06srabhusu:7748: sa evaṃ kāmānāmaudārikalakṣaṇaṃ pratisaṃvejya yaduta ṣaḍbhirvastubhiḥ prathame dhyāne śāntalakṣaṇaṃ pratisaṃvedayati nāstyetatsarvaśa audārikatvaṃ (|) prathame dhyāne yadetatkāmadhātāvityanenaudārikalakṣaṇaṃ
T06srabhusu:7750: prathame ca dhyāne śāntalakṣaṇamayamucyate lakṣaṇapratisaṃvedī manaskāraḥ |
T06srabhusu:7753: sa evaṃ kāmānparijñāya prathamaṃ dhyānaṃ prathamaṃ dhyānaṃ
T06srabhusu:7754: yathāvatparyeṣṭau(ṣyau)dārikaśāntalakṣaṇena śrutaṃ ca cintāṃ ca vyatikrāmyaikāntena bhāvanākāreṇaivādhimucyate
T06srabhusu:7756: bhāvayaṃśca yathā yathā tāmaudārikaśāntatāṃ punaḥ punaradhimucyataḥ |
T06srabhusu:7761: kleśaprahāṇāya ca mārge samutpanne yastadbhagavato manaskāraḥ |
T06srabhusu:7773: tasya tathā prahāṇārāmasya bhāvanārāmasya samyakprayuktasya sataḥ kuśalapakṣaprayogopastambhakāmapratisaṃyuktaṃ kleśakarmaparyavasthānaṃ carato vā viharato vā na samudācarati |
T06srabhusu:7778: tasyāprahīṇatvāt sarveṇa sarvamanuśayasya tannimittaṃ manasi kurvataḥ sevanānimnaṃ cittaṃ bhavati |
T06srabhusu:7783: na me samyagviraktaṃ vimuktaṃ cittaṃ yaduta kāmebhyaḥ, saṃskārābhinigṛhītaṃ me cittaṃ vārivad dhṛtaṃ [|] dharmatābhinigṛhītaṃ (|) ya[n]nvahaṃ bhūyasyā mātrayā tasyānuśayasyāśeṣaprahāṇāya bhūyasyā mātrayā prahāṇārāmo vihareyaṃ
T06srabhusu:7791: tasya pratipakṣaṃ ca bhāvayataḥ kālena kālaṃ prahīṇāprahīṇatāṃ mīmānsamānasya sarvebhyaḥ kāmāvacarebhyaḥ kleśebhyaścittaṃ visaṃyujyate |
T06srabhusu:7796: tasya ca samanaskārapratyayaṃ taddhetukaṃ prathamaṃ dhyānaṃ samāpadyate |
T06srabhusu:7799: tatra prāvivekye manaskāre vartamāno, ratisaṃgrāhake ca vivekajena
T06srabhusu:7802: kadācit kadācit dhyānavipulatarasaṃmukhībhāvena prayoganiṣṭhāphale punarmanaskāre vartamānasya nāsti kiñcidasyā(sya) bhavati |
T06srabhusu:7803: smāraṇīyaṃ sarvataḥ kāyādyuta(dyaduta) vivekajena prītisukhena sa tasmiṃ(smin) samaye viviktaiḥ kāmaiḥ viviktaṃ pāpakairakuśalairdharmaiḥ savitarkasavicāraṃ
T06srabhusu:7804: vivekajaṃ prītisukhaṃ prathamaṃ dhyānaṃ paṃcā[ṅ]gamupasampadya viharati |
T06srabhusu:7807: tatra lakṣaṇapratisaṃvedinā manaskāreṇa [|] yat prahātavyaṃ tat samyak prajānāti |
T06srabhusu:7808: prahātavyasya ca prahāṇāya prāptavyasya ca prāptaye cittaṃ praṇidhatte |
T06srabhusu:7809: ādhimokṣikeṇa ca manaskāreṇa prahāṇāya prāptaye ca samyak prayogamārabhate |
T06srabhusu:7814: prayoganiṣṭhāphalenaiṣāṃ kleśaprakārāṇāṃ bhāvitānāṃ subhāvitānāṃ bhāvanāphalaṃ pratyanubhavati
T06srabhusu:7818: yaśca prāvivekyo manaskāraḥ, yaśca prayoganiṣṭho 'yaṃ prātipakṣiko manaskāraḥ |
T06srabhusu:7823: evaṃ sati ṣaṭṣu manaskāreṣu catvāro manaskārāḥ pravighnā veditavyāḥ |
T06srabhusu:7832: avitarkaśca dvitīyadhyāne śāntalakṣaṇaṃ sa lakṣaṇapratisaṃvedī manaskāraḥ |
T06srabhusu:7835: yaḥ samāhitabhūmiko 'pyugrālambanabhārī tatprathamopanipātitayā cālambane audāriko manojalpaḥ
T06srabhusu:7847: kāmavivekaprītisukhamevānuśaṃsānugatā bhūmiścaiṣā tādṛśī prakṛtyā yatra sthitasya nityaṃ nityakālaṃ, dhruvaṃ dhruvakālaṃ, savitarkaḥ, savicāraḥ,
T06srabhusu:7851: sarvaśo nāstyetadaudārikalakṣaṇamavitarkedvitīye dhyāne ityataḥ śāntaṃ dvitīyaṃ dhyānamasyaudārikatvasyāpagamāt
T06srabhusu:7852: śeṣo(ṣe) manaskārā dvitīyadhyānasamāpattaye yathā(pi) yogaṃ pūrvavadveditavyaṃ |
T06srabhusu:7853: evaṃ bhūmau bhūmau yāvannaivasaṃjñānāsaṃjñāyatanasamāpattaye yathāyogaṃ sapta manaskārā veditavyāḥ
T06srabhusu:7854: audārikalakṣaṇaṃ punaḥ sarvāsvadharimāsu bhūmiṣu yāvadākiṃcanyāyatanāt samāsena dvividhaṃ veditavyaṃ |
T06srabhusu:7860: yasyā yasyā bhūmervairāgyaṃ karttukāmo bhavatyupariṣṭācca yathāyogaṃ śāntalakṣaṇaṃ |
T06srabhusu:7865: upakleśāḥ kāmahetukā akuśalā dharmāstadyathā kāyaduścaritaṃ, vāgduścaritaṃ, manoduścaritaṃ
T06srabhusu:7868: teṣāmprahāṇādviviktaṃ pāpakairakuśalairdharmairavitarkavicāreṣvadoṣadarśanātsvabhūmikairvitarkavicāraiḥ kāmaprātipakṣikaiḥ kuśalaiḥ [|] savitarkaṃ savicāraṃ prayoganiṣṭho
T06srabhusu:7880: vyagracāriṇa ālambanādvivecya avyagracāriṇyālambane ekadharmatayā śāntaṃ prasannaṃ cittaṃ pravarttate |
T06srabhusu:7885: tenāha cetasa ekotībhāvāt sarveṇa sarvaṃ vitarkavicāraprahāṇādavitarkamavicāraṃ prayoganiṣṭho manaskāraḥ samādhistasyānantaraṃ taddhetukaṃ taṃtpra(kastatpra)tyayamutpa(yautpa)dyata iti |
T06srabhusu:7886: tenāha samādhijaṃ īpsitāninditārthaprāpteḥ prītau vā doṣadarśanāt |
T06srabhusu:7887: sa saṃpraharṣagataṃ daurmanasyagataṃ vitarkavicāraprathamadhyānakleśapakṣasarvadauṣṭhulyāpagamāttatprātipakṣikapraśrabdhicittakāyakarmaṇyatāsuravānugatvāt prītisukhamanupūrveṇa gaṇayato dvitīyaṃ bhavatyevaṃ sarvaṃ pūrvavad veditavyam |
T06srabhusu:7890: tasmiṃśca samaye dvividho 'sya cittakṣobhakaraḥ apakṣālo 'dhigato bhavati
T06srabhusu:7893: vitarkavicārāḥ, etarhi ca prītiḥ, tenāha upekṣako viharati |
T06srabhusu:7901: nāsti, tena tṛtīye dhyāne upekṣako viharatītyucyate |
T06srabhusu:7904: yathā yathā te prītisahagatāḥ saṃjñāmanasikārāḥ samudācaranti |
T06srabhusu:7905: sa cetpunarabhāvitatvāt tṛtīyasya dhyānasya smṛtisaṃpramoṣātkadācitkarhicit citte prītisahagatāḥ saṃjñāmanasikārāḥ samudācaranti |
T06srabhusu:7913: tasya tasminsamaye evamupekṣakasya viharatā smṛtasya saṃprajanya syāsevanānvayādbahulīkārānvayātprītisahagataṃ prahīyate |
T06srabhusu:7914: taccittauddhatyakaraṃ, niḥprītikaṃ, śāntaṃ, praśāntaṃ cetasi veditamutpadyate |
T06srabhusu:7916: manaḥkāyena vedita sukhaṃ ca praśrabdhisukhaṃ pratisamvedayate |
T06srabhusu:7918: adhastadrūpaṃ sukhaṃ nāsti nāpi nirantarā upekṣā
T06srabhusu:7922: idaṃ tadāyatanaṃ yaduta tṛtīyaṃ dhyānaṃ yattadāryā ācakṣate |
T06srabhusu:7923: yatpratilambhavihāriṇaṃ pudgalamadhikṛtya smṛtimāṃ(mān) sukhavihārī tṛtīyaṃ dhyānamupasaṃpadya viharatīti āryāḥ punaḥ vṛddhāśca vṛddhaśrāvakāśca |
T06srabhusu:7934: tatra caturthadhyānasamāpattikāle tasmin samaye sa dhyāyī sukhaduḥkhavyatikramamanuprāpnoti
T06srabhusu:7938: sukhasya ca prahāṇāt(d), duḥkhasya ca prahāṇāt, pūrvameva ca saumanasyadaurmanasyayorasta[ṅ]gamāt
T06srabhusu:7939: tanna caturthadhyānasamāpattikāle sukhasya ca prahāṇāaddvitīyadhyānasamāpattikāle duḥkhasya,
T06srabhusu:7944: aduḥkhāsukhā tasmin samaye prathamaṃ dhyānamupādāya sarve adhobhūmikāḥ apakṣālāḥ prahīṇā bhavanti
T06srabhusu:7952: upekṣāsmṛtipariśuddhamiti [|] tatra caturthamiti pūrvavad veditavyam || yathāpramāṇādiṣu sthāneṣu ||
T06srabhusu:7953: tatrākāśādhimokṣasya varṇasaṃjñā nīlapītalohitāvadātādipratisaṃyuktatāmasātāmasātayā nirvirāgatayā ca samatikrānto bhavati |
T06srabhusu:7956: samatikramādanābhāsagamanahetoryā anekavidhā bahunānāprakārā varṇapracayahetukā āvaraṇasaṃjñā sā (yā) sā vigatā bhavati |
T06srabhusu:7958: pratighasaṃjñānāmasta[ṅ]gamāt, tāsāmvā punarvigamahetoryā aupacayikīsaṃjñāsteṣvavaśiṣṭeṣu viśiṣṭeṣu saṃghāteṣu pravṛttāstadyathā
T06srabhusu:7963: | sa evaṃ rūpapratighanānātvasaṃjñā bhāvayitvā anantākāreṇākāśādhimukto bhavati |
T06srabhusu:7970: tasyākāśamālambanaṃ samāpannasya punastacca tadanye ca skandhāḥ svabhūmikāḥ sāmantake punaradhobhūmikā api skandhāḥ |
T06srabhusu:7983: sa vijñānānantyāyatanāduccalito vijñānāt pareṇālambanaṃ samanveṣamāṇo na punarlabhate (|) kiñcana pratisaṃyuktaṃ rūpi vā, arūpi vā [|] sa tadālambanamalabhamānaḥ sasāmāntakamaulaṃ vijñānānantyāyatanaṃ
T06srabhusu:7987: sa tasya saṃjñādhimokṣasya bahulīkārānvayādākiṃcanyāyatanasāmantakaṃ samatikramya yāvatprayoganiṣṭhā(n) manasikārānmaulaṃ prayoganiṣṭhāphale samāpadyate |
T06srabhusu:7989: sarvaśo vijñānānantyāyatanaṃ samatikramya nāsti kiñcidityākiñcanyāyatanamupasaṃspṛśya (-sampadya) viharatīti |
T06srabhusu:7995: tenāha saṃjñī yaduta kiñcanasaṃjñāyā vā, akiñcanasaṃjñāyā vā,
T06srabhusu:7996: akiñcanasaṃjñā vā, na ca punaḥ sarveṇa sarvaṃ sāsya saṃjñā niruddhā bhavati |
T06srabhusu:7997: tadyathā āsaṃjñi[ke]vā, nirodhasamāpattau vā, nānyatra sūkṣmā sā
T06srabhusu:7999: naiva saṃjñā nāsaṃjñā [|] evaṃ tadāyatanādhimuktaḥ sasāmantakamaulamākiñcanyāyatanaṃ samatikramya naiva saṃjñānāsaṃjñāyatanasāmantakasya yā vatprayoganiṣṭhānmanasikārāt
T06srabhusu:8014: tatra dvābhyāṃ manaskārābhyāmanayoḥ samāpattyoḥ samāpattipraveśo bhavati |
T06srabhusu:8016: naivasaṃjñānāsaṃjñoccalitenālambanasanniruddhena ca manaskāreṇa nirodhasamāpatteḥ [|] (Śbh_Sh 460) tatra saṃjñārogaḥ, saṃjñāgaṇḍaḥ,
T06srabhusu:8021: samanaskārasamāpannasya ca punaścittaṃ na pravartata iti |
T06srabhusu:8022: sa evaṃ niḥsaraṇasaṃjñā pūrvakeṇa manaskāreṇa śubhakṛtyavītarāgasya,
T06srabhusu:8023: bṛhatphalebhyo vītarāgasya, cittacaitasikānāṃ dharmāṇāṃ nirodha iyamucyate
T06srabhusu:8026: tatra naiva saṃjñānāsaṃjñāyatanalābhī āryaḥ pareṇa śāntena vihāreṇa viharttukāmaḥ naiva saṃjñānāsaṃjñāyatanāccittamuccā layati |
T06srabhusu:8030: ya evamākiñcanyāyatanavītarāgasya śaikṣasyārhato vā vihārasaṃjñāpūrvakeṇa manaskāreṇa cittacaitasikānāṃ dharmāṇāṃ nirodha iyamucyate nirodhasamāpattirevaṃ ca punarasyāḥ prāptirbhavati ||
T06srabhusu:8034: pariśuddhasya dhyānasya [|] sa tatpariśuddhaṃ dhyānaṃ niśritya yo [a]nenābhijñādhipataye(pateyo)
T06srabhusu:8036: ṛddhiviṣayamvārabhya, pūrvenivāsadivyaśrotracyutyupapādacetaḥ paryāyamvā tameva manasi kurvan samāhitabhūmikena manaskāreṇārthapratisaṃvedī ca
T06srabhusu:8041: sa kālo bhavati samayo yadasya bhāja(va)nāphalāḥ (ḥ) paṃcābhijñā utpadyante ||
T06srabhusu:8043: api ca tasyā(sa tathā)rtha pratisaṃvedī, dharmapratisaṃvedī sarvābhijñānirhārāya dvādaśasaṃjñā bhāvayati |
T06srabhusu:8054: karpāsapindhurvā [|] vāyumaṇḍalake vā sa tathā [a]dhimucyamānaḥ tatra prerayatyādhimokṣikeṇaiva manaskāreṇa [|] tadyathā mañcātpīṭhānmañce |
T06srabhusu:8058: tadyathā kauśayamvā, kaccamvā, padgamvā, [|] itīyaṃ mṛdusaṃjñāyā laghusaṃjñāyā[ḥ] poṣikā, anugrāhikā [ya]yā anugṛhyamāṇā laghusaṃjñā pṛthuvṛddhivaikalyatāṃ (vipulatāṃ) gacchati |
T06srabhusu:8059: tatrākāśadhātusaṃjñā yayā saṃjñayā laghutāṃ ca mṛdutāṃ cātmano 'dhimucyate
T06srabhusu:8061: tatra yadantarālaṃ vivandhacaraṃ rūpigataṃ gamanāya tadākāśamadhimucyate [|] ādhimokṣikaṃ (kena) ca (Śbh_Sh
T06srabhusu:8063: tatra cittakāyasamavadhānasaṃjñā yayā cittamvā kāye samavadadhāti |
T06srabhusu:8064: kāyamvā citte, yenāsya kāyo laghutaraśca bhavati,
T06srabhusu:8065: mṛdutaraśca, karmaṇyataraśca, prabhāsvarataraśca [|] cittānvayaścitta pratibandhaścittaṃ niśritya varttate |
T06srabhusu:8067: bhū(dū)ragamāsanne [a]dhimucyate, āsannaṃ dūre, aṇu sthūlaṃ, sthūlamaṇu,
T06srabhusu:8068: pṛthivī āpaḥ, āpaḥ pṛthivī evamekaikena mahābhūtenānyonyaṃ karaṇīyaṃ |
T06srabhusu:8069: vistareṇa tathānirmitaṃ cādhimucyate, rūpanirmitaṃ vā, śabdanirmitaṃ vā [|]
T06srabhusu:8070: ityābhiḥ pañcasaṃjñābhiḥ bhāvanāyā pariniṣpannābhiranekavidhamṛddhiṣayaṃ pratyanubhavatyeko bhūtvā bahudhātmānamupadarśayati |
T06srabhusu:8080: | tadyathā pakṣī śakuni[ḥ], imau vā sūryācandramasāvevaṃ mahardhikau mahānubhāvau pāṇinā āmārṣṭi
T06srabhusu:8085: tatra dvividhābrahmalokasya kāyena vaśe vartanā, gamanena ca (|) vaśe varttayati |
T06srabhusu:8088: tatra pūrvānubhūtacaritānukramānusmṛtisaṃjñā yayā kumārakabhāvamupādāya yatrāsya smṛtiḥ pravarttate
T06srabhusu:8091: sthito, niṣaṇṇuḥ(ṇṇaḥ), (Śbh_Sh 465) śayito vistareṇa sarvāṃ pūrvānubhūtāṃ caryāmaudāraudārikaudārikatayā anuparivāṭikayā avyutkramanti(nte) |
T06srabhusu:8093: tasyā bhāvanānvayād bhāvanāphalamanekavidhaṃ pūrvenivāsaṃ samanusmarati yāvatsansā(saṃsā)raṃ soddeśaṃ vistareṇa [|]
T06srabhusu:8094: tatra nānāprakāraśabdasannipātanirghoṣasaṃjñā [|] yasmin grāme vā, nigame vā śreṇyāmvā, pūge vā, parṣadi vā, āyataviśāle vā gṛhe, avavarake vā,
T06srabhusu:8095: nānāprakārasya janakāyasya sanniṣaṇṇasya sannipatitasya yo vyatimiśro,
T06srabhusu:8098: mahatyā vā nadyā vaha[n]tyā nirghoṣaḥ, tatra nimittamudgṛhya yā saṃjñābhāvanā yayā samāhitabhūmikena manasikāreṇāryānāryeṣu śabdeṣu, divyamānuṣyakeṣu,
T06srabhusu:8100: tasyāsya bahulīkārānvayād bhāvanāphalaṃ divyaṃ śrotraṃ pratilabhate |
T06srabhusu:8107: yena divyena cakṣuṣā viśuddhena vistareṇa yāvatkāyasya bhedātsvargatau svargaloke deveṣūpapadyante(te)
T06srabhusu:8120: tadyathā mūkatā arthanidhyaptāvapratipadyanatā (danatā) prākṛtāprākṛtā vā vāgvyāhāratā [|]
T06srabhusu:8125: yena parasattvānāṃ parapudgalānāṃ vitarkitaṃ vicāritaṃ mano manasā yathābhūtaṃ prajānāti |
T06srabhusu:8139: anāryayā na punarna tathaiva bhavatyapi tu |
T06srabhusu:8141: evamābhirdvādaśabhiḥ saṃjñābhirbahulīkārānvayādyathāyogaṃ sa pañcānāmabhijñānāmāryāṇāṃ ca guṇānāmapṛthagjanasandhāraṇānāṃ yathāyogamabhinirhāro veditavyaḥ |
T06srabhusu:8142: tatra prathame dhyāne mṛdumadhyādhimātraparibhāvitena yathāyogaṃ brahmakāyikānāṃ, brahmapurohitānāṃ, mahābrahmaṇāṃ devānāṃ sabhāgatāyāmupasampadyate [|] dvitīye dhyāne mṛdumadhyādhimātrabhāvite
T06srabhusu:8148: sa cetpunaranāgāmī anāsraveṇa dhyānena caturthena sāsravaṃ, vyavakīrṇaṃ
T06srabhusu:8154: ākāśavijñānākiñcanyanaivasaṃjñānāsaṃjñāyatane mṛdumadhyādhimātrabhāvite ākāśavijñānākiñcanyanavasaṃjñānāsaṃjñāyatanopagānāṃ devānāṃ sabhāgatāyāmupasampadyate [|] arūpiṇaśca devāstasmātteṣāṃ sthānāntarakṛto
T06srabhusu:8159: sthirakāyakarmānto bhavatyacalendriyaḥ [|] na cāsyeryāpatha āśu paryādīyate |
T06srabhusu:8164: na saṃgaṇikārāmo, na saṃsargārāmo, dhīrā cāsya vāg(k)pravartate |
T06srabhusu:8174: ityevaṃ bhāgīyāni vītarāgaliṃgāni veditavyānītyayaṃ tāvat laukikamārgagamanasya vibhāgaḥ ||
T06srabhusu:8175: atha lokottareṇa mārgeṇa gantukāmo bhavati tasya catvāryāryasatyānyārabhya sapta manaskārā anupūrveṇotpadyante |
T06srabhusu:8181: caturbhirākāraiḥ samudayasatyasya tadyathā hetutaḥ, samudayataḥ, prabhavataḥ, pratyayataśca
T06srabhusu:8198: tatrāgamastāvadyathoktaṃ bhagavatā sarvasaṃskārā anityāḥ [|] te punaḥ saṃskārāḥ samāsataḥ sattvalokaśca bhājanalokaśca || uktañca bhagavatā sattvalokamadhikṛtya, paśyāmyahaṃ, bhikṣavo, divyena cakṣuṣā viśuddhenātikrāntamānuṣyakeṇa satvāṃścyavamānāṃścotpadyamānāṃśca (Śbh_Sh
T06srabhusu:8199: 472) vistareṇa yāvat kāsasya bhedātsugatau svargaloke deveṣūpapadyante |
T06srabhusu:8200: ityanena tāvatparyāyeṇa ityanena tāvatparyāyeṇa bhagavatā cakṣuṣmatā pratyakṣadarśinā sattvalokasyānityatā vyākhyātā |
T06srabhusu:8204: (Śbh_Sh 473) tadyathā saptasūryopame sūgre(tre)yāvadasyāḥ khalu mahāpṛthivyāḥ sumerośca parvata rājasya |
T06srabhusu:8205: yāvacca brahmalokād bhājanalokasya dagdhasya dhmātasya maṣirapi na prajñāyate |
T06srabhusu:8206: chāyikāvaśiṣṭamapi na prajñāyate [|] anena paryāyeṇa bhagavatā bhājanalaukika(loka)sthānityatā ākhyātāyaṃ(temaṃ) tāvadāptāgamaṃ niśrityāyaṃ yogī śraddhādhipateyaṃ sarvasaṃskārānityatāyāṃ niścayaṃ
T06srabhusu:8208: sa evaṃ niścayaṃ pratilabhya, śraddhādhipatyena punaḥ punaḥ
T06srabhusu:8243: saṃkleśakṛto(taḥ), [kṛṣikṛtaḥ], maraṇakṛto, vinīlakādi kṛtaḥ, sarveṇa sarvamasaṃprakhyānaparikṣayakṛto vipariṇāmaḥ |
T06srabhusu:8249: tatra kālaparivāso nāma yeṣāṃ bhāvānāṃ rūpiṇāṃ svasthāne 'pyupanyastakānāṃ
T06srabhusu:8252: tatra paropakramo nāma yathāpi tat paro vividhāni rūpāṇi vividhaiḥ praharaṇaiḥ vividhairupakramaviśeṣaiḥ vicitrāṃ vikṛtimāpādayati |
T06srabhusu:8253: tatropabhogo nāma yathāpi tatpratisvāmino vividhaṃ rūpamupabhuṃjānā upabhogavidhipatitvā (gamadhipatiṃ kṛtvā vi)kṛtimāpādayanti |
T06srabhusu:8254: tatra ṛtuvipariṇāmo nāma tadyathā hemante tṛṇauṣadhivanaspatīnāṃ
T06srabhusu:8260: tatrāgnidāho nāma yathāpi tadagnirmukto grāmanigamarāṣṭrarājadhānīrdahan paraiti |
T06srabhusu:8261: tatrodakakledo nāma tathāpi tanmahān udakaskandhaḥ samudāgato
T06srabhusu:8263: tatrodakakledo nāma tathāpi tanmahānudakaskandhaḥ samudāgato) grāmanigamarājarāṣṭradhānī[ḥ] plāvayan paraiti ||
T06srabhusu:8265: tatra vāyuśoṣo nāma tathāpi tanmahatā vāyuskandhenārdrāḥ pṛthivīpradeśā laghu laghveva śuṣyanti
T06srabhusu:8267: pratyayāntarasamudgamo nāma tadyathā sukhavedanīyaṃ sparśaṃ pratītya sukhāṃ vedanāṃ vedayamānasya sukhavedanīya(ḥ)sparśasamudgamaḥ |
T06srabhusu:8269: duḥkhāṃ vedanāṃ vedayamānasya su(duḥ)kha vedanīya(ḥ) sparśasamudgamaḥ]
T06srabhusu:8270: aduḥkhāsukhāṃ vedanāṃ vedayamānasyāsukhavedanīyasya vāduḥkhavedanīyasya vā sparśasya samudgamaḥ
T06srabhusu:8271: tathā raktasya pratighanimittasamudgamaḥ yasya samudgamādrāgaparyavasthānaṃ ca vigacchati
T06srabhusu:8272: pratighaparyavasthānaṃ cotpadyate (|) evaṃ dviṣṭasya mūḍhasya visabhāgaḥ |
T06srabhusu:8279: sarvo(rvā) sau ebhiraṣṭābhirnāta uttari nāto bhūyaḥ |
T06srabhusu:8282: ihānecā(nā)tmano [vā] pareṣāmvā dahrāvasthāmupādāya yāvajjīrṇāvasthā dṛṣṭā bhavati |
T06srabhusu:8289: (sa tathātmano) vā, pareṣām vā, yā pūrvaṃ(tāma) sva(su)varṇatā(tāṃ),
T06srabhusu:8291: paścācca durvarṇatāṃ duśchavitāṃ rukṣatāṃ rukṣavarṇatāṃ ca |
T06srabhusu:8293: pratyudāvarttyāpareṇa samayena tāmeva suvarṇatāṃ paryavadātatvagvarṇatāṃ ca paśyati |
T06srabhusu:8297: yathā varṇa ukta evaṃ kṛśasthūlatayā saṃsthānaṃ veditavyaṃ sampattirvipattiśca |
T06srabhusu:8301: ihānenātmano vā, pareṣāmvā yā pūrvaṃ suvarṇatā, succhavitā,
T06srabhusu:8308: sopareṇa samayena vikalatāmpaśyati rājato vā, corato vā, manuṣyato vā, amanuṣyato vā [|]
T06srabhusu:8311: (eva)mātmanaḥ pareṣāṃ ca śrāntakāyatāṃ, klāntakāyatāṃ dhāvato vā, plavato
T06srabhusu:8312: vā, laṃghayato vā, abhiru(ro)hatovā, vividhaṃ vākkarma drutaṃ kurvataḥ |
T06srabhusu:8314: tasyaivaṃ bhavatyanityā bateme saṃskārā iti pūrvavat |
T06srabhusu:8316: evamātmano vā pareṣāmvā paropakrameṇa kāyavikṛtiṃ paśyati |
T06srabhusu:8319: apareṇa vā punaḥ samayena tāṃ vikṛtiṃ na paśyati |
T06srabhusu:8320: dṛṣṭvā ca punarasyaivaṃ bhavatyanityā bata(te)me saṃskārā iti pūrvavadityevaṃ
T06srabhusu:8322: tathātmānaṃ vā, paramvā, śīla(ta)kāle pratyupasthite aviśadakāyaṃ,
T06srabhusu:8324: uṣṇakāle vā punaḥ pratyupasthite aviśadakāyaṃ, saṃkucitakāyaṃ śītaparyavasthānaparyavasthitaviśadagātraprasvinnagātraṃ santaptagātramucchraṣya vacanaṃ tṛṣāparigataṃ |
T06srabhusu:8326: dṛṣṭvā ca punaḥ pratyudāvarttya punaḥ śītakāle pūrvoktairevākāraiḥ paśyati |
T06srabhusu:8329: bata(te)me saṃskārā iti pūrvavadeva[ṃ] śītakṛtāṃ vipariṇāmānityatāṃ paryeṣate |
T06srabhusu:8333: dṛṣṭvā ca punarasyaivaṃ bhavatyanityā (Śbh_Sh 480) bateme saṃskārā iti
T06srabhusu:8337: sukhavedanīyena sparśena spṛṣṭaḥ, sukhavedanīyaṃ sparśaṃ pratītyotpannāṃ sukhāṃ vedanāṃ
T06srabhusu:8340: sukhadevanāvasthā[ṃ] evaṃ duḥkhāsukhāsu(duḥ)khavedanāvasthāṃ [|] tasya pūrvāṃ paryeṣaṇā āsāṃ vedanānāṃ navanavatāniḥpurāṇa purāṇatāmāpāyikatāṃ tāvatkālikatāmitvarapratyupāsthāyitamanyathībhāvaṃ dṛṣṭvā, dṛṣṭvaivaṃ bhavati |
T06srabhusu:8345: samohaṃ vigatamohamanyatamānyatamena vā upakleśenopakliṣṭaṃ cittamupakliṣṭamiti parijānāti
T06srabhusu:8352: ihānenaikadātmā ca pare ca dṛṣṭvā(ṣṭā) (Śbh_Sh 481) bhavantyarogiṇaḥ,
T06srabhusu:8355: ābādhikaṃ, duḥkhitaṃ, bāḍhaglānaṃ, spṛṣṭaṃ śārīrikābhirvedanābhiḥ duḥkhābhistīvrābhiriti vistareṇa pūrvavat |
T06srabhusu:8357: ihānenaikadātmā ca pare ca dṛṣṭvā (dṛṣṭā) bhavantyarogiṇaḥ, sukhino,
T06srabhusu:8361: sa punarapareṇa samayena paśyatyarogiṇaṃ, sukhitaṃ, balavantaṃ, dṛṣṭvā ca punarasyaivaṃ
T06srabhusu:8364: ihāyaṃ jīvitaṃ paśyati dhriyantaṃ, tiṣṭhantaṃ, yāpayantaṃ, so 'pareṇa samayena mṛtaṃ kālagataṃ paśyati |
T06srabhusu:8365: vijñānaśūnyaṃ kalevaraṃ dṛṣṭvā ca punarasyaivaṃ bhavatīti vistareṇa pūrvavat ||
T06srabhusu:8370: ekadā vipūyakāvasthamenaṃ vistareṇa yāvasthiśaṃkalikāvasthaṃ dṛṣṭvāsyaivaṃ bhavatyanityā bata(te)me
T06srabhusu:8374: sarveṇa sarvaṃ naṣṭā(ṣṭo) bhavati, vidhvastā(sto), viśīrṇaḥ |
T06srabhusu:8375: sarveṇa sarvaṃ cakṣuṣo [a]nābhāsagatā, dṛṣṭvā ca punarasyaivaṃ bhavatyanityā
T06srabhusu:8376: bata(te)me saṃskārāstathā hyeṣāṃ paurvāparyeṇa pratyakṣata evāyamevaṃ rūpo
T06srabhusu:8383: ye 'nena pṛthivīpradeśā nābhisaṃskṛtāḥ pūrvaṃ dṛṣṭā bhavanti |
T06srabhusu:8386: cchīrṇān cha(kṣa)titapatitān khalu chidrānagninā vā dagdhānudakena
T06srabhusu:8393: evaṃ tṛṇauṣadhivanaspataya ārāmodyānāni ca samṛddhapatrapuṣpaphalāni paśyati |
T06srabhusu:8396: vigatapatrapuṣphalāni (|) agnidāhena vā dagdhāni (vā,) tathā parvatānyekadā samṛddhapāṣāṇāni paśyatyekadā nirluṭhitapāṣāṇāni patita
T06srabhusu:8398: tathā utsasarastaḍāka(ga)nadīprasravaṇakūpādīnyekadā, samṛddhodakāni paśyatyekadā parikṣīṇodakāni, sarveṇa vā sarvaṃ viśuṣkāṇi khilībhūtāni koṭarāṇi |
T06srabhusu:8406: 484) tathā vividhāni yānānyekadā sumaṇḍitāni svalaṃkṛtānyabhinavāni paśyatyekadā vigatālaṃkārāṇi
T06srabhusu:8419: asthiratāṃ [|] dṛṣṭvā ca punarasyaivaṃ bhavatyanityā bata(te)me saṃskārāstathā hyeṣāṃ bāhyānāṃ
T06srabhusu:8420: saṃskārāṇāṃ, ṣaṇṇāṃ ca parigrahavastūnāṃ, daśānāñca kāyaparivārāṇāṃ pratyakṣatā, vikāro, viparimāṇo 'yamīdṛśa upalabhyate |
T06srabhusu:8422: ebhiraṣṭābhirvipariṇāmakāraṇaiḥ pūrvanirdiṣṭairasyādhyātmikabāhyasya vastuno yathāyogaṃ pratyakṣādhipateyena manaskāreṇaivaṃ vipariṇāmākāreṇānityatāṃ vyavacārayati |
T06srabhusu:8423: (Śbh_Sh 485) yathānena sā vipariṇāmānityatā pratyakṣaṃ dṛṣṭā bhavatyanubhūtā, aparapratyayaśca tasyāṃ bhavatyananyaneyaḥ |
T06srabhusu:8427: sa evaṃ pratyakṣādhipateyena manaskāreṇa vipariṇāmānityatāṃ vyavahā(cā)rayitvā(vyavacārya) yeṣāṃ rūpiṇāṃ saṃskārāṇāṃ satī samvidyamānā kṣaṇotpannabhagnā vinīlatā(vilīnatā) nopalabhyate tatra pratyakṣādhipateyaṃ manaskāraṃ niśrityānumānaṃ karotyevañca punaranumānaṃ karoti |
T06srabhusu:8429: na tu tathaivāvasthitānāṃ, iti hi kṣaṇikāḥ saṃskārāsteṣu teṣu pratyayeṣu satsu tathā tathotpadyante
T06srabhusu:8435: sahaiva tena vināśakāraṇena vinaṣṭānāṃ saṃskārāṇāṃ yasmādvisadṛśā (śī)
T06srabhusu:8437: na tu sarveṇa sarvamapravṛttireva [|] yeṣāmvā punaḥ saṃskārāṇāṃ sarveṇa sarvamapravṛttirupalabhyate
T06srabhusu:8438: tadyathā kvāthyamānāmasāmante sarveṇa sarvamparikṣayo bhavati agninirdagdhānāṃ ca lokabhājanānāṃ masirapi na [pra]jñāyate |
T06srabhusu:8440: śiṣṭamapi na prajñāyate teṣāmapyuttarottarakaraṇaparyādānādante sarveṇa sarvamabhāvo bhavati
T06srabhusu:8441: na tvagninaiva kriyate [|] tasmādvipariṇāmakāraṇānyetānyaṣṭau yathoktāni svarasenaiva tu vināśo bhavati |
T06srabhusu:8442: sa evamānumānikamanaskāreṇa saṃskāreṇākṣaṇotpannabhagnavilīnatāyāṃ niścayaṃ pratilabhya punarapyapratyakṣaparalokāsaṃskārapravṛttāvanumānaṃ karoti ||
T06srabhusu:8444: santi satvā (ttvā) ye avarṇā api, durvarṇā
T06srabhusu:8445: apyupalabhyante, uccakulīnā api, ādyakulīnā api, daridrakulīnā api,
T06srabhusu:8446: alpeśākhyā api, dīrghāyuṣo (ṣa) ādeyavākyā api, anādeyavākyā api,
T06srabhusu:8447: tīkṣṇendriyā api [|] (Śbh_Sh 487) tadetat satva(ttva)vaicitryaṃ sati karmavaicitrye yujyate [|] nāsati |
T06srabhusu:8448: yadrūpaiḥ sattvairyadrūpaṃ pūrvameva bhūtaṃ (kṛtaṃ?) kuśalākuśalaṃ citrakarma kṛtamupacitaṃ, tena hetunā, tena pratyayena teṣāmidamātmabhāvavaicitryamabhinirvṛttaṃ ||
T06srabhusu:8450: sa cedīśvaranirmāṇahetukaṃ syāttadīśvarapratyayameva vā syādanyena vopādāneneśvaro nirmimīta
T06srabhusu:8451: sa cedīśvara pratyayameva syāt teneśvarasyaiṣāñca saṃskārāṇāṃ yaugapadyaṃ syāt |
T06srabhusu:8452: atha pūrvamīśvaraḥ paścāt saṃskārā, neśvarapratyayāḥ saṃskārā bhavanti |
T06srabhusu:8454: tena samīcchā sahetukā (kī) vā syānnirhetu kā (kīṃ) vā [|] yadi sahetukā īśvarahetukaiva ca tena pūrvakeṇa doṣeṇa tulyatayā na yujyate |
T06srabhusu:8457: praṇidhānamīśvaravinirmuktānyadharmahetukā tathā sarve 'pi saṃskārā dharmahetukā eva bhaviṣyanti
T06srabhusu:8458: kimīśvareṇa vṛthā kalpitenetyevamādinā ānumānikena manaskāreṇaivaṃbhāgīyena, paralokena saṃskārapravṛttau niścayaṃ pratilabhate |
T06srabhusu:8461: tatra yā pūrva pañca [vidhā]nityatā pañcākārabhāvanānugatā uddiṣṭā, tatra
T06srabhusu:8465: adhyātmamupādāya bahirdhā ca veditavyā || tatrādhyātmamupādāya yathāpi tadekatyaḥ
T06srabhusu:8471: tathā santaḥ samvidyamānā bhogā avipariṇatā, avinaṣṭā rājñā(ḥ) apahriyante |
T06srabhusu:8474: tatra dharmatākārānityatā (Śbh_Sh 489) yathāpi tasyā eva vipariṇāmānityatāyāḥ vināśānityatāyāḥ
T06srabhusu:8475: vartamāne 'pyadhvanyasamavahitāyāḥ anābhoge (gate) 'dhvani bhāvinyā dharmatāṃ pratividhyatyevaṃ dharmāṇa ete saṃskārā anāgate 'dhvani
T06srabhusu:8479: sa evamādhyātmikabāhyānāṃ saṃskārāṇāṃ pañcavidhāyāmanityatāyāmebhiḥ pañcabhirākārairyathāyogaṃ manasikārabāhulyādupapattisādhanabhāvanādhipatyācca niye(rme)yaṃ
T06srabhusu:8482: ya ete saṃskārā anityāsteṣāmanityatāṃ (tā) jātidharmato yujyate |
T06srabhusu:8483: iti hyeta eva saṃskārā jātidharmāṇaḥ jātiśca duḥkhā, yadā(yā) jātireva[ṃ] jarā
T06srabhusu:8486: sa ye sukhavedanīyāḥ skandhāḥ, sāsravāḥ, sopādānāsteṣu saṃyojanabandhanākāreṇa duḥkhākāramavatarati
T06srabhusu:8491: | tathā hyaduḥkhāsukhāsthānīyāḥ skandhāḥ sopādānā dauṣṭhulyasahagatā abījānugatā avinirmuktā duḥkhaduḥkhatayā, vipariṇāmaduḥkhatayā ca |
T06srabhusu:8493: evamayaṃ yogī sukhasthānīyeṣu saṃskāreṣu, sukhāyāñca vedanāyāṃ vipariṇāmaduḥkhatāmavatīrṇo bhavati |
T06srabhusu:8494: yaduta saṃyojanabandhanākāreṇa duḥkhavedanāsthānīyeṣu saṃskāreṣuduḥkhāyāṃ vedanāyāṃ duḥkhaduḥkhatāmavatīrṇo bhavati |
T06srabhusu:8495: yadutāniṣṭākāreṇa aduḥkhāsukhasthānīyeṣu saṃskāreṣu(ṣva) duḥkhāsukhāyāñca vedanāyāṃ saṃskāraduḥkhatāmavatīrṇo
T06srabhusu:8499: saṃyojanabandhanākāramaniṣṭākāraṃ yogakṣemākāraṃ cādhipatiṃ kṛtvā tisṛṣu vedanāsu yatkiñcidvedayitamidamatra duḥkhasyetyevamayamanityākārapūrvakeṇa manaskāreṇa duḥkhākāramavatīrṇo
T06srabhusu:8509: tadevaṃ sati skandhamātrametannāstyeṣu skandheṣu nityo, dhruvaḥ, śāśvataḥ svābhūtaḥ |
T06srabhusu:8510: kaścidātmā vā, satvo(ttvo) vā, yo 'sau jāyeta vā, hīyeta vā,
T06srabhusu:8511: mriyate (yeta) vā, tatra vā (tatra vā) tatra kṛtakṛtānāṃ karmaṇāṃ
T06srabhusu:8528: pratisaṃvedya, asya duḥkhasya ko hetuḥ, kaḥ samudayaḥ, prabhavaḥ,
T06srabhusu:8530: yasya prahāṇādasya duḥkhasya prahāṇaṃ syādityebhiścaturbhirākāraissamudayasatyasya lakṣaṇaṃ pratisaṃvedayati |
T06srabhusu:8537: upādānahetukasya ca bhavasya samudāgamādbhavapūrvikāyā jāteḥ prabhavatvāt, jātipratyayatāṃ, jāti ca (teśca)
T06srabhusu:8542: aparaḥ paryāyaḥ [|] yaḥ kleśānuśaya āśraya[ḥ] punarbhavāmabhinirvṛttaye hetustajjasya ca paryavasthānasya yathāyogaṃ veditavyaṃ [|] aparaḥ paryāyaḥ [|] yaḥ kleśānuśaya āśrayastṛṣṇānuśayādikaḥ sa āyatyāṃ punarbhavābhinirvṛttaye hetustajjasya ca paryavasthānasya yathāyogaṃ samudayaḥ, prabhavaḥ, pratyayaśca [|]
T06srabhusu:8545: paunarbhavikī tṛṣṇā nandīrāgasahagatāyāstṛṣṇāyāḥ (Śbh_Sh 494) prabhavo bhavati sā punarnandīrāgasahagatā tṛṣṇā prabhūtā, tatra tatrābhinandinyāstṛṣṇāyāḥ pratyayo bhavatyevamasyānuśayagatāṃ trividhaparyavasthāgatāṃ ca tṛṣṇāmāgamyāyati[ḥ] |
T06srabhusu:8550: samudayasatyalakṣaṇaṃ pratisaṃvedya asya samudayasatyasyāśeṣoparamannirodhaṃ nirodhata ākārayati
T06srabhusu:8556: nirvāṇagamanāyaikāyanārthena mārgaṃ mārga[to], nyāyataḥ, pratipattito, nairyāṇikataśca ākārayati |
T06srabhusu:8565: | yatkiñcitsaṃskṛtaṃ sarvatra sarvaśaḥ [evaṃ tadevaṃ pratisaṃvedī manaskāraḥ |
T06srabhusu:8568: 'pyevaṃ nayapatitā iti yatkiñcitsaṃskṛtaṃ sarvatra sarvaśa] evaṃ
T06srabhusu:8570: śāntaḥ, mārgo, nairyāṇiko yastatprahāṇāya tasya yadā vipakṣokteṣu pratyātmikeṣu skandheṣu satyajñānaṃ |
T06srabhusu:8573: sa cāyaṃ lakṣaṇapratisaṃvedī manaskāraḥ śrutacintāvyavakīrṇo veditavyaḥ |
T06srabhusu:8574: yadā teṣu satyeṣvayaṃ yogī evaṃ samyak(g)vyavacāraṇānvayādibhiḥ
T06srabhusu:8576: yadutopapattisādhanayuktyā, yaduta yāvadbhāvikatāṃ vā, tadā śrutacintāmayaṃ manaskāraṃ samatikramya vyavatīrṇavarttinamekāntena bhāvanākāreṇādhimucyate |
T06srabhusu:8578: satyālambanaścaikāntasamāhitaśca [|] sa tasyānvayā[d]dve satye adhikṛtya duḥkhasatyañca (Śbh_Sh 496) samudayasatyañca aparyantaṃ jñānaṃ
T06srabhusu:8584: tatrāparyanteti nāsti saṃsāraṃ(raḥ) sansa(saṃsa)rata, eṣāṃ dharmāṇāmanto nāsti paryantaḥ
T06srabhusu:8615: ahamasmiduḥkhaṃ duḥkhataḥ (|) paśyāmi, samudayaṃ samudayato, nirodhaṃ nirodhataḥ |
T06srabhusu:8619: ānimittamānimittataḥ paśyāmi mamaite dharmāstaddhetostatpratyayasya taccittaṃ na
T06srabhusu:8621: nirba(viba)ndhakā(ka)raṃ vibandhakāra iti laghu laghveva prajñayā pratividhya, svarasānupravṛttau manaskāramutsṛjya, bahirdhā jñeyālambanād vyāvartya, mā(ma)naskārapraviṣṭāṃ, (Śbh_Sh 498) manaskārānugatāṃ,
T06srabhusu:8623: sa utpannotpannaṃ cittaṃ nirudhyamānamanantarotpannena cittena bhajyamānaṃ paśyati |
T06srabhusu:8626: | yathāsya yo 'sau manaskārānupraviṣṭo 'smimāno vipakṣa(bandha)karaḥ sa tasyāvakāśaḥ |
T06srabhusu:8629: navanavatāmāpāyikatāṃ tāvatkālikatāmitvarapratyupasthāyitāñca paurvāparyeṇa paśyatīdamasyā [a]nityatāyā yattasyāścittasantateḥ upādānaskandhānupraviṣṭatāṃ paśyatīdamasya duḥkhatāyāstatra yaccittaṃ dharmaṃ nopalabhate |
T06srabhusu:8630: idamatra śūnyatāyāstatra yasyā eva cittasantateḥ pratītyasamutpannatāmasvatantrāmpaśyatīdamasyānātmatāyā[ḥ |] evaṃ tāvad duḥkhasatyamavatīrṇo bhavati |
T06srabhusu:8634: tṛṣṇāprabhavā, tṛṣṇāpratyayā [|] asyā api cittasanteteryo nirodhaḥ so 'pi
T06srabhusu:8637: sa nairyāṇika ityevamaparīkṣitamanaskāraparīkṣāyogena sūkṣmayā prajñayā na tānyāryasatyānyavatīrṇo bhavati |
T06srabhusu:8649: sa evambibandhakaramasmimānaṃ prahāya nirvāṇe cādhyāśayaratiṃ parigṛhyayo
T06srabhusu:8652: tasya taccittaṃ tasmin samaye niruddhamiva khyāti |
T06srabhusu:8653: na ca taṃ (tan) niruddhaṃ bhavatyanālambanamiva khyāti |
T06srabhusu:8657: na ca punastasmiṃ(smin) samaye madhukaramiddhāvaṣṭabdhamapi taccittaṃ niruddhamiva khyāti
T06srabhusu:8663: tasya tatsarvapaścimanirvikalpaṃcittaṃ yasyānantaraṃ pūrvavicāriteṣu satveṣvadhyātmamābhogaṃ karoti |
T06srabhusu:8666: na laukikaṃ [|] sīmā eṣā laukikānāṃ saṃskārāṇāṃ, paryanta eṣastenocyante laukikā agradharmā iti |
T06srabhusu:8671: tasyotpādāt traidhātukāvacarāṇāṃ darśanaprahātavyānāṃ kleśānāṃ pakṣyaṃ dauṣṭhulyasanniśrayasanniviṣṭaṃ tatprahīyate |
T06srabhusu:8672: tasya prahāṇāt sacetpūrvameva kāmebhyo vītarāgo bhavati |
T06srabhusu:8683: sa bhūyassa tasya dauṣṭhulyasya pratipraśrabdheḥ srota āpanno bhavati |
T06srabhusu:8690: tasyemāni liṃgāni catvāri jñānānyanena pratilabdhāni bhavanti |
T06srabhusu:8696: tathā agantā bhavatyapāyāṃ (yān) na saṃcidhyaṇikṣāṃ (vidhya[ti] śikṣāṃ) vyatikrāmati |
T06srabhusu:8697: ca tiryagyoni(kṛtaṃ) gataṃ prāṇinaṃ jīvitād vyaparopayati |
T06srabhusu:8701: na svayaṃkṛtasukhaduḥkhaṃ paryeti, na parakṛtaṃ, na svayaṃkṛtaṃ ca parakṛtaṃ ca, na svayaṃkārāparakārāhetusamutpannaṃ
T06srabhusu:8707: tīrṇakāṃkṣastīrṇavicikitsaḥ, aparapratyayo 'nanyaneyaḥ, śāstuḥ śāsane dharmeṣu vaiśāradyaprāptaḥ
T06srabhusu:8711: tasya yāvallaukikebhyo 'gradharmebhya adhimokṣiko manaskāraḥ satyānyabhisamitavataḥ darśanaprahātavyeṣu kleśeṣu prahīṇeṣu
T06srabhusu:8718: ayañca viśeṣo yadviṣaye 'dharakleśasthānīyeṣu adhimātraparyavasthānīye 'pi baddhaṃ kleśaparyavasthānamutpādayatyāśu cāpanayati |
T06srabhusu:8721: anāgāmiliṃgāni ca pūrvoktānītyeva tatra sarvo bhāvanāmārgaḥ pratyavekṣya pratyavekṣya mīmānsā(māṃsa) manaskāreṇa prahīṇāprahīṇatāṃ yathāpratilabdhamārgābhyāmaprabhāvitaḥ |
T06srabhusu:8724: yaḥ samāhitabhūmikena manaskāreṇa laukikalokottareṇaiṣāṃ kuśalānāṃ saṃskṛtānāṃ dharmāṇāmabhyāsaḥ
T06srabhusu:8732: tatra ye tāvadapratilabdhā dharmāḥ kuśalā vaiśeṣikāstān pratilabhate |
T06srabhusu:8736: tatra ye pratilabdhā, na ca saṃmukhībhūtāste
T06srabhusu:8753: tathā tathā adhobhūmikāḥ prahāṇādharmā dūrī bhavanti |
T06srabhusu:8755: tatra bhāvanāyāme (yā e)kādaśavidhaḥ prakārabhedo (Śbh_Sh 505) veditavyaḥ tadyathā śamathabhāvanā, vipaśyanābhāvanā, [pūrvavadeva tatra]
T06srabhusu:8762: tatra lokottaramārgabhāvanā duḥkhaṃ vā duḥkhato manasikurvataḥ,
T06srabhusu:8766: tatra madhyamārgabhāvanā yayā madhyān kleśān prajahāti |
T06srabhusu:8769: tatra prayogamārgabhāvanā yayā prayogamārabhate kleśa prahāṇāya |
T06srabhusu:8771: (Śbh_Sh 506) tatra vimuktimārgabhāvanā yayā samanantaraprahīṇe kleśavimuktiṃ sākṣātkaroti
T06srabhusu:8772: tatra viśeṣamārgabhāvanā yayāsta (yayā ta)ta ūrdhvaṃ yāvadanyabhūmikasya kleśaprayogamārabdhavyaṃ nārabhate |
T06srabhusu:8775: tasyaivaṃ bhāvanāprayuktasya kālena ca kālaṃ kleśānāṃ prahīṇāprahīṇatāṃ
T06srabhusu:8776: mīmānsa(māṃsa)taḥ (mānasya?) kālena kālaṃ saṃvejanīyeṣu dharmeṣu cittaṃ samvejayataḥ, kālenakālamabhipramodanīyeṣvabhipramodayataḥ so 'sya bhavati
T06srabhusu:8783: sarveṣāṃ tadanyeṣāṃ maṇimuktāvaiḍūryaśaṃkhaśilāpravāḍā(lā)dīnāṃ maṇīnāṃ sarvasāraṃ sarvadṛḍhaṃ tadanyānvilikhati |
T06srabhusu:8785: evamevāyaṃ samādhiḥ sarvaśaikṣasamādhīnāmagryaḥ, śreṣṭhaḥ sarvasāraḥ sarvakleśānabhibhavati
T06srabhusu:8788: tasya vajropamasya samādheḥ samanantaraṃ sarvakleśapakṣyaṃ dauṣṭhulyabījasamuddhātādatyantatāyai cittamadhimucyate |
T06srabhusu:8798: aśaikṣayā samyagdṛṣṭyā samyaksaṃkalpena yāvadaśaikṣayā samyagvimuktyā samyagjñānena [|]
T06srabhusu:8802: vihāreṇāryeṇa vā, divyena vā, brāhmeṇa vā, tena tena viharati |
T06srabhusu:8803: yaṃ yamevākāṃkṣate dharmaṃ manasi karttuṃ kuśalamarthopasaṃhitaṃ |
T06srabhusu:8804: laukikaṃ vā lokottaramvā, taṃ tameva manasi karoti |
T06srabhusu:8816: cittaḥ, suvimuktaprajñaḥ kevalo ukṣi..........cca...........li puruṣa ityucyate |
T06srabhusu:8819: bhavati suṣṭhumanāḥ upekṣako bhavati smṛtaḥ samprajā[nā]naḥ |
T06srabhusu:8820: evaṃ śrotreṇa śabdān, ghrāṇena gandhān, jihvayā rasān, kāyena spraṣṭavyān,
T06srabhusu:8827: samacittaśca bhavati vāsī candanakalpaḥ sendro pitryāṇāṃ devānāṃ mānyaśca pūjyaśca mārgakāśeṣadhātupratiṣṭhite ca bhavati tīrṇaḥ pāragato
T06srabhusu:8833: yathā na saṃsṛto (tau) nānyatra yad duḥkhaṃ
T06srabhusu:8834: tanniruddhaṃ tavyupaśāntaṃ tacchītībhūtaṃ bhava iṃ gataṃ |
T06srabhusu:8836: yaduta sarvopadhipratiniḥsarvasaṃjñākṣayo virāgo nirodho nirvāṇaṃ tasyemāni liṃgānyevaṃ bhāgīyāni veditavyāni |
T06srabhusu:8840: kta manyamasaṃ tathā prāpayituṃ mandadā tra ma brahmacaryaṃ maithunaṃ dharmaṃ pratiṣevituṃ
T06srabhusu:8842: tathā bhavyaḥ svayaṃ kṛtaṃ sukhaṃ duḥkhaṃ pratyetuṃ |
T06srabhusu:8846: 'anyatāmānyatamvā bhayabhairavaṃ........saṃtrāsamāpattu rayamasau vajropamaḥ samādhirayaṃ prayoganiṣṭho manaskāraḥ yaḥ
T06srabhusu:8850: ityayamucyate sā/mo dha ka sarveṣāṃ samyaksaṃbuddhānāṃ saśrāvakasaṃyuktānāṃ nirdeśasthānīyānāṃ sākṣātkā[ra]sthānīyānāṃ tadyathā sarvanāmakāyapadakāyavyaṃjanakāyakāvyamanu śāstrāṇi || mātṛkā || uddānam ||
